Jan 29 1880
canopy of heaven with our beds covered with drifting snow 16 m[iles]

Jan 30. Br Whiting arived last Evening and spent the night with us
A vary cold morning Br [[Hiram Judd|Judd]] drove the team some 10 Mils 
further into the Mountains to a camp in the gulch while Br Whiting
and mysel mounted our horses & rode some 10 miles North through 
the heards of cattle and it was vary cold our beards & faces was covered
Ice from our breath we rode in the saddle about 20 miles and 
camped with the Brethren in the gulch. 20 Mils

31. We aros in the morning with a heavy snow storm upon us and 
I felt that it was time for me to get out of the Mountains lest 
I get snowed in with an Alpine winter so we could not get out 
with our teams so we got our Breakfast had our prayers and 
hitched our horses to our waggons and with the help of the brethren
and two more horses we wallowed through the snow out of the 
gulch and reached the level country above I mounted my horse 
and rode in the saddle 8 hours with the Northern blast blowing 
the snow into my face and I reached the shepherds tent at 
4 oclok but the waggon did not arive for more than an hour 20 Mils

Feb 1, 1880. It was a clear plesant Morning we drove 25 Mils 
to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]]. Thus I have spent 11 days in the Mountains in the 
Midst of the Driving snow making my bed on the ground in the 
shepherds tent and in the open air surrounded with the drifting 
snows of a riged winter I eat my bread & meat twice a day with 
thanksgiving and drank the cold snow water

Tuesday


23. Brother Clayton caught 7 chickens [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] 
visited us to day with [[William H. Kimball|Wm Kimball]] and spent 2 Hours 
with us and returned He called upon business

Friday


26. We all rode 8 miles up to [[Marcus LeGrand Young|Legrand Youngs]] camp
we found Sister Young vary feeble in poor health

Saturday


27. My son [[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] arived at 11:15 we were 
glad to see him we rode to [[Oscar Brigham Young|Oscar Youngs]] camp
rode up the canyon Owen killed 9 grouse at two 
shots I had a bad night, Altitude to high for my breathing

Sunday


June 22 Although I met with the Saints
at [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] I read most of the
vision & spoke 50 Minuts on the Different 
Glories Br Lot Smith 20 Mints
and WW 15 Minuts on the disappointment
of Infidelity in the spirit world & on the
United Order

Monday


23. I spent the day reading the United States
History By Ridpath spent the day at [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]]

Tuesday


24. At 2 oclok I left [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] with [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 
& wife [[Mary Garn Smith|Mary]] & Sister Johnson & rode to 
[[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] and held a Meeting I spoke 30 M[inutes]
& Lot Smith 10. M[inutes] St Joseph is a Nice place 
But they have to Bring their water Ditch 9 Miles 
this was made & kept up By 12 families 12 Men 
11 women & 25 Children Had in 65 Acres of 
wheat 42 Corn, 8 cane & 15 Garden 120 Cows
200 yearlings 40 Horses & 1000 sheep 24 Miles

Wednesday


25 we rode to [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] stoped with Br 25 Miles
Dean we visited the Dam whare the [[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|River]] had 
Broak Around it & concluded that the Dam
Could Be Built so as to tand the Settlement had
done their [fermil] 30 Miles up the River up
caught 6 fish with a hook

Sunday


16 Sunday I rode to the farmers ward & Met with the saints
[[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] spoke 25 M[inutes], W Woodruff 40, and ret[urn]ed
to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] and called upon [[Elias Smith|Elias Smith]] who was sick

Saturday


April 14 /88
I rcd 20 Letters
[FIGURE] & wrote 10 public
Letters I [[3 or 4 words]]
plant [[2 words]] of
potatoes set out a
strawbury bed & []
3 fruit trees was
weary at night [I put
into my Rcd 4 carts]

Saturday


27. My son [[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] arived at 11:15 we were 
glad to see him we rode to [[Oscar Brigham Young|Oscar Youngs]] camp
rode up the canyon Owen killed 9 grouse at two 
shots I had a bad night, Altitude to high for my breathing

Feb 1, 1880
and Enjoyed the best 
of health. when I left sunset I had a severe cold on my Lungs and after 
being 2 days in the Mountains it Entirely left me and although I 
was several Days in the saddle from 8 to 10 hours with the cold 
North wind and snow blowing in my face, I would naturly have 
supposed that I would have frozen yet I did not suffer but vary little
with the cold which seemed remarkable to me considering my
age having passed through seventy ^three^ winters. On my arival at 
[FIGURE] I had a package of 18 letters awaiting me from [[George Reynolds|Georg Reynolds]]
[[John Jaques|J Jaques]], [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry A Woodruff]], [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|M F Farnsworth]], [[James Godson Bleak|J G Bleak]], [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J McAllister]]
[[David Henry Cannon|D H Cannon]], [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]], [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]], [[Leonard John Nuttall|L. J. Nuttall]], [[Warren M. Johnson|Warren M
Johnson]], [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] & [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] 2, [[Heber John Thompson|Heber L Thompson]], [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenney]], 
[[Reddin Alexander Allred|R Alread]], & [[Samuel E. Lewis|Samuel E Lewis]], which I read with much interest
I attended the Evening meeting at [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]], and had 4 letters read from 
Brs Reynolds, McAllister, Bleak & Farnsworth I also addressed 
the saints and spoke plain unto them concerning the signs of the times 25 Miles

Feb 2nd. A cold Morning I spent the day reading & writing I wote a letter 
[FIGURE] to [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]]

3 [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[Samuel E. Lewis|Samuel E Lewis]] it was a cold night

4 I spent the day in writing in my Journal the Revelation given me
in the Mountains. The Thermometer showed the cold 6 degrees below 
0 zero, the coldest morning of the season I spent the Evening in council

5 I attended the fast day meeting and heard the people bear

Thursday


26 June ^1879^ we rode to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] and stoped 
with [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] Snow Flake is a []
place I spent the night Distance 24 Miles
Snow Flake contains 62 families 48 Men 52 women
159 Children, 150 Acres of wheat 150 of Corn had
other vegitables 60 Brood Mares, 60 Horses
13 Mules, 60 Head Oxen 138 Cows 60 Head young 
stock the valley is 1 1/2 Miles long & 1 1/2 wide 
I administered to Sisterly. [FIGURE] I dreamed that
President [[Brigham Young|Young]] was with me while I was setting
out a grape vine

Friday


27 We rode up [[Silver Creek, Apache County, Arizona Territory|silver creek]] on the south side 
6 Miles visited Br [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatches]] Farm it rained 
vary Hard while we were at his house the first 
shower of rain I had been in for a long time
we passed Judge Simpson going up the creek 
we came down on the North side I received 
[FIGURE] 2 letters from [[John Jaques|J Jaques]] & [[Moses Thatcher|M 
Thatcher]] Br [[John Jaques|Jaques]] informed me that [[Emeline Amanda Young Mackintosh Crosbie|Emeline A Young 
Mackintosh Crosby]] The Daughter of 
President [[Brigham Young|Young]] & [[Emeline Free Young|Emeline Young]] had Entered 
suit in the Court against the Administrators 
[FIGURE] of President Ygs Esstate & the Trustee in 
trust & others to get Back all  the property that
Belonged to the Church which had Been turned
over to the Trustee

Friday


26. We all rode 8 miles up to [[Marcus LeGrand Young|Legrand Youngs]] camp
we found Sister Young vary feeble in poor health

Saturday


27. My son [[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] arived at 11:15 we were 
glad to see him we rode to [[Oscar Brigham Young|Oscar Youngs]] camp
rode up the canyon Owen killed 9 grouse at two 
shots I had a bad night, Altitude to high for my breathing

Sunday


Aug 28th 1892 
[[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] left for home at 7:30. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] & wife
mysel & [[Emma Smith Woodruff|wife]] started for [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] at 11 {o'clok}
rode with team to Kimballs 28 Miles myself & wif 
took cars at kimballs park & President Cannon
went home with his team In 7 1/4 hours G Q drove 
55 miles Owen Drove the same

[L B Logan
Youngs from Ohio
the New Rock
Practiced Carp Culture
$1. send paper
Amery Carp Culture
send slayes 50 M
send Reck N ??
of Not 4x the W Woodruff
Box 321 Salt Lake City
Utah
Withe Reche $150
Ema $300]

Sunday


Aug 28th 1892 
[[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] left for home at 7:30. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] & wife
mysel & [[Emma Smith Woodruff|wife]] started for [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] at 11 {o'clok}
rode with team to Kimballs 28 Miles myself & wif 
took cars at kimballs park & President Cannon
went home with his team In 7 1/4 hours G Q drove 
55 miles Owen Drove the same

Feb 5 1880 [FIGURES] Testimony I spoke a short time I wrote a letter to Presidet [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John
Taylor]] and the Twelve Apostles I gave them an Account of 
the Revelation the Lord gave unto me in the shepherds tent in the 
wilderness and I sent them a copy of the same

6. [FIGURE] I wrote a letter of 18 Pages to [[George Reynolds|Georg Reynolds]] who was in 
Prision giving him an account of my visit in [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] my visit to
the Islata, 7 [[Moquis Pueblos, Arizona Territory|villages]] of Moquis and [[Chief Petone|Petone]] and [[Chief Pedroe|Pedro]], the purchase 
of [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] & my visit to the Mountains

7 [FIGURE] I wrote 5 letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] [[Newton Woodruff, b. 1863|Newton]] [[Mary Woodruff, b. 1867|Mary]], [[Heber John Thompson|Thompson]]
[[John Willard Young|John W. Young]] wife & 2 children arived to day & [[Morten Peder Mortensen|Mortenson]] for a load of flour
This is continued in the next Journal

Feb 8th Sunday I attended meeting at [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]], Apache Co, Arizona
in the forenoon Br Riche Prayed [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] spoke 23 M[inutes], Br Richie 8,
Br [[Morten Peder Mortensen|Mortenson]] 8, W Woodruff 30 M[inutes] {in the power of God}. Afternoon we held
a Meeting at [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]], J W Young spoke 30 M[inutes], We Woodruff
30 M[inutes] we then returned to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] held a meeting in the Evening
Br [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatch]] spoke 20 M[inutes], W Woodruff Br [[Thomas Walter Brookbank|Brookbank]] 25 W Woodruff 30.

9. [FIGURE] I received a letter from Br [[Reddin Alexander Allred|Alread]] I had a room full of company
for council, and a great cry for bread upon evry hand. I wrote 
[FIGURE] 2 letters to R A Alread and [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]], & [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] of 4 pages
spoke of my Mountain visit and Revelation

10 [FIGURE] I wrote to [[Leonard John Nuttall|L J Nuttall]], [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] & [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]].
I had a great Deal of company through through the day

11 [FIGURE] I wrote 7 Letters to day to [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry A Woodruff]], [[Emma Manella Woodruff|Nellie]], [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]], 
[[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]], [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Clara]], [[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]], & [[Winnifred Blanche Woodruff Daynes|Blanch]]. [[John Willard Young|J W Young]] and [[Morten Peder Mortensen|Mortenson]] 
were furnished to day with 4500 lbs of flour & Meal by [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]]
of [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]], to take to [[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moan Copy]], there is a cry for bread in the land

Saturday


28 June 1879 I met at 10 oclok in Snow Flake 
to attend a quarterly Conference at Br [[William Jordan Flake|Flakes]] 
House singing & Prayer By [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Lorenzo H Hatch]] 
WW spoke 10 M[inutes], [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 5M. 
when the various Bishops represented their 
Branches Bishop [[John Hunt, b. 1833|Hunt]] Reported [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]]
Bishop [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Mann]] Represented [[Forest Dale, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Forest Dale]]
Bishop [[Jacob Hamblin|Hamblin]] Represented [[Round Valley, Maricopa County, Arizona Territory|Round Valley]] 
[[James Colegrove Owen|James C. Owens]] Represented [[Bush Valley Fort, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Bush Valley]]
[[Luther Clinton Burnham|L. C Burnham]] spoke of the Lamanites & Savoqin
The Statistical Report of the Stake was then 
Read. Jesse N Smith spoke 10 Minuts 
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 15 M.
Afternoon Prayer By Br [[George Lake|Lake]] The 
Authorities of the Church was then presented 
and Accepted o Br [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] spok 25 M 
several Missionaries were then called
^Br [[George Lake|Lake]] spoke 25 M[inutes]^ 
WW spoke 35 M[inutes], L Haws 17M,
[[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 5 M[inutes].

Sunday


June 29 Sunday we Met at 10 oclok
Br [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Mann]] opened By Prayer 5 more
Missionaries were then Called
WW then read the 3 121 section in the D.C. 
& 130 sec 15 to 21 verse & spoke one hour 
and 20 M[inutes], & [[John Oaky|John Oakey]] 35 M[inutes].

Sunday


Aug 28th 1892 
[[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] left for home at 7:30. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] & wife
mysel & [[Emma Smith Woodruff|wife]] started for [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] at 11 {o'clok}
rode with team to Kimballs 28 Miles myself & wif 
took cars at kimballs park & President Cannon
went home with his team In 7 1/4 hours G Q drove 
55 miles Owen Drove the same

Sunday


30 Sunday I attended Meeting at 2 oclok. [[Charles William Penrose|C W Penrose]] 
spoke 1 Hour & 24 M[inutes] on the subject of [[Patriarchal Order of Marriage|Patriarchal order of Marriage]]


March 30, 1884
[[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] followed spoke 11 M[inutes]. I attended Meeting in the Evening
at the 20 ward Meeting House & spoke one Hour

Monday


31 [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from [[Melinda Woodruff Hatch|Malinda Hatch]] & [[Andrew S. Gibbons|A. S. Gibbons]] 
I met with the Presidency and Twelve at 11 oclok to take 
into consideration any business for the conference I met 
with Br Nicholsons class of young men I heard some half
a dozen of the young Men speak upon the first principles
of the gospel they spoke vary well. I addressed them a short time

Tuesday


Aprail 1, 1884 [FIGURE] [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]] received a vary Excellent 
letter from [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H. S Eldridge]] concerning his Labor in the 
coop and presented him with a purse of $100 dollars in gold 
In company with [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] I visited [[Heber Jeddy Grant|Heber J Grant]] 
And [[priesthood blessing|Administered]] to him And I feel thankful to say 
He is Better to day

Wednesday


2 [FIGURES] [[Miles Park Romney|Miles P Romney]] Arived this Morning from 
[[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] As a Messenger. The Jews Gentiles & Mexicans 
have commenced Making our Brethren Jumping 
our land and quite a Number of our Brethren have 
been arested

[FIGURES] I Attended Mrs [[Adela Juana Maria Patti|Adelina Patti]] singing last 
night in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|big Tabernacle]] there was supposed to 
be nearly 7000 people the recepts were $9950. she
is counted the greatest singer in the world

Thursday


3 I met with the Presidency and Twelve in council

Friday


4 Aprail we commenced our fifty fourth Annual con- 
[FIGURES] ference to day at 10 oclok. President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] spok
15 M[inutes], [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 37 M[inutes], [[Francis Marion Lyman|F M Lyman]] 26. Afternoon 
Prayer By [[Lorenzo Snow|L Snow]] [[Moses Thatcher|M. Thatcher]] spoke 30 M[inutes] [[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] 30 m[inutes]


Aprail 4, 1884
[[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richard]] spoke 32 M[inutes]. [[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo Snow]] 27 M[inutes] [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] 18

Saturday


18 5. Met at 10. President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] made a few remarks [[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo 
Snow]] then spoke 27 M[inutes], [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brigham Young]] 18 M[inutes] [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] 
34 Minuts President [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] then read the List 
of Missionaries some 80 in Number [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel H Woodruff]]
among the Number. Afternoon [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] Prayed.

Sunday


May 13 I met with [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q C]] 
& [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Rs]] at Asahels to prepare
the Prayer for the Dedication
of the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] We also Blessd
[[Ovando Collins Beebe|Ovando]] & [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Claras]] Daughter
[[Vedi Clare Beebe Byer|Idi Clare Beebe]] at 
9 oclok I rode to the RR
at Mousley street
[] at 10 oclk was
G Q C [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Y]] [[Francis Marion Lyman|F M L]] [[Charles Henry Wilckin|C H
Wilcken]] [over] G [Rynold] with
[on loan of a spent sum]
& rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] 95 M
G Q C & [Rynolds] slept at
Broth [[George Teasdale|Teasdales]] for the night

Monday


14 we spent the day at 
Broth [[George Teasdale|Teasdales]]

Thursday


8 In company with Presidents [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] & 
[[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] [[Don Carlos Smith, b. 1816|Don Carloss Smith]] the Architect & [[John Rex Winder|J R Winder]] 
we visited the [[Salt Lake City Temple, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Temple]] from top to Bottom & found the 
work in a good State of Progression. I received 3 letters
I visited [[Phebe Carter Scholes Saville|Phebe C Scholes]] My Grand Daughter in V
Street I found her quite sick with the Cholery Morbus had 
been sick several Days I then Drove to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 
then in company with [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]] I drove to our place 
at [[Wasatch, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|wasatch]] & spent the night 20 Mils

Friday


9. [[Nephi William Clayton|Nephi Clayton]] called upon us at [[Granite, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Granite]] & spent 
the day & returned in the Evening

Saturday


10. My team came up to day we put down on the 
Dining Room floor a plank & 4 studing to hold 
up the roof from a heavy body of snow in the 
winter we then packed up Every thing we wished 
to take home & loaded into the waggon we then locked
up the rooms & returned home to Farmers ward 20 M[iles].

Feb 12 [FIGURE] I wrote 4 letters to [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]], [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] & [[John Jaques|Jaques]]
Br [[Sextus E. Johnson|Sextus Johnson]] arived today with his sheep and g[o]ats
we held a Meeting in the Evening a good many spoke [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 
spoke [[John Willard Young|J W Young]] & W Woodruff spoke on the United Order and
the great responsiblity of the Apostles and Elders. I advised 
Br Johnson to go to [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] with his sheep, & cashamer goats
about 30 of his goats broak through the Ice and was drowned
while crossing the [[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|Colorado]] at the ferry

13. [FIGURE] I wrote 3 letters to [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia]] & [[Phebe Carter Scholes Saville|Phebe Scholes]] I
sent Susan $2. I spent the Evening in council

14 [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|Ilus ofF Carter]] of 12 Pages giving
him an Account of my travels in [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] and visiting the Indians

15 Sunday I met the people at [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] at 10.30 [[Warren R. Tenney|Warren Tenney]] prayed 
W. Woodruff spoke 45 M[inutes] Bishop Johnson 20 Afternoon we went 
to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]] spoke 30, Bishop Johnson 28 WW. 20 
we held a meeting at Sunset in the Evening John W Young spoke 
60 M[inutes] on the manner of living, and the word of wisdom WW 20 m[inutes]

16 [FIGURES] I wrote all day on [[Ezra Carter, b. 1804|Ezra Carter]] letter [[John Willard Young|J W Young]]
went to [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] I wrote untill one oclok at night Ezra Carter
letter contained 29 pages I gave him a History of my last years
work among the Lamanites Purchase of the Ferry and of [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]]
travels in the Mountains My views of Government the political
tirade against the Mormons the corruption of the government 
I bore my testimony to him of the gospel and the Law of the Patriarch
order of Marriage. I also spoke of Father [[Ezra Carter, b. 1773|Carters]] family

17 [FIGURES] I received 2 letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J. D. T. McAllister]] and
[[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|F M Farnsworth]]. I wrote 4 letters to day to McAllister, [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] 
Farnsworth and [[James McClellan|James McClellin]] I mailed one regestered 
letter [[Ezra Carter, b. 1804|Ezra Carters]] letter of 29 pages spokek strong upon the family

18 I spent the day reading and writing Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]] arived
to day we held a council in the Evening

19 we received more communication from the land com-
missioners.

June 29, 1879
Afternoon [[Jeremiah Hatch|Jeremiah Hatch]] spoke 56 M[inutes], 
WW spoke 10 M[inutes] on the sacramet
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 13 M, [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 10 M[inutes]
At the close of the Meeting we met at 
the House of Jesse N Smith WW Ordained 
One Bishop 2 High Priests, 2 Councillors 
set apart 2 Missioneries to the Lamanites 
I administered to 3 sick

Monday


June 30. we drove to [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] 25 Miles 
we visited the [[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|River]] to see about putting in a 
Dam to take the water out Br Tenney rec
ommended a Circular dam each End to 
rest against a lodge of Rocks which stood on
Each shore [FIGURE]

Tuesday


July 1, 1879 We drove to [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] 25 M
we Met in the Evening for Public prayer 
WW set apart [[William Coleman Allen|Wm Coleman Allen]] as first 
Councillor to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & [[John Bushman|John Bushman]]
his 2d Councillor we administered to 2 sick
[FIGURE] I received 14 Letters from the following persons 
[[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah A Woodruff]] [[Julia Spencer Woodruff|Julia Spencer]] [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 
[[David Patten Woodruff|David]] [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] & [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma Woodruff]] [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] 2, 
Sorrensen 2 J G Black 2 Henry Woodruff & 
[[John Jaques|J Jaques]] 2 Most of the Letters had been
detained at [[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moan Copy]]

The Statistical Report was then read and found as follows 
Grand Total 3 First Presidency, 10 Apostles, 68 Patriarchs 
4447 Seventies, 3413 [[High Priests|High Priests]], 12318 Elders, 1636 Priests
1792 Teachers, 5022 Deacons, 67774 Members, 96383 
Officers and Members, 41490 Children under 8 years of age
Total of Souls 137,873. Families 24758 Marriages 572 
Births Males 1404, Births Females 1335, Children Blessed 2673, 
Baptized New Members 635, Baptized Children 1190. 
Deaths Males 390, Deaths Females 462 Individuals drawing 
support 1403. The report of the Primary showed 6095
Members. The report of the [[Relief Society|Relief Society]] showed they had
31912 Bushels of wheat on hand. The report of the 
[[Sabbath school|Sabbath School]] shows 6583 officers Members 40005 Members
Total officers & Members 46587. At the close of reading the
Reports W. Woodruff spoke 20 M[inutes] G Q Cannon 14 M[inutes]
John Taylor 18 M[inutes]. I attended the [[Sunday school|Sunday school]] union in the Evening

till 9 oclok we then
took waggons &drove
through the canyon &
on to Manti we
came neer [hungry] over
in the dark get out
of the Road we arrd
at Manti at 4 ck
quite cold get warm
& went to bed 40 Miles
slept in the Temple

Tuesday


15 We took Breakfast 
& Met with [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAl]]
& [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] we visited the
whole [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] from Fo
nt to Roof I was 
quite weary I met with
a Number of the Brothrn
I was not well did not sleep



[words written up the side]

Saturday


10. My team came up to day we put down on the 
Dining Room floor a plank & 4 studing to hold 
up the roof from a heavy body of snow in the 
winter we then packed up Every thing we wished 
to take home & loaded into the waggon we then locked
up the rooms & returned home to Farmers ward 20 M[iles].

[Union wagon
1st South St
Car to 5th West
or Agricultural
Park
17 West to the Lake
18 West to Clara]

Feb 19, 1880 I went to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] with Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] to 
examine Br [[William Hinton Crawford|Crawford']] child who had a tumour on the head 
appeared like a leakage from the brain. [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] returned 
from [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] I wrote a letter to Bichardsishop [[Joseph Hill Richards|Joseph Richards]] 
[FIGURE] asking the missionaries to return to their claims I also wrote 
[[Reddin Alexander Allred|R A Alread]]. I also wrote a Recommend for A. M Tenney
to deal out the Land

20 In company with [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] we rode west to Grand Gulch Feb 20 1880
and camped for the night with the heard[m]en in a cave in the Mountains
the cave was 25 feet long & 10 feet wide. we made our fire in the mouth 
we saw Panther tracts near the cave 25 Miles

21 we mounted our horses in the Morning to go out to have a hunt 
for Antelope we saw several heard but did not get near Enough to kill 20 M[iles]

22 ^{Sunday}^ We left the gulch and drove 12 miles further up the mountain it 
^was^ near bear ground & soft and hard drawing a waggon we camped in the cedars 12
we visited a crack in the Earth 100 yards long & 20 feet wide at the
top & 10 feet wide lower down it was supposed that no bottom could 
be found but on the 2nd visit by the aid of glasses we could [see] sbottom but
it diped from South to North at an angle of 45 degrees was 
probably 500 feet deep

23 We rode up a canyon 2 miles & back it was vary muddy we returned 
to campe 15 Miles

24 we drove to the big Gulch. we took our waggon down the steepest
Mountain I ever descended on wheels we locked both hind wheels and
tied 3 cedar trees to the hind axeltree and then it was all we could do in safety 15 Miles

Wednesday


July 2d 1879
^[FIGURE]^ We drove to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] whare I rcd one Letter ^25 M^
from [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry Woodruff]] {shorthand}
I read my letters & June 21 [Nam + Harret sd]

Thursday


July 3d 1879 Fast day I met with the Saints 
at 10 oclok [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] spoke 5 M[inutes], [[John Bloomfield|John Bloomfield]] 
6 M[inutes], Br [[Jeremiah Hatch|Hatch]] 5 M[inutes], Br Neilson 10 Br 
[[Warren R. Tenney|Warren R Tenney]] 5, [[Charles Ambrose Foster|Charles A Foster]] 7 M[inutes]
Br [[Jesse N. Perkins|Pitkin]] 2M [[Joseph James|Joseph James]] 3 M[inutes], Broth 
Wright 5 M[inutes] [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 15 M[inutes], [[Samuel Jones|Samuel
Jones]] 5M, Br [[William Jordan Flake|Flake]] 8 M[inutes], Lot Smith 5 M[inutes], 
WW spoke 40 M[inutes], & the Meeting closed. Word

Lake 10 M. which Closed the services

7 [FIGURE] I wrote 4 Letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] [[David Patten Woodruff|David]]

9 [FIGURES] I received 4 letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]]

^[FIGURE]^ 25 we drove from the gulch to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|sunset]] I receivd a letter from Br [[Joseph Hill Richards|Richards]]. 25 M[iles]

26. I visited the [Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|river]] & slews. I shot 8 ducks. My hors fell in cross-
ing an Embankment & flung me over his hiead. I got home vary weary 10 M[iles]

27. [FIGURES] I received a letter from Bishop [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelley]]. I wrote
4 Letters to S Roskelley, [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], Bishop [[Joseph Hill Richards|Richards]] & [[Peter J. Christofferson|P J Christofferson]]

28 Conference Met at 10 oclok Prayer By Bishop [[George Lake|Lake]]. W. W. spoke
a few Moments [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]] read a letter from [[George Reynolds|G Reynolds]] to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 
Bishop [[Joseph Hill Richards|Richards]] reported [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]], Bishop [[George Lake|RLake]] reported [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham 
City]], Bishop [[Levi M. Savage|Savage]] reported [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]], [[Andrew S. Gibbons|A S Gibbons]] reported [[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moan Copy]] 
J W Young spoke 35. [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|L Hatch]] dismissed Afternoon Authorities sustained 
Statistical Reports Read & sabbath school L Hatch spoke 20 M[inutes]
Bishop [[Joseph Hill Richards|richards]] spoke 10 M[inutes], [[William Coleman Allen|Wm C Allen]] spoke 10, W Woodruff 35 Minuts

29 Sunday conference Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[Warren R. Tenney|Warren R Tenney]] 
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] spoke 45 W W. 8 M[inutes] Bishop [[George Lake|Lake]] 30, Br [[John Bushman|Bushman]] 12 M[inutes], 
Br [[Samuel Greenleaf Ladd|Ladd]] 12 Afternoon Prayer By [[Andrew S. Gibbons|Andrew S Gibbons]]. Sacrament 
Administered, W. Woodruff spoke one hour & 20 M[inutes], Read the 84 section
of the D & C. exorted the shepherds to feed the flock, Husbands be kind
to your wives, wives to your husbands, Parents to children 
children to Parents, spoke upon the United Order much of the
spirit of the Lord was manifest I received a letter from [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 
& [[Leonard John Nuttall|L John Nuttall]] Asking me to come to April Conference at
[[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] I wrote ^6^ Letters to John Taylor [[John Jaques|J Jakes]] [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W W]] 
[FIGURE] [[John Hunt, b. 1833|John Hunt]] [[Peter J. Christofferson|P J Christofferson]], [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenny]] & [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J D T McAllister]] 
I held a Meeting in the Evening many spoke

[[Sabbath school|Sabbath School]] shows 6583 officers Members 40005 Members
Total officers & Members 46587. At the close of reading the
Reports W. Woodruff spoke 20 M[inutes] G Q Cannon 14 M[inutes]
John Taylor 18 M[inutes]. I attended the [[Sunday school|Sunday school]] union in the Evening

Sunday


Aprail 6, 1884 Sunday The Conference Met at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Big 
Tabernacle]] at 10 oclok. The building crouded to its 
utmost capacity some thousands went away that could
not get standing room in the Building I should Judge 
there was 12000 people present. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] Prayed
[[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] read the report of the Auditing Committee


April 6, 1884
[[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] then spoke 60 M[inutes]. There arived in our midst
this Morning seven Chiefs & Leading Men of the [[Maricopa People|Maricopas]]
and [[Pima People|Pimo's]] lead By Brothers Rogers & Ray had Come some 700
Miles to attend the conference from [[Arizona Territory|Arizonia]] they were reporting
of many thousands of the Lamanits. [[Charoquis Erastus|Cheroquas Erastus]] who
I Baptize ordained a seventy at [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] was one of
them they were much interested in the great [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]]
and congregation. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] spoke 30 M[inutes]
Afternoon prayer By [[William Bowker Preston|Wm B Preston]] I conversed with the
Lamanite Chiefs. The Authorites of the Church were presented
and [[John Whittaker Taylor|John W Taylor]] was presented to fill the vacancy in the
quorum of the Twelve & Wm B Preston was voted to
occupy the place of the [[Presiding Bishop|Prisidid Bishop]] of the Church.
President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] spoke 65 M[inutes].

[[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brm Young]] & [[Francis Marion Lyman|F M Lyman]] 
we then Dismised & the 12
Met Below & discussed [sevl]
Matters Br Arthur Wesley

Dedication of the Temple

Saturday


12 I spent the Day Reading the History of 
France showing the destruction of war

March 1, 1880 I Wilford Woodruff are 73 
yers of age this day. I thank my 
Heavenly Father for the Preservation 
of my life for this long Period and
for his blessings over me. My last birth day was spent
in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] of the Lord in St George. To day I am in [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] 
fort Apache Co Arizona. The people are busy getting up a 
celebration and dinner for me. And I am receiving
many birth day presents from young and old I receivd 
^[FIGURE]^ a letter from Br [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]]. I received a rug from [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham
City]] Sisters containing the word Union Another Rug from 
the Sunset Sisters, One pair of lace home made curtains knit
by hand, A silver large spoon from a Danish sister, Sister
[[Emma Fuller|Fuller]] a nice tidy, Sister [[Margaret Johanna Edwards Haskell|Johannah Haskell]] a large silk Handkerchief
of her Father [[John Jones Edwards|Edwardrs]], A silk Hankerchief from [[Caroline Lemasler|Caroline 
Lemasler]], several Book marks from the young ladies Two 
nice cakes from the Sisters, God Bless our home by Miss 
[[Emma Fuller|Emma Fuller]] Poetry by [[Lizzie Skinner|Lizzie Skinner]], 2 Birthday Cakes 
by [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] Sisters, 1 pair of home made stockings
from the wool by Sister [[Martha Devey Adams|Adams]], about 100 g^u^ests guests sat 
down to the table some poetry composed for the occasion was read
at the Table And a card was presented to me we celebrate thy 
birth day was the motto A company of little girls sang the
song "Papa Come home" The young Ladies sang "do they Pray 
for me at home" I attended a party at Brigham City in 
honor of my Birthday and departure we left about 11 oclok
and returned to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] to spend to spend the night

[[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] then spoke 60 M[inutes]. There arived in our midst

Tuesday


8 [FIGURE] I met in council with the Presidency & Twelve {of Fifty}
many subjects were discussed and among others the troubles
in [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]], Arizona. A mob spirit had arizen against
the saints in the place A committee was Appointed to
take the Matter into consideration and Adopt measures
to assist our Brethren in that place the committee con[sis]ted
of W Woodruff, [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]], [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brigham Young]] [[Francis Marion Lyman|F M
Lyman]]. We Met in the Evening at the [[Historian|Historians Office]]
And prepared a report to President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]].

Wednesday


9 I met with the Presidency Twelve & [[stake presidents|Presidents]] of stakes
I had 7 of the [[Maricopa People|Maricopa]] & [[Pima People|Pimo]] Chiefs to dinner with me today


[FIGURES] Aprail 9th 188884
I met in council with the Presidency & Twelve

father John Taylor [[William Bowker Preston|Wm B Preston]] was ordained A

W Hardy]] his first councillor

18 I ^took up the oar^ went up the Creek

fisher I caught 5 [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]] 24
Mr L[ush] 15 I was weary at

Thursday


10 I ordained [[Ferdinand Clark|Ferdinand Clark]] a seventy and
[[set apart|set him apart]] to his mission. I assisted to ordain
another seventy & set him apart for his mission I [[laying on of hands|laid
hands]] upon one woman I spent the night at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 m[iles]

Friday


11 I [[priesthood blessing|administered]] to 1 sick person I went to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] with
[[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]] I parted with my son Asahel for the last time to
day as He was going on his mission I went to the [[Historian|Office]]
and met with the Presidency Twelve & 7 Lamanite
Chiefs & Leading men of the [[Maricopa People|Maricopas]] & [[Pima People|Pimo's]] President
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylors]] talked to them & taught them the gospel they
also gave Each of them a suit of clothes and three
of them a saddle apeace for their Labor in interpeting

Saturday


12 I took cars and rode to [[Tooele, Tooele County, Utah Territory|Tooele]] and spent the night 25 M[iles]
I spent the night with Br [[Francis Marion Lyman|M F Lyman]]

Thursday


19. [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]] took some []
out of his [chim] & we drove
[6 Miles up the Creek and the 
Enlad his City plot as Much
Lands we fish Down I caught
7 Asahel 9 Lindh 8 I was 
vy weary & Some 10 Miles]
19 we staid in [[Young|camp]]

in the Eveg & cold
Owen came up

Friday


20 we lay in [[Young|camp]] [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]] 
went up to the Mill &
got saw dust []
[several Annuds] We Returd
home in the Eveng 15 M

Monday


July 21, 1879
[FIGURE] I wrote to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]] & [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W]]
And to [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] & [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia Scholes]] 
and give them my Address How to send 
I had a Navajoe Chief & Men visited me 
to day talked with them & took them unto
the [Hensel] field to see us cut wheat
with a Reaper ^[[Chief Comiazi|Comiazi]]^ [] his son [[Tenney|Tenney]] with me

Tuesday


22 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[James Godson Bleak|J G. Bleak]]
& wrote to James G Bleak I spent the 
day Reading & writing

Wednesday


23, I shocked up wheat a while in the 
morning spent rest of the day reading

Thursday


24 July 1879 [FIGURE] I crossed the [[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|River]] to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham 
City]] to attend the celebration of the 24, we formed 
at the [[Brigham City Mill, Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Mill]] & Marched to the 
[[Brigham City Bowery, Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Bowery]] at 9 oclok 
servises opened By singing & Prayer By the chaplain 
WW then spoke 35 M. followed by a Dialogue & speech 
By [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 15 M[inutes], Dialogue & speech By
Bishop [[George Lake|Lake]] 8 M[inutes]. Then several Dialogues & the 
Assembly Dismissed by the Chaplain at childrens 
Done in the afternoon & [Adals] in the Eg &
spent the Evg in my Room My Indian 
Boy [[Tenney|Tenney]] left with the other Indians
32 years ago to day I Brought President [[Brigham Young|Yg]] into the [[Great Salt Lake Valley, Utah Territory|valley]] in my Carriage

March 2nd 1880 I arose with the head ake in the morning 
I had a vary busy day in packing up [FIGURE] I Blessed 2 children Br 
Eatons Daughter & Br [[Hubert Roselle Burk|Hubert Allen Burks]] son which I named 
[[Asahel Woodruff Burk|Asahel Woodruff Burk]]. He was born yesterday March 1, my 
Birth day. I administered to 2 who were sick, it seemed 
like going away from home to Pack up to move again

3rd [FIGURE] I parted with all the people in both Forts [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] & [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham
City]], and with Brother [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] and [[Willard Richards Smith|son]] started for [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] 
we drove 40 miles & camped on the bank of the [[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|river]] south of the fort 40 M[iles]

4 we parted with Brothers [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatch]] & [[Hiram Judd|Judd]] and drove to [[Grand Falls, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Grand falls]] 
visited the falls, then passed the [[Black Falls, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Black falls]] traveled over the sandy road 40 M[iles]

Friday


5 we started at 6.30, drove 8 miles took breakfast then drove 15 M[iles] 
to [[Seth Tanner|Seth Tanners]] took dinner then drove 18 mile & camped on the
[[Moenkopi Wash, Arizona Territory|Moancopy wash]] with Br [[Joseph Lehi Foutz|Foutz]] distance of the day 40 Miles

6 We drove 12 miles to [[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moancopy]] took breakfast with Br [[Morten Peder Mortensen|Mortenson]]
we then visited the woollen Factory of [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] we dined
with Sister [[Ann Elizabeth Thompson Christensen|Christena]]. We then drove to [[Willow Springs, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|willow springs]]. 30 M[iles]

7. Sunday we drove to Castle Rock & took breakfast 15 M[iles] we then 
drove 6 miles of cedar and pine to Lime stone tanks watered 
drove 3 miles & camped for the night distance 35 Miles

8 March [FIGURES] This is my wife [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe's]] Birth day 73 yers old 
we drove over the roughtest part of the road in [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] to day

Friday


Oct 8. Meeting at 10 oclok Authorities of the Church 
were presented and sustained

Sunday


13 Sunday I saw [[Amasa Mason Lyman|Amasa M Lymans]] Journals
which He had written for many years. They were
in the Hands of his son [[Francis Marion Lyman|MF FM Lyman]] we Met in the
Meeting House at 10 oclok. It was the first time I was
Ever in the House It has been 16 years since I was last in
this town the Last time I came it was in company with
[[Brigham Young|Brigham Young]], [[Heber Chase Kimball|Heber C Kimball]], [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]], [[George Albert Smith|G. A. Smith]]
[[Ezra Taft Benson|Ezra T. Benson]] & Bishop [[John Rowberry|John Rowbery]] was presiding


and to day they are all in the [[spirit world|spirit world]] prayer By [[Dennison Emer Harris|D E Harris]] 
W Woodruff spoke 54 M[inutes], [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 40 M[inutes], [[Hugh S. Gowans|Hugh S Gowans]] President
[[Charles L. Ander|Charles L Ander]] 1 councillor [[Thomas M. Lee|Thomas ^M^ Lee]] 2 councillor

Saturday


July 21. Saturday I was quite 
sick in the forenoon with
[D??] 2 loads wt up
to the [[Young|Lodge]] [[Abraham Owen Woodruff|Owen]] made
up in the Eveng with 
[[Ovando Collins Beebe|Ovando Beebe]] & [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Clara]] &
[[Winnifred Blanche Woodruff Daynes|Blanch]] we had a Letter
[shumple] in the Eveng

Sunday


22 Sunday I spent the day
Reedg [night]

Monday


23 I went to the [[Gardo House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Gordo]] 
& spent the day [Left] with
the 12 & [Legrd you
got Telegram for we hoped
the cer Temple wold do
soss] I signed 18 Recommends
25 Letters wrote to Jaques

March 8 1880
we croossed the hogs back and the ferry we spent the night at the
Ferry with Br [[Warren M. Johnson|Warren M Johnson]] distance of the day 26 M[iles]

9 I looked over the ferry Account that had been received we 
drove to [[Badger Creek, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Bager Creek]] & [[Soap Creek, Arizona Territory|Soap Creek]] it was a vary sandy & heavy road 
we had good feed at night. Distance of the day 23 Miles

10 we started at 6 oclok & drove 6 miles through heavy sand to [[Jacobs Pool, Arizona Territory|Jacob 
Pools]] watered at 8.30. 3 years ago to day I was laboring in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] 
at [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] to day I am travelling with [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] through 20 M[iles]
of Heavy sand in [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] between Jacobs Pools in the East 
& Buckskin Mountain in the west we rode up the Buckskin Mountain 
3 miles & camped for the night 35 Miles {total}

11 We crossed the Mountain 12 miles took breakfast and drove to
[[Kanab, Kane County, Utah Territory|Kanab]] one of our Animals Br [[Lot Smith|Lots]] best horse was vary sick
by feeding clean grain without bayer grass we had a good Meeting 40 M[iles]
W Woodruff spoke 40 M[inutes], Lot Smith 20 stoped with Bishop [[William D. Johnson|Johnson]]

12 We found the horse badly foundered this morning and we left 
our team and Br [[David King Udall|David Udal]] furnished us with a team to go
to [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] with. we want Br David Udal for a Bishop to
preside over [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]]. We drove 20 miles to [[Winsor Castle, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|winsor castle]] and 
dined with Br & Sister Emmet. we then drove to Cedar ridge in
a cold driving snow storm we stoped in the Cedars 2 hours

Friday


July 25 1879 [FIGURE] I received a letter to day 
from Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] of [LLL] July 14 And
[FIGURE] Also, had a rool of 8 Letters Brought to me
from [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] which had Been Broaken 
open [] By some P.O. on Mail Comisn
somebody [Els the Enudley Debry Mony]
takes out 50 cts Rolled up & sent to Bghm
City [try were fate of July 6 & 17 one was my]
Letter to Moses Thatch of July 17,
[FIGURE] ^2 letters^ I wrote to J D McAllister and
asked lines to Deut to Asahel Hart
I also wrote to Moses Thatcher

Saturday


26. [FIGURE] I I wrote 2 Letters to [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W]] & [[John Jaques|Jaques]]
[we had to Dirt] to A H

Sunday


27. Sunday I went to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] Meetg Met
10X30 [[Warren R. Tenney|Warren R Tenney]] opened by prayer W W
spoke 38 Minuts [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 30 M[inutes] Br [[George Lake|Lake]] 3 M[inutes]
we Returned & walked down to the field &
looked at the latest peace of wheat Lot Smith
[] 50 Acres of it on [Olg lad A will Evng]
40 bushels to the acre some will go 50.

Monday


28 [FIGURE] I wrote to [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] I spent the day 
reading & writing

Tuesday


29 I rode to [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] & spoke t[o the people in the Evening] ^25 Miles^

5393 [students]
6x9 [?]
Afternoon Prayer By Brother Blackburn [[Lorenzo Snow|L Snow]] spoke
30 M[inutes], [[John Rex Winder|J R Winder]] 5 M[inutes], [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 50 M[inutes].

Aprail 13, 1884
and to day they are all in the [[spirit world|spirit world]] prayer By [[Dennison Emer Harris|D E Harris]] 
W Woodruff spoke 54 M[inutes], [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 40 M[inutes], [[Hugh S. Gowans|Hugh S Gowans]] President
[[Charles L. Ander|Charles L Ander]] 1 councillor [[Thomas M. Lee|Thomas ^M^ Lee]] 2 councillor 
Afternoon [[John Rowberry|John Rowbery]] died Aprail 4, 1884 would 
[FIGURE] John Rowberry died Aprail 4/[18]84 have been 57 in August I Baptized him in 
[[Herefordshire, England|Herefordshire]] in Aprail 1840 when he was 
13 years of age he was born in Aug 14, 1827. He
was buried on the 48 inst And this afternoon
ther laid Before us the body of Mother [[Ann McLeish Gowans|Gowin]] Aged 96 years 
[[Francis Marion Lyman|M F ^m^ Lyman]] spoke 25 M[inutes], G Teasdale 35 W Woodruff
45 M[inutes]. we then followed the body to the grave W Woodruff
offered Prayer at the grave I spent the Evening in looking
over the History of Noted man [[Daniel Lambert|Lambert]] when
He died weighed 728 lbs. [[Elizabeth Ann Clements Sellwood|Elizabeth Ann Selwood]]
Paid me $10 as donation to the [[Salt Lake City Temple, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Temple]] which I delivered
to [[Horace Kimball Whitney|Horace Whitney]] to send her a recept

Tuesday


24 July pioneer Day I wrote
an Address for the [Ametty]

[[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] spok 25 M[inutes] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 54 m[inutes]
Afternoon Prayer By Brother Blackburn [[Lorenzo Snow|L Snow]] spoke
30 M[inutes], [[John Rex Winder|J R Winder]] 5 M[inutes], [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]]

Wednesday


July 30. 1879 I rode to [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]]-25 Miles
and spent the night

Thursday


31. We drove to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] Dined with [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N 
Smith]] Then Drove to Bagley held a Meetg & 
spoke one hour & spent the night at Br [[Jesse N. Perkins|Perkins]] 
Jesse N Smith spoke 15 M[inutes] Distance 27 Miles

Friday


Aug 1. We drove to Shole Creek we there found [that]
Brother Rhead Head, [[Edward Wallace East|E. W. East]] & [[Ebenezar Thayne|Ebenezar Thayne]] 
were all ready to go with [[Chief Petone|Petone]] the Apache 
war Chief & 7 other Indians some 20 Miles on a 
hunt to get Deer & Antilope for their wives & child^ren^
all wished me to go with them And on it was 
a chance to get acquainted with Petone I accepted 
the invitation, we drove 8 Miles & camped. 20 M[iles].

Saturday


Aug 2d [[Chief Petone|Petone]] painted up with Clay and striped
his limbs like an Antilope put on a shirt coold 
like an Antilope then put on an Antilope Head & 
horns on his head was ready for a hunt. He 
wished me to go with him we started out mou-
nted Horsback over the Hills & vallies An Indian
with us soon shot a Deer with 2 yo[un]g fawns one 
fawn was killed the other caught alive. we soon 
saw an Antilope which was shot and Dressed
and put onto the Hor[s]es we then travelled several Miles

12 ^[FIGURE]^ Made a fire & warmed we then drove 10 miles out into the open
plain drove after dark and camped for the night in one of the
coldest most terrific snow storms I was Ever in we set the side
of the carriage to the Northern Blast put the Horses on the other
side and all three of us got into our bed in the waggon and had 
hard work to keep from freezing to death. We had a cask of
water on the side of the waggon and it was frozen through solid
in the morning so that neither we nor our horses had water to drink
untill we found water on the road distance of the day 40 Miles

13 [FIGURE] we arose at 2 oclok fed horses made a fire but we
were so chilled we could not get warm. We started to travel
at 4 oclok we travelled 15 miles to Cottonwood Springs [hotel] & 
got Breakfast we then drove to [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] I met with many 
Friends and a warm reception I drove to Brother [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] 
and found him sick with his old complaint bleeding of the nose
the Artery that goes from the heart passing up the left side of
the nose to the brain had made a side opening and a little exertion
started the Blood and He came near bleeding to death and it
weakened him greatly. I then visited [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] He asked 
me to stoped with him so we did toat the big house and put up for 
the night and glad to get to a stoping place to thaw out 40 Miles

14 Sunday I was introduced to Brother [[Eugene Shopman|Eugene Shopman]] a 
Prusian A vary intelligent man spoke 7 Languages had
lived among the Kings & Princes of [[Europe|Europe]] and the leading
statesmen of America, done a good Deal of surveying on
the Government works was a leading officer in the Prusian
Armey that guarded the Kings Palace On one occasion
He with 10 other officers spiked 300 Prusian Cannon that was
Placed to guard the Kings Palace [[Eugene Shopman|Shopman]] was intruted
by his Mother to do this so they could not fire upon the people who
had gathered in a body to petition the King to give them certain
rights which He had promised thisem His Mother was for the People

Tuesday


^[FIGURE]^ 15 [FIGURE] I wrote 4 Letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] [[Lot Smith|Lot]] & [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 
& [[David King Udall|D K Udall]]

Wednesday


16. I attended council with presidency & Twelve

Thursday


17 [FIGURE] President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] and quite 
a company of men left for the Iron works & [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St 
George]] I went to the field in the Evening to [[priesthood blessing|administer]] 
to the sick [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilfords]] Youngest [[Phoebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Child]] was vary sick
with Pneumonia we administered to it and it began to 
recover I returned from the field this morning 6 m[iles] 
[FIGURE] I preached [[Ethan Pettet|Ethan Pettets]] funeral sermon to day

Friday


Aprail 18, 1884
A cold rainy time I spent a part of the day in the [[Historian|office]]

Saturday


19 I took cars & rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephie]] and attended Meeting at 11 {o'clock} 95 miles 
The bishops made verbal reports I dined with Br [[George Teasdale|Teasdale]] 
Afternoon Statistics read & showed officers & Members 
1941, children 700, Total Souls 2649. [[Charles Roscoe Savage|C R Savage]] spoke 
44 M[inutes]. Afternoon G Teasdale spoke 57 M[inutes] W Woodruff 30.
I attended the primary & spoke to the children I attended
the Priesthood Meeting in the Evening W Woodruff spoke
45 M[inutes] G Teasdale 15 M[inutes] Br [[William Paxman|Paxman]] 15 M[inutes] 217 of the
Priesthood was present

Monday


Oct 10. We met the Priesthood in the upper room of the
[[Salt Lake City Temple, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Temple]] [[Abram Chase Hatch|Abram Hatch]] Prayed [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke 5 M[inutes]
[[John Rex Winder|J R Winder]] read the report of the recepts for the Temple
said it would take $175000.00 to finish the Temple to
say Nothing about furnishing the Temple A subscription was 
then taken up and in 30 minuts $50,000.00 was 
subscribed for the Temple it was then resolved that the
Presidency of the Church should assign to Each stake 
the Amount they should pay It was a vary interesting 
Meeting Bishop [[William Bowker Preston|Preston]] spoke upon Tithing President [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Smith]] 
Cannon & Woodruff spoke vary Plain upon the 
Political situation of [[Utah Territory|Utah]] At the close of the Meeting 
I went to the [[President|office]] & met with the Twelve & many others

and saw a Buck Antilope [[Chief Petone|Petone]] with his Head
dress drew the Buck up to him & He shot him dead
in his tracks He was soon Dressed & Petone had
had [Dressed] Antilope on his horse and as He
had travelled on a run for hours & I had to run
to keep up with him I was in hope He would
go to Camp slower But when He started with
some 350 lbs on his Horse He started in a gallop
which He kept up for Miles untill we reached the
Camp and I arived quite weary having rode
20 Miles & [meatly] on a gallop I remaind the
rest of the day [mully] in Camp Petone went out
again howling as soon as we got our Diner they
killed 5 old ones & 2 young ones

Sunday


3 Sunday [[Chief Petone|Petone]] & Co went out Hunting, I with my 
Brethren remained in Camp & rested. They killed 8
Deer & Antilope. Brother [[William Jordan Flake|Flake]] & [[Joseph Kay|Joseph Kay]] 
arived at our Camp, we held a Meetig in the 
Evening with Petone & his band Brother Flake was 
the Interpeter in Spanish, I Talked to him abot
one hour Concerning the Gospel, the Book of Morm
& our relationship to them. all of which [[Chief Petone|He]] was 
deeply interested in, we had prayers with them 
Night & mornig & prayed the Great Spirit to Bless 
them on their hunt that they might have meat

14 March
His Father a Prusian General & for the King, Shopman obeyed 
his mother instead of the Father & saved the lives of the People
but He with all the officers interested had to instantly flee the
country & come to America. His Father was a rich man and
recast one half of them at his own Expens. Shoppman was 
offered a Pardon if he would return but he does not feel disposed to
He is teaching school at [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]]. I attended a Meeting in
the [[St. George Tabernacle, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] at St George W Woodruff spoke 58 Minutes
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 25. Afternoon sacrament Administered [[Milo Andrus|Milo Andrews]] 
spoke 30 M[inutes] W Woodruff 10, Authorities of the Church presented & 
sustained. [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] spoke One hour & the conference adjourned
I visited a short time [[Daniel Duncan McArthur|D D McArthur]], Pendleton, & [[Jacob Gates|Gates]], and 
spent the Evening with Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] returned to my room & slept

15 [FIGURE] I Telegraphed to President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] & [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W Woodruff]]
I visited the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] with [[David Henry Cannon|D H Cannon]] & [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] I visited
Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] and family I administered to him and
He seemed Better I visited Br Harmon & family and [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]
and family I wrote a letter to [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]] On Business to Phebe,
[[Alice Ann Richards Smith|Allice Ann Smith]] I spent the Evening with [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]]
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & Bleak I sat up untill 1 oclok with Br Bleak lay 
untill 3 oclok in the morning thinking

16 I rode to the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] with [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] and there pairted with
him for the last time I wrote a letter to [[John Jaques|J. Jaques]]. They Baptized to
[FIGURE] day in the font 880 for the dead I attended a Meeting in the
Evening at [[Samuel Brocklebank Hardy|Samuel Hardies]] I spoke 30 M[inutes], and the spirit of the Lord 
was with me we had a good Meeting

17. I spent the day in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] we gave 88 Endowments I sealed 22 
couple at the Altar [[David Henry Cannon|D. H. Cannon]] 2 total 24 sealings. I received a letter
^[FIGURE]^ from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] & [[Mary Woodruff, b. 1867|Mary]] and they write well

18 [FIGURE] I was taken with the influenzia cold on the Lungs and had
a sick night but I went to the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] this morning we gave Endow-
ments to 68 Br [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] sealed 50 couple of my dead friends
W. Woodruff & [[Mary Boomali Eyring|Mary B Eyring]] officiated together for my dead

Monday


Oct 10. We met the Priesthood in the upper room of the
[[Salt Lake City Temple, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Temple]] [[Abram Chase Hatch|Abram Hatch]] Prayed [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke 5 M[inutes]
[[John Rex Winder|J R Winder]] read the report of the recepts for the Temple
said it would take $175000.00 to finish the Temple to
say Nothing about furnishing the Temple A subscription was 
then taken up and in 30 minuts $50,000.00 was 
subscribed for the Temple it was then resolved that the
Presidency of the Church should assign to Each stake 
the Amount they should pay It was a vary interesting 
Meeting Bishop [[William Bowker Preston|Preston]] spoke upon Tithing President [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Smith]] 
Cannon & Woodruff spoke vary Plain upon the 
Political situation of [[Utah Territory|Utah]] At the close of the Meeting 
I went to the [[President|office]] & met with the Twelve & many others

Br [[William Paxman|Paxman]] 15 M[inutes] 217 of the
Priesthood was present

Sunday


20 Sunday I met with the Priesthood or [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]]
in the Morning & gave some instruction. I met with
the [[Sabbath school|sabbath school]] conference in the forenoon a crouded 
House, sacrament administered superintendents
Reported 936 scholars in the stake. W Woodruff spoke
30 M[inutes] [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 30 M[inutes]. Afternoon Prayer By [[Jacob G. Bigler|J Bigler]] 
W Woodruff spoke 45 M[inutes], G Teasdale 25 M[inutes]. I took 
supper with Br [[John Andrews|Andrews]]. I attended Meeting at 7 oclok 
I called upon the People to Testify some near 30 spoke 
W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes] I spent the night with Br Teasdale

Meet for their wives & Children [[Chief Petone|Petone]] wanted me
to go home with him at [[Forest Dale, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Forest Dale]] that I might
talk with [[Chief Pedroe|Pedro]] the Peace Chief I told him I would go

Monday


4. [[Chief Petone|Petone]] & compay started out Hunting on our 
return to [[Show Low, Apache County, Arizona Territory|sholo]] They killed 11 Deer & Antilope &
came into sholo all loaded down The[y] killed in all 
23 old ones & got 4 young Antilope & Deer total 27
And it was a remarkable fact that they killed Evry 
Deer & Antilope they saw on the Hunt I spent 
the night at Brother [[Edward Wallace East|Easts]] 20 Miles


((Petone gave 3 young Mormon Boys the Strongest
Rebuke I Ever heard from an Indian The were
smoaking in the Evening while we was [falling] &
they asked him to smoke He looked them sternly 
in the face and said "No The Great Spirit has told me 
if I would not smoke nor Drink whisky I 
should live 110 years But if I did do it I should
not live long" I said to the Boys you lay that 
rebuke to heart & never set such a rebuke
Example again before an Indian))

Tuesday


5. [FIGURE] I arose this morning at 4 oclok & walked 
up by the side of 2 ponds near Brother [[Edward Wallace East|East]] & spent 
an hour in watching 6 Beavers ketch fish they 
came within 30 feet of me there are vary many
Beaver in these Creeks & ponds

18 [[David Henry Cannon|D H Cannon]] sealed 20 couple single Dead women to me sister
Eyring officiating for my females total 70 sealings for me to day
15 of these wer of the Thompson family I was suffering with 
a severe cold and head ake all day I dined with sister
[[Artemisia Beman Snow|Artemisia Snow]] I also visited Brother [[Eugene Shopman|Shoppmarns]] school
I think He has the best Art of teaching school of any man I
Ever saw, the best reading I Ever heard all read together
ie all of each class together all questions on Grammar are 
answered together I like his manner of Government. I felt sick
all day yet we started at 6 oclok & drove to [[Santa Clara, Washington County, Utah Territory|Santa Clara]] 6 Miles
took supper with Br & Sister McLellan went to Meeting at 8 oclok
E Snow spoke an hour W Woodruff 20 M[inutes], went to the house
soaked my feet and went to bed with a hot stone at my feet &
got some sleep had none the night before. I was quite bad with
cold on my Longs 6 Miles

19 [FIGURE] I felt a little Better this morning I went to the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] the&
spent the day I spoke to the people in the upper room and gave them 
council I had 15 single women sealed to me & 9 couple for the dead
Total 24, Adoptions 16 dead 1 Living 17, Endowments 121, 42 ordinations
43 sealing, 4 children sealed to Parents I was poorly all day

I attended Meeting at 7 oclok 
I called upon the People to Testify some near 30 spoke 
W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes] I spent the night with Br Teasdale

Monday


21 I took cars at 5 oclok and rode to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] 95 miles 
[FIGURE] I received 4 letters and sent 20 circulars to the 
various stakes of the [[Utah Territory|Territory]] for the purpose of calling Men 
to [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] I sent a Telegraph to Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J McAllister]]

Henry Stevenson
Josephine McYeish

Aug 5 1879 [[Chief Petone|Petone]] started Early this morng 
with 7 other Indians, and they packed 23 Dressed 
Deer & Antilope on 8 Horses 14 miles to [[Forest Dale, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Forest Dale]] 
we arived there at 10 clk took dinner that had a 
Meetig with Petone & [[Chief Pedroe|Pedro]] the two Main war
& [Paue] Chiefs of the Apache Nation. Petone 
rehearsed to Pedro all that I had said to him in
the Camp Both were much interested & the spirit
of God seemed to rest upon them. In the Eveng I
held a Meeting with the Saints and Petone []
Pedro Attended & the spirit of the Lord was with us

Wednesday


6. I administered to Sister Hale and parted with 
the two Apache Chiefs. (Joseph Thayne wished
me to say to Peter Hanson of [[Round Valley, Maricopa County, Arizona Territory|Round Valley]] {shorthand}
{shorthand} Nuttall had Jumped there place at Forest Dale)
we drove to [[David Cluff|David Cluffs]] took Dinner walked 
through his fields looked at his corn & vegitables 
then drove to Brother Adares in the forest & held 
a Meeting in the Eveng & spoke one hour & spent the
night I called upon Mr [[Corydon Eliphalet Cooley|Coolley]] during the day
He had a smart squaw for a wife and several children
she was sewing on a Machine I saw his field of 
Barley He thought He would have 150,000 lb of Barley 
in his field 12 Miles

Diptheria
George F Philips
{shorthand} Ogden

March 21 1880
Sunday we drove to [[Washington, Kane County, Utah Territory|washington]] dined with Br [[Charles H. Jones|Jones]] we attended
Meeting at 2 oclok [[Charles Smith|Charles Smith]] Prayeds sacrament administered
W Woodruff spoke 50 M[inutes], [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 45, we then returned home 12 M[iles]

22nd [FIGURE] I wrote 3 letters to [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]], [[John Jaques|Jaques]], & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]

23 I spent most of the day in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] we Baptized 225.
[FIGURES] I had My Great Grand Father ([[Josiah Woodruff, b. 1706|Josiah Medad]]) & [[Sarah Woodford Woodruff|wife]] &
3 Lougess adopted to me to day I gave 2 Anointing to 2 dead women 
to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J. D. T. MAllister]] this is the last day I shall stay in the
Temple upon this visit I attended a Meeting in the Evening at
[[Samuel Brocklebank Hardy|Samuel Hardy's]] several spoke. W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes]. I returned
alone I saw a letter sent to Br [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] from [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]]

24 I called upon several friends I Blessed Sister [[Minerva White Snow|Minerva
Snow]]. I had some conversation with [[Augustus Poore Hardy|Augustus Hardy]] concerning
some men in [[New York|New York]] Br [[Erastus Snow|Snow]] took two teams Brother
[[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] one we loaded up our baggage and drove to [[Leeds, Washington County, Utah Territory|Leeds]] 
and spent the night distance 18 Miles

25 we drove to [[Bellevue, Kane County, Utah Territory|Belview]] and dined with Brother [[Joseph Flitcroft Birch|Birch]]. we
then drove to [[Kanarraville, Iron County, Utah Territory|Kanarrah]] through a gale of sand and and
rain spent the night 28 Miles

26 Ground covered with snow we drove to [[Summit, Iron County, Utah Territory|Summet]] 30 M[iles]
I spent the night with Brother [[Harold James Hallett|Howlet]]

27 We drove to [[Parowan, Iron County, Utah Territory|Parawan]] I stoped with [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] I attended 
the conference I herd the report of the Different Branches and wards
By the Bishops and all the different Quorums & schools
[[James Godson Bleak|J. G. Bleak]] spoke 25 M[inutes], W Woodruff 45 I reproved sin I received
in the Evening the last Letter I sent to the Twelve & Presidency {the revelation}
I sent them I spent the Evening with [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]]
28. Sunday Prayer By [[Joseph Orton|Joseph Orton]] [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] spoke 
one hour & 25 Afternoon [[John E. Dalley|John E Dalley]] Prayed Br [[Daniel Sinclair MacFarlane|McFarlin]]
spoke 28 M[inutes].

Tuesday


22 I spent the day about home

Wednesday


23 I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] with Brother Wilton and spent the
day making fence

Thursday


24 I spent this day Making fence picket & Board fence

Friday


Aprail 25, 1884
I returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] after making fence through the day
[FIGURE] I received 4 letters & 1 telegraph spent the night at home 6 m[iles]

Henry Steveson
Josephine Clawson

Thursday


Aug 7. We Called upon Br [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Mann]] took breakfast 
then drove to [[Show Low, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sholow]] & spent the day with Br 
[[Edward Wallace East|East]] Held a Meeting & spoke about an hour & others 
spoke [FIGURE] I received 5 Letters from [[Erastus Snow|E. Snow]], 8 Miles
[[John Jaques|J Jaques]], [[Moses Thatcher|M Thatcher]], [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] & [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah Woodruff]]

Friday


8. [FIGURE] We drove to [[Daniel Bagley|Bagleys]] then to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] 12 Ms
I wrote 4 Letters 10 pages to [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] gave an outline
up to this [day], wrote to [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] & [[John Jaques|J Jaques]]

Saturday


9. I spent the day reading the D News Had the 
Head ake at night

Sunday


10 Sunday I met a large congregation at 
10 oclok Prayer By [[Jesse N. Perkins|Jesse N Perkins]] WW 
Read the Vision in the D. C. & spoke upon it
65 Minuts Afternoon sacrament Administd 
& 2 confirmed who were Baptized at Noon
WW spoke 42 Mi[nutes] [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 30 M[inutes] 
Br [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatch]] 18 M[inutes]. I took supper with Br [[William Jordan Flake|Fleake]] 
Had conversation with Mr [[James Andrew Stinson|Stinson]] I 
Blessed Sister [[Margaret Cooper West|West]] in the Evg & Administd
to Margaret [Adalads Firls]

Monday


11. [FIGURE] I sent Br [[Erastus Snow|Snows]] Letters to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]] 
[FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 
& council of 14 pages giving an acct of the 
United Order my visit to the Apache Chief 
& Mission to Zunies & Islata's wrote A [Cam]

March 28 1880 The Authorities of the Church were sustained
W Woodruff spoke 50 M[inutes], [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] 15, at the close we drove
to [[Paragonah, Iron County, Utah Territory|Paragoonay]] & held a Meeting [[James Godson Bleak|J G Bleak]] & W Woodruff spoke 
to the Meeting 6 miles

29 We drove to [[Beaver, Beaver County, Utah Territory|Beaver]] stoped with Bishop [[John Riggs Murdock|Murdock]] we
held a meeting [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] spoke one H & 25 M[inutes] on the Church History
W Woodruff 20 M[inutes] 25 Mils

30 We travelled over a rough road through [[Wildcat Canyon, Beaver County, Utah Territory|wild cat canyon]]
to [[Cove Fort, Millard County, Utah Territory|cove creek fort]] and stoped with [[Arza Erastus Hinckley|Arza Hinkley]] 36 Miles

31. we drove to [[Corn Creek, Millard County, Utah Territory|Corn Creek]] Dined & drove to [[Fillmore, Millard County, Utah Territory|Filmore]] and held
a Meeting [[Nephi Pratt|Nephi Pratt]] Prayed W Woodruff spoke 1 H & 10 Minuts 35 m[iles]

April 1. We drove to [[Holden, Millard County, Utah Territory|Holden]] called upon Mother [[Polly Hendrickson Stringham|Stringham]] took
dinner with Br [[William H. Ashley|Wm H Ashley]] we then rode to [[Scipio, Millard County, Utah Territory|sipeo]] got there 
at 8 oclok in the dark & mud I spent the night with [[Daniel Thompson|Daniel Thompson]] 25 Miles

2 I left [[Scipio, Millard County, Utah Territory|sipeo]] at 6 oclok on the Mail buck board to [[Juab County, Utah Territory|Juab]] station
I took dinner with Br [[John E. Wilbeck|John E Wilbeck]] then took cars to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L 
City]] in a snow storm and found my family all well and
was truly glad to meet them once more and found them in the
Enjoyment of Good health after being absent 15 Months 130 Miles

April 3rd [FIGURE] I Paid cash Tithing to Bishop [[Edward Hunter|Hunter]] & got recept
for the same [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] $3.00, [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] $2.00, [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Gohn]] $3.90,
[[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] $5.00, Total $13.90. I met in council with the Twelve & Priesthood Meeting

4 Sunday we met in the new assembly Hall for a two days Meeting
[[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] Prayed [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] spok 6 Minuts W Woodruff 
50 M[inutes], M Thatcher 45. Afternoon House crouded many had to
go away [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D. H. Wells]] Prayed [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]] spoke 50 M[inutes]

Saturday


^26^ [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] planted his potatoes to day

Sunday


267 Sunday I attended Meeting and spoke to the people
44 M[inutes], [[Charles William Penrose|C W Penrose]] 38 M[inutes]

Monday


28 [FIGURE] I spent the forenoon in the [[Historian|office]] I received 4 letters
I held a meeting at 11 oclok with [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] John
[[John Sharp|John Sharp]] [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] & [[John Willard Young|John W. Young]]. We had receivd 
intelligence from [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N. Smith]] that the Ring at [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]]
was trying to rob our People of their homes by trying to
Buy the Rail Road Lands upon which a part of the
Town of St John stands occupied By our people 
We telegraphed to Gen Williamson of [[Washington, D.C., United States|Washington D.C.]] 
who was the General Land agent of those RR Lands 
to Telegraph to Gen Sedgwick not to dispose of those 
Lands untill he received our letter of same date this was 
signed By W. Woodruff John Sharp B Young & J W Young. We 
also sent a letter to Gen Williamson giving him an
account of matters appertaining to it both Letters & Telegraph
copied into my copy Book. In company with J F Smith 
[[Franklin Dewey Richards|F. D. Richards]] B Young & [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H S Eldridge]] we ordained
[[Christian Daniel Fjeldsted|Christian Daniel Fjelstead]] to the office of one of the 
first Seven Presidents of the Seventies W Woodruff was mouth

Tuesday


12 In company with [[Jesse N. Perkins|Jesse N Perkins]] I Rode 
to [[Concho, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Concho]] & spent the night at Br Williams 
they were the ownly Mormon family there 
untill Br [[George Killian|Killions]] and [Cryer lookkin
Blessins families 4 of South 30 M]

Wednesday


13. We Drove to [[Round Valley, Maricopa County, Arizona Territory|Round Valley]] and stoped 
with Br [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] 36 Miles
we saw 5 deer on the road and shot 54
ducks we got 3 of them I found Round Valley 
a vary good place for a settlement of the Saints 
theirs is about 100 souls of the Saints [all total]
& Room for 5000 I think there is many Mexican

Thursday


14. I went up the Creek with Br [[Jacob Hamblin|Hamblin]] 
& [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christoffersen]] I caught 10 trout that 
would Everage about 1/2 lb each it was the 
first water in [[Arizona Territory|Arizonia]] that I had seen 
that Contained trout I was weary at 
night I called upon Br [[Hiram Bigelow|Bigelow]] 
I returned to Br Christoffersen & held a 
Meetg Br [[Jesse N. Perkins|Perkins]] spoke 40 M[inutes] WW 40 
one hour {in the power of God} I had a large congre-
-gation

Friday


15. I rode to East Canyon 
saw about 1000 Acres of Good land that could 
be wattered from a Reservoy that they had

April 4, 1880
[[Charles Coulson Rich|C C Rich]] 20
Orson Pratt said He was Baptized Sept 19, 1830 John Taylor spoke 
6 M[inutes]. We met in the Prayer Circle A Certain Revelation
was discused given to Wilford Woodruff in the Wilderness
of [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] Jan 26 1880 And it was received by the Twelve

April 5. The Twelve met in council at 9 oclock ^&^ in the Assembly
^[FIGURE]^ room at 10 oclok [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] Prayed. [[Brigham Young Jr.|B. Young]] spoke 22 Minuts 
[[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 45 M[inutes], [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] 30. Afternoon Prayer By 
[[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] President [[Joseph Young|Joseph Yuseph Young]] spoke 50 M[inutes].
He will be 83 years of Age on the 7 April. [[Abraham Owen Smoot|A. O. Smoot]] spoke
26 Minuts [[John Van Cott|John Vancott]] 24. I wrote a letter to Bishop [[Daniel Thompson|David Thompson]]

April 6, 1880 The year of Jubilee of the Church of Jesus
[FIGURES] of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints Met at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|large 
Tabernacle]] at 10 oclok. [[Orson Pratt|O Pratt]] opened by Prayer President
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] spoke to the People what He required of them [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]]
spoke 31 M[inutes] Statistics were then read Afternoon Prayer by [[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]]
Territorial Report of the Trustee in Trust was then read [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] spoke
One hour & 6 M[inutes]

April 7. Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D. H. Wells]] [[Levi Ward Hancock|Levi Hancock]] spoke 8 M[inutes]
President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] 6 M[inutes], (Levi Hancock was baptized Oct 1830)
As it was a year of Jubilee $800000 of the perpetual
Emigrating fund was forgiven to the Poor as Debts which they
owed the institution Also $75899.01 of Back Tithing was 
forgiven the Poor 1000 cows was to be given to the widows
& poor & the Church was to furnish 300 of them 5000 sheep
was to be given to the poor & 2000 of them to be furnished by the 
Church. The [[Relief Society|relief society]] of the sisters were to furnish as a 
loan 34000 Bushels of the wheat they had in store for seed to the
poor who needed it but that must be paid Back again and the 
Bishops were held responsible for the return of the same. [[Leonard Wilford Hardy|L W 
Hardy]] spoke upon Tithing 17 M[inutes]. [[Leonard John Nuttall|L. J. Nuttall]] read the Missionary 
[list] [[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] spoke 50 [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 30 M[inutes]. Authorities of the Church 
were then presented and sustained

Tuesday


289 [FIGURES] I received 1 letter to day and wrote 6 Letters 
to [[Oliver G. Snow|O. G. Snow]] [[Thomas Ames|Thomas Ames]] Gen. Williamson to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]
[[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] & [[James Godson Bleak|J. G. Bleak]]. we have cold stormy weather

Wednesday


30 W Woodruff ordained [[Francis Charles Teasdale|Francis Charles Teasdale]] a seventy 
and [[set apart|set apart]] to a Mission to the [[Indian Territory|Indian Territor]] [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] set apart
[[Israel Bale|Israel Bale]] to the same Mission


Aprail 30, 1884
The [[Bannock People|Bannock]] Indian Chief with several others called
upon us to day at the [[Historian|office]] and had a talk with us Br
[[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] gave them an order for a sack of corn
and 300 lb of flour Br [[Franklin Snyder Richards|F S Richards]] [[set apart|set apart]] a woman
to go on a Mission with her husband

Thursday


May 1. [FIGURES] I received 1 Letter from [[Willard Gilbert Smith|W. G. Smith]]
I wrote 5 Letters to W. G. Smith [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel H Woodruff]]
[[Emma Manella Woodruff|Nellie Woodruff]], [[Jesse Tilton Moses|Jesse Moses]] & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]. I spent the night at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 m[iles]

Friday


15 Aug. 1879
commenced to make I then Rode to Br 
[[Hiram Bigelow|Hirams Bigelows]] & spent the night 10 M

Saturday


16. I rode with Br [[Jacob Hamblin|Hamblin]] through [McMaclay]
