to hunt Deer but saw Nothing all day for
game was weary at night Rode 30 Miles

Sunday


17. [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Ammon M Tenney]] arived last 
night We attended Sabbath school this
forenoon Br [[Hiram Bigelow|Bigalow]] presidig at the
close I addressed the children. I met at 2 oclok 
[FIGURE] all the Inhabitants of the Land Mexicans 
Gentiles & Saints a large Assemble I Read 
the vision & spoke one hour and all 
gave good Attentions At the close of the 
Meetig we Met with about 30 Mexicans 
& Br Tenney Read & talked to them 
in spanish about one hour & they seemed 
Much Interested

Monday


18. In company with [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Ammon M 
Tenney]] & [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] we drove to 
[[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] Occupied Entirely by Mexicans 
and a wicked spirit prevailig 2 or 3 seemed 
friendly we took Dinner & drove on 2 Miles
to Br [[Donaciano Gurule|Donaciano Gurule]] A Mexican Brother a good
[FIGURE] Man I ordained him an Elder & his old

April 8 1880
Aprail 8. Conference Met at 10 oclok Prayer by [[Orson Pratt|O Pratt]], [[Lorenzo Snow|L Snow]] 
spoke 18 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 20 {in the power of God} O Pratt 17, & gave a strong 
testimony, [[Charles Coulson Rich|C C Rich]] 11 [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 15 [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] 6 M[inutes]. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 10
[[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] 6 [[Moses Thatcher|M Thatcher]] 6 [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] 17 [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] 17)
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 30 Minuts we then adjourned untill the 6 Oct next 
In the Afternoon I met with the Board of trade in the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Coun-
cil House]] and I listened to the Discussion of the members upon 
various subjects I met in the Evening with the Priesthood 
speeches made by Brother [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 20 M[inutes] E Snow 60 M[inutes]
J Taylor 30 Minutes

April 9 I went to the field in the morning divided the farm, betwen 
[[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] & [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]] I then went to the Council House and assisted
to [[set apart|set apart]] 63 Missionaries to the United States [[Great Britain|great Britain]] 
& [[Europe|Europe]] I was mouth in setting 8 of them. There was
Represented at Our Conference as Saints in [[Utah Territory|Utah]] 111820 souls 
34327 children under 8 years of age

10 I met in the [[City Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City Hall]] in council of the Priesthood organized 
and spent the day, speeches made & council given {[[Council of Fifty|Fifty]]}

11 Sunday took cars to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] with the Brethren met with 
the Stake Organization of the Young Men 40 Miles Prayer by [[Lorin Farr|L. Farr]] reports of the various wards read W Woodruff 
spoke 30 M[inutes]. Afternoon [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] Prayed after which
the officers of the institution was presented and sustained. [[Joseph Alva West|Joseph 
A West]] superintendent, [[Lester Alonzo Herrick|Lester A. Herrick]] & [[Charles Comstock Richards|Charles C Richards]] 
councillors [[Zechariah Ballantine|Zechariah Ballantine]] corresponding secretary
[[Edward H. Anderson|Edward H Anderson]] Recording secretary

Friday


2 [FIGURE] I received 1 Letter I attended the conference in the afternoon
[[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] Prayed. The Elders made a verbal report
[[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] spoke 420 M[inutes], W. Woodruff spoke 5 M[inutes], [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]]
spoke 40 M[inutes]. upon the selling their inherititens [inheritance] W Woodruff
sustained the same I Attended the young Peoples [[Mutual Improvement Association|Mutual
Improvement]] Meeting in the Evening superintendents Male
and female made Reports. Authorities of the Institution
were sustained W Woodruff gave the closing address

Saturday


3 I ordained [[Sandford Alread|Sandford Alread]] a seventy & [[set apart|set
him apart]] for a Mission to the [[Sandwich Islands|Sandwich Islands]]
I attended meeting at 10 oclok. The Bishops continued
their reports [[Angus Munn Cannon|A M Cannon]] spok 25 M[inutes] Afternoon
[[Lorenzo Dow Young|Lorenzo Young]] Prayed. The Bishops continued their reports
[[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] spoke 35 M[inutes], [[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] sp[o]ke 15 M[inutes]
I Attended Meeting in the Evening. The Assembly was
addressed By [[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] [[George Goddard|G Godard]], and
[[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke 30 M[inutes].

Monday


18 Aug 1879 
Blind Father ready for the grave I ordnd an 
High Priest and Blessed him we 
then Rode 8 Miles & Camped 45 Miles
Br Tenney wanted the Saints to buy [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St 
John]] & occupy it

Tuesday


19. we drove 6 Miles & took breakfast 
[FIGURES] we then Drove to the [[Zuni Pueblo, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Zunie village]] 
A village of the Zunie Indians Containg 
about 3000 souls They were quite in the
advance of any others Indians I had seen 
in there buildings & intelligence Br 
[[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] had been there before and
had Baptized sum thig like 115 
[] but there had been a hard
Struggle between them & the Catholicks^s^
and they had a hard struggle the
village was built on a rise of ground the 
Buildings were 3 stories High a part of the 
Building were Entered at small doors at
the Bottom & others went to the roof on
Ladders & Entered the room from the
roof on Ladders We went through the 
Ancient Cathedral Catholic Church {shorthand}?
looked as though it was 500 years old

April 11, 1880
[[John L. Wilson|John L Willson]] Treasurer 
[[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] spoke 43 M[inutes] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 50 M[inutes]. [[Junius Free Wells|Junius Wells]] 15
Joseph A West 12 M[inutes] I held a Meeting in the Evening 2 ward
and spoke an hour on my Lamanite Mission

^[FIGURE]^ 12 I returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] and Attended Council in the Afternoon
and went to the field at night I wrote 2 letters. 46 Miles

13 RI returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] we had a driving snow storm
& the Rail Road Depo Tellegraph Station & Deckers Eating House
all burned to the ground to day I wrote Letters to [[William Freeman|Wm Freeman]]
[FIGURE] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J D T McAllister]] [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] & [[Joseph H. Watkins|Joseph H Watkins]] I visited
Judge [[Elias Smith|Elias Smith]] who was vary sick I administered 
ho [to] him and He was soon better & had a good nights rest

14 We met in council at the [[Endowment House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Endowment House]] and vote was
taken to give 300 bushels of wheat to [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] Tithing office 
it was also voted not to count the donation of the Temple 
with what the laborours obtained from the tithing office that should 
be Extra we discussed the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] and [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti Temple]] affairs

15 We met in council at 2 oclok and Discussed church 
Business Temple &c I spent the night at the field 6 M[iles]

16 I spent the day in the [[Historian|Historian Office]] I Paid $40 tithing 
to day. I corrected one of my sermons

17 I arose this morning & found near a foot of snow on 
the ground we have had a hard winter & Backward spring much snow

[[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] spoke 35 M[inutes], [[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] sp[o]ke 15 M[inutes]
I Attended Meeting in the Evening. The Assembly was
addressed By [[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] [[George Goddard|G Godard]], and
[[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke 30 M[inutes].

Sunday


4 Sunday I attended Meeting at 10 oclok [[Charles William Penrose|C. W. Penrose]]
Prayed. [[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] spoke upon the Money collected
for the [[Logan Temple, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan Temple]] W Woodruff then spoke 30 Min


May 4, 1884
Br Day spoke 5 M[inutes], Br [[William Eddington|Edington]] 16 gave a short history
of the [[high council|High Council]] for Salt Lake Stake [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 10 m[inutes]
Afternoon prayr By [[Milando Merrill Pratt|Milando Pratt]] President John
Taylor spoke 58 M[inutes]. We held a meeting in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|big
Tabernacle]] in the Evening. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke one
Hour & 17 Minuts clothed with much of the [[spirit of God|spirit of God]]

19 It had 2 Bells Hung in the Tower 
and over the pulpit it had some of the 
finest carved work in wood I Ever saw 
of Christ Apostles & Angels We went through 
the [[Zuni Pueblo, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Town]] and for the first time in my
Life I had a view of a specimen of 
the white Indians the Albinos which 
was a woman her Hairs and face & 
limbs were nearly as white as milk 
much whiter than any Americans 
They had some 2000 Acres of Corn that 
looked well without Irrigation we
did not stop long in this place but drove 
[] 5 M and camped for the night 45 M[ile]s

Wednesday


20. We drove to the [[Zuni Pueblo, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Zuni]] farming Village on
Fish Spring We called upon Br
[[Juan Bautista|Juan Boutista]] (John Baptist) the first Man
Baptized of the Zuna Nation By [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A 
M Tenney]] his sons wife was the most
Handsome woman I Ever seen of the 
Indian Nation she had a young Child 
nearly white which I kissed the Mothers
Name was [[Conceptians|Conceptians]] a good woman
I went through their wheat field which 
they were [cully with sickly we visited]

April 17, 1880 I took cars rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] to attend a 2 days Meeting I met 
in the Conference at 2 oclock in the [[Nephi Meeting House, Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Meeting House]] [[Jacob G. Bigler|Jacob Bigler]] Prayed 
W Woodruff spoke one hour & 20 M[inutes] on his visit to the Indians 
I attended a Musical Consert in the Evening 95 Miles

April 18 Sunday we Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[John M. Horne|John M Horne]] 
W Woodruff spoke 70 M[inutes]. on the gospel and Kingdom of God 
Afternoon sacrament Administered [[George Teasdale|George Teasdale]] spoke
upon the Jurisdiction of the [[bishopric|Bishoprick]] as to cutting off trans-
gressors from the Church. I also spoke 20 M[inutes] upon that same
subject I attended the Stake Conference of the young Men
in the Evening & spoke to them 50 M[inutes]. I stoped with Br Teasdale

19 I took cars & returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] I had some 95 Miles 
conversation with Mr Turner upon various subjects I spent
the Evening with Mrs [[Sarah Brackett Carter Foss|Foss]] & family and Brother [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] I [[laying on of hands|laid hands]] on 2 sick

April 20 [FIGURES] I received 2 letters from [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] & [[James Leithead|Leathhead]]
I Paid $50 to [[John Jack|John Jack]] for a Brother at [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] to Emigrate
a woman from [[England|England]] the money was from [[John Vichers|John Vichers]] 
I wrote Letters to [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|L. H. Hatch]] & John W Young I met in council & 
[[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] in the Afternoon A certain Revelation was spoke off 
[[Erastus Snow|Brother]] & Sister [[Artemisia Beman Snow|Snow]] spent a part of the Evening with me & Turner

21 Still cold weather I wrote 7 Letters to [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenney]], [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]]
[FIGURE] & Br [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] also to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] [[Mary Garn Smith|Mary Smith]] Mother 
Johnson & [[George Lake|George Lake]] I also sent him an order for 30 Bushels 
of wheat for Br [[Joseph H. Watkins|Watkins]] of [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] I met in council in the 
Afternoon [FIGURE] {[[Council of Fifty|Fifty]]} at the [[City Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City Hall]] A variety of subjects discussed

22 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[Warren M. Johnson|Warren M Johnson]] & [[John Hunt, b. 1833|John Hunt]]

Monday


May 5th [FIGURES] I received 2 letters from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] and
J W Crosby I wrote Letters to Sarah Sent $10 to [her]
I [[set apart|set apart]] [[Theodore Brandley|Theadore Brandley]] to a Mission to the
Mennonites at [[Minnesota|Minnosota]] & other places Br [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]]
ordained [[Samuel Wittwer|Wittewer]] a seventy and set him apart for
the same Mission. I ordained [[John Robert Tilby|John R. Tilby]] to the office
of A seventy, & set him apart to go on Mission to the
[[Sandwich Islands|Sandwich Islands]]. My Daughter [[Phoebe Arabell Woodruff Moses|Bell]] came home to
day from [[Cottonwood Heights, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Cottonwood]] quite Poorly I [[priesthood blessing|administered]] to her
& she returned. I also ordained [[Leonard John Nuttall Jr.|Leonard John
Nuttall Jr]] to the office of seventy and set him apart
for a Mission to [[United Kingdom|Great Britain]] I had quite an inter-
esting conversation with President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] upon the Iron works

Tuesday


6 I spent most of the day at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] Hung two gates
drew fence posts and done some ploughing

Wednesday


7 May I called upon Brother [[Henry Grow|Grow]] to lay out my
Kitchen I wrote Letters to [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] [[David King Udall|D. K. Udall]]
[FIGURES] [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenney]], [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J McAllister]] I received 2 letters

Thursday


8 [FIGURE] I received 2 letters to day from Br [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] and
[[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] I wrote Letters to [[Robert Lang Campbell|R Campbell]] & [[Joseph Corrodon Kingsbury|Kingsbury]]
[FIGURES] I ordained [[Heber Sutton Goddard|Heber Godard]] to a seventy & [[set apart|set him
apart]] for a Mission to [[England|England]] I met in council yesterday

Wednesday


20 [[2 words]] of the Center of the
Ancient inhabitants one was 300 yards
in circumference. The outside stone wall
standing as 8 feet high Ammon
M Tenney & Robart H Smith did
the Baptizing Br Smith done much
of the Baptizing On the journey today
we saw quite a Number of small
Homes Built in the side of the moun
tains in the caves of the Rocks 70 feet
from the ground as plase of Retreat 
in time of war does ownly large
Enough to crawl us We arived at
Br Tenneys Home at 12 oclock & was
Intoroduced to his two good wives
large Noble women lived together
Happy & contented one had 2 & the
other 5 Children Br [[Luther Clinton Burnham|Burnham]]
from Savoie (Cevolla ^Spanish^) called upon
us & Brought the D News of Aug 6 & 13
giving an Account of the Inprismt of [[George Quayle Cannon|G.Q.C.]]
[[Brigham Young Jr.|B Yo[un]g]] & [[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] through the spleen
of Judge [[Jacob Smith Boreman|Boreman]] I went home with Br
Burnham Red till 2 oclk Distance 26 M[iles]

April 22 1880
I spent the forenoon with the Auditing Committee And Afternoon
in council A Revelation was discussed and Received as the word of the Lord
Many good remarks were made by the Apostles we had a hard 
snow storm and the roads full of slush I spent the Evening at home

23 I spent the fore noon with Auditing Committee. Afternoon in council

24 In company with [[Moses Thatcher|M Thatcher]] I rode in cars to [[Brigham City, Box Elder County, Utah Territory|Brigham City]] 
Dined with Br [[Lorenzo Snow|Snow]] Attended meeting in the Afternoon M Thatcher 
spoke 45 W Woodruff 60 M[inutes]. I took supper with my Daughter [[Phoebe Amelia Woodruff Snow|Phebe]] 
I took cars at 8 oclok arived at [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] at 12 oclok 100 Miles

25 I visited Mrs [[Rebecca Hendricks Watson Roskelley|Roskelley]] she was quite sick I [[priesthood blessing|administered]] to her 
Sunday I attended the [[Sabbath school|sabbath school]] & spoke to the children 30 Minutes 
I met the people at 1 oclok [[Edward Stafford|Edward Stafford]] spoke 45 M[inutes]. W Woodruff
one hour I took supper with Br [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelley]] and Met with the 
people in the Evening and gave them a history of my travels 
among the Lamanites & spoke two Hours

26 I took cars to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] & [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] I met in 100 Miles
council at 2 oclok and the subject of Printing off[ic]e & Paper Mill discussed

27 I spent the forenoon with the Auditing Committe and in the
Afternoon in company with [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C Rich]] & [[Angus Munn Cannon|A M Cannon]]
& [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] and family I went to the [[Sugar House Prison, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Penetentiary]] to visit
Br [[George Reynolds|G Reynolds]] and had a plesant interview with him and a 
report went out that I was taken there by force which alarmed my
family at the field untill I returned & it was contradicted I spent 
the night at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 10 Miles

28 I returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] I spent the fore noon with the Auditing 
Committee, the Afternoon in council upon the power of the [[bishopric|Bishopprick]]

Thursday


Aug 21 [FIGURE] I wrote [BLANK] Letters to [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]]
[[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]] & [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] &c in [[Sugar House Prison, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Utah Pen]] 
we held a Meetg at 2 oclok WW spoke 
50 M[inutes], Br [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] 10 M[inutes], Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] 5 M, 
Br [[Luther Clinton Burnham|Burnham]] 3 M[inutes] We then rode to 
Savoiela 4 Miles we had an Interview
with the Lamanites & spoke to them abt 
one hour Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]] interpeted

Friday


22 [FIGURE] I drew off many names from the
Strong Record which concluded 28687 Names
of the Strong Record the Name I took of
were Woodruff & Thompson Fath & Mother
we left at 12 oclok drove to 25 Miles
[[Aque Frio, Santa Fe County, New Mexico Territory|Aque Frio]] and spent the night

Saturday


23. we left at 6 oclok and drove to the forks 
of the Road the left leads to [[Gallup, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Gallo]] we travelled 
all day through a Desert Country we
Nooned on the [[Rio San Jose, New Mexico Territory|Logoona River]] a large
green Bottom we spent the night at [[McCartys, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Mc
Cartys]] Distance of the day 40 Miles

Sunday


24 Sunday We drove through [[Cubero, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Cuvaro]] 
[FIGURES] a large Mexican Town But half 
of it was in Ruins we then drove to 
the settlement of the Logoonie Indians & spent the 
Night They Called us in & set Before

April 28 1880 I Attended a surprise Party of Bishop [[Thomas Taylor|Thomas Taylor]] of the 
14 ward. I spoke to the People. The presents Presented to Bishop
Taylor was a silver fruit Dish with $40 in cash speeches 
were Made By President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] & others

29 [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]]. I wrote 2 pages concern-
ing my visitation in the wilderness [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] and myself 
[[set apart|set apart]] two missionaries. I [[priesthood blessing|blessed]] one & He the other we set
apart 161 sisters we met in council in the Afternoon and disc-
ussed the Authority of the [[bishopric|Bishopprick]]

30 [FIGURES] I met in council at 10 oclok we had a visit of 
the double African girl with 2 heads 4 arms 4 legs but one body 
which was quite a curiosity I received a letter from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J D T McAllister]] 
I took car in the afternoon & rode to [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] spent the night with [[William Bowker Preston|Preston]] 100 M[iles]

May 1, 1880 Saturday the quarterly conference Met in [[Logan Tabernacle, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan
Tabernacle]] at 10 oclok the House will seat 3000 [[Marriner Wood Merrill|M W. Merrill]]
opened with Prayer W Woodruff spoke 15 M[inutes]. [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H S Eldridge]] 20
[[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] 35 Afternoon Prayer By [[George Lionel Farrell|L. Farrell]], [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] spoke 50 
[[Moses Thatcher|M Thatcher]] 35 M[inutes]. Report of the Donations and Expenditures on 
the [[Logan Temple, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Temple]] Read Total expenditures $219,495.93. Dr [[Oliver Cromwell Ormsby|Ormsby]]
reported the [[Sabbath school|sabbath schools]] 4400 Teachers & schollars. we 
Attended the concert in the Evening which was quite interesting

2 Sunday Met at 10 oclok [[Leonard Wilford Hardy|L W Hardy]] Prayed Authorities of the 
Church were then presented & received [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] spok 1 H[our] & 30 Min 
He read the 20 sec of the [[Doctrine and Covenants|D & C.]] New Edition Afternoon W Woodruff 
spoke 1 H[our] & 35 M[inutes] on his Mission to [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] & [[New Mexico Territory|New Mexico]] 
I met in the Evening with the [[Sabbath school|sabbath school]] and [[Mutual Improvement Association|Mutual 
Improvement Association]] [[Moses Thatcher|M. Thatcher]] & W Woodruff addressed 
the assembly we had a full House & a good time

Sunday


Aug 24 1879
us cake & water & we eat & drank with 
them we called upon the Govornor of the 
place we found them a clean intelligent 
people the women vary handsome 
quite a company gathered together to see 
us we had an interesting talk with the 
Govornor [[Joss Caraido|Joss Caraido]], And the Spiritual 
Advisor [[Lorenzo Coreo|Lorenzo Coreo]] The name of the 
village is [[Mesa Negra, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Masita Negra]] 43 Mile
We found the people vary intelligent
all wanted a Meeting The Govorner 
called the people us Men women & 
children. We opened by singing & prayer
and Brother [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] talked to them 
in spanish for 30 Minuts and the 
spirit of the Lord was with the people and 
when we dismissed an Indian arose and
why not this Meetg stops in this way 
why cannot this good talk he continued 
if the women we weary let them
go home [I not to keep More all than
set down I fast the spirit of God
upon me I talked to them plainly
and taught them principles of the Right]

May 3. We took cars and rode to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S. L. City]] I received 2 letter
[FIGURE] from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] and the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] work at [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]] 
[FIGURES] The council voted to day that the Twelve should receive 
$2000 a year for their services and their support from Jan 1, 1880

4 [FIGURE] I spent the day with the Auditing Commitee and council 
we [[set apart|set apart]] 2 Missionaries I wrote a letter to Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] 
I herd a letter read from Br [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] I am appointed
Chairman of a Committee to descide upon putting up Tower &
and Roof of [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George Temple]]

5 Met in council & [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] with the Twelve had council 
upon many subjects

6 [FIGURE] I wrote 5 letters to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]] [[George Lake|George Lake]] 
[[J. B. Lobert|J B Lobert]] & [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]] I spent the night at the grass [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]]

7. [FIGURE] I returned from the field, the Ice was half an inch thick
at the field this morning with trees in bloom I wrote ^3^ Letters
to Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]], [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], and [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] 6 Miles

8 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]] I wrote 2 letters 
A M Tenney [[Reddin Alexander Allred|R. A. Alred]] in one Envelope kept copy

9 Sunday I came up from the field Attended Meeting ^6M[iles]^
in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] at 2 oclok Br [[Henry William Naisbitt|Nesbeit]] spoke 64 Minuts 
I attended the [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] and went to the Farmers ward 
and spoke to the People 1 H[our] & 30 M[inutes] 6 Miles

10 [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] and wrote 
[FIGURE] a letter to him I called upon [[Heber John Richards|Heber John Richards]] 
{upon a [fleshy] tumor growing up on my back}***

Aug 24, 188179
24 [for I found them capulle of read it
all see and] Deeply interested I felt that we 
could soon Begin to Baptize them

Monday


25 Many of the Lamanites came to us 
Earily in the Morning The [[Joss Caraido|Govorner]] & several
others took breakfast with us We agreed 
on our return to hold another Meetg 
the Men that spoke in Meetg watchd
us to drive to his home & talk all
Night with him [alot] the days of
his forefathers We left & drove [to] over a
Desolate Hilly sandy country to [[Louis Ray|Louis Ray]] 
He drew his water out of a well 165 feet deep 
we staid untill 5 oclok & drove 18 Miles & 
camped on a Barren sand Ridge 43 Miles

Tuesday


26. We drove 6 Miles to [[Atrisco, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Frisco]] on the west 
Side of the [[Rio Grande River, United States|Rio Dell Nort]] we then crossed 
this river into [[Albuquerque, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Albequirke]] containing 
about 3000 Inhabitants comprised of 
Spanish Americans &c I was introduced 
to Judge [[Samuel C. Parks|Parks]] the U.S District Judge 
I visited Many Stores We spent most of the day 
there I Bought a suit of white clothes for 
$3, good hat for $1.25 In company with 
Br [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] we visited the Catholic

May 11 [FIGURE] I received 3 letters from [[George Lake|George Lake]], [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]], and
[[Phoebe Amelia Woodruff Snow|Phebe]] [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to Phebe and McAllister I also
received a letter from [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] I was quite unwell this
forenoon & spent the Afternoon in the [[Historian|office]]

12 [FIGURE] I wrote 3 Letters to [[George Lake|George Lake]], sent him an order 
for his stock paid on the ferry a Letter to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]]
and sent him an Order Paid for stock on ferry
[FIGURE] and for wheat & corn Paid to [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]] $119. I also 
received a letter from [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] saying that Brothe [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelleys]] 
[[Rebecca Hendricks Watson Roskelley|wife]] was dead and wanted me to come to the funeral. I wrote 
to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] saying I had to start in the Morning to [[Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Sanpete]] 
conference

13 I took cars rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] with [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brigham Young]] & [[Catherine Curtis Spencer Young|wife]] and
children Also Br [[William Harrison Folsom|Wm H Folsome]] & [[Harriet Amelia Folsom Young|Amelia Young]] 90 Miles 
I stoped with Br [[George Teasdale|Teasdale]], we met in the Evening at 7:30
E Hardy Prayed B Young 40 M[inutes]. Br Folsome 10, W Woodruff 50.

14 We rode to [[Ephraim, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Ephraim]] & spent the night 33 Miles

15 We Met for a quarterly conference W Woodruff spoke 4 M[inutes].
Br [[John B. Maiben|Mabyan]] read the Temple report receipts from all sources 
to April 1, 1880 $177,766.38 [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] spoke 43 M[inutes] [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 50. 
Afternoon [[Cyrus Hubbard Wheelock|Cyrus Wheelock]] Prayed. The statistical report 
of the stake was read 10512 souls was reported. [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] spoke 10
W Woodruff 50 M[inutes]. A vote was taken that we would not
sustain any store of any kind as a Church institution who would
not Pay thereir tithing

16 I attended the [[Sabbath school|sabbath school]] in the Morning & spoke to the
children 15 M[inutes]. [[Brigham Young Jr.|B Young]] 10. Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]]
W Woodruff spoke 42 M[inutes] [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 55 M[inutes]. At noon we talked with
the [[Spring City, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Spring City]] People about a store.

Tuesday


26 Cathedral Accompanied by an 
Italian priest we went all through
It and the Padra showed us all things 
in it all the Dresses for the priest 
& Deacons some of them Cost $1000 we
were with pure gold thead & wool []
we saw Christ represented at full 
length covered with gauze with his
body garled & 5 Bleeding wounds exposed 
we told the priest we were Mormons
& he took pains to show us all things 
[FIGURE] I sent postall Cards to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 
[[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] & [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|P W]]. Altitude of Albiquk 
5550

Wednesday


27. [FIGURE] We took Breakfast & crossed the 
[[Rio Grande River, United States|Rio Dell Nort]] & travelld over a 
vary sandy road ^to^ [[Isleta Pueblo, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Yslata]] And we 
called upon an old Patriarch of []
Lamanites [then] Brother [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] stoped
with three years ago He was 80 years of
age But quite smal his Name was
[[Juan Reylocero|Juan Reylocero]] He was glad to receave
us He had Been [parsecoted] By the Catholic
Priest Because He had [Reced] a Mormon

May 16, 1880 Sunday
Afternoon we partook 
of the sacramet B Young spoke 45 M[inutes] we then presented the
Authorities of the Church E Snow spoke 20 M[inutes]. We attended
in the Evening the [[YMMIA|Young Mens Mutual]] and [[YLMIA|young Ladies]] we 
had a full house we ordained Br [[John Franklin Allred|Franklin Alread]] to the
Office of [[High Priest|High Priest]] He being President of the young Mens
improvement Association W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes] G Teasdale 30 M[inutes] we then Dismissed. On the face of the outside wall of the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]]
at [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] was 751 feet around the Temple

17 We drove to [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] took dinner with Br [[John B. Maiben|Mabyan]]. We visited
the Stone quiry and the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] walls and went over the
grounds we Met at 2 oclok [[Brigham Young Jr.|B. Young]] spoke 30 M[inutes] [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]]
40 M[inutes] & W Woodruff 10 M[inutes]. We met in the Evening W W spok 20

18 I had an interview with [[Albert Smith|Albert Smith]] Aged 76. I met
with the Brethren in the morning in council we drove to [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]]
and held a Meeting [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] spoke 30 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 40 m[inutes]

19 [FIGURE] we drove to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] while going Down the canyon
our Kingbolt broke droped the fore part of the Box to the ground
Piled us all up on the End board but done vary little harm
Except hindered us 30 Minuts when I arived at Nephi 
I took a special car with [[John Sharp|John Sharp]] to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]]. 110 Mils

20 [FIGURE] I received 6 Letters from Libert [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q 
Cannon]] [[John Willard Young|J W Young]] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J McAllister]] [[James Godson Bleak|J G Bleak]]. I Paid to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John
Taylor]] $80.65 for [[William Milo|Wm Milo]]. And $50 for Another Brother
I conversed with President Taylor upon Many subjects

27 [Cor] He said He did not Care for when
he had done what his conscience told him
was nigh He was satisfied He was a Man of
the Most wealth & influence of any one in
the place He had 9000 sheep, 75 Broad Mares
400 Head of Cows & Oxen, 50 Brood Asses 
and a quantity of Mules & a large ranch 
to keep them on worth $8000 & after Real
Esstate worth $25000 Besised M[an]y Houses
in this village Thire [[Isleta Pueblo, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Ysletas]] cue a
vary stronge people Compared with other
Indians They have kept their Blood
separate from all other tribes & people 
for generations all ther women & girls 
were virtuous and the most reserved people
on Earth they were so afraid of Brothers 
[[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] & [[Robert H. Smith|Smith]] when they came there
years ago they liked to have Stoned to
death but where they [prased] Br Tenny
thoroughly they would let him go any
went to visit them several year ago 
[whare arived when we and to day we herd
kindly read they we vary Clean intelligent
& Industrious & capable of rec[eivin]g any 
principle of Intelligence that any white 
man are and they have some as Hendrae]

May 21, 1880 [FIGURE] I wrote Letters to [[Erastus Snow|E. Snow]] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J McAllister]]
[[James Godson Bleak|J. G. Bleak]] [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|M F Farnsworth]] gave an Account of Affairs at [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]]

22nd [FIGURE] I received one letter from [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] and I spent the
[FIGURES] day in writing my last will and Testiment 6 M[iles]

23 I took cars with Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W]], Sister [[Mary Isabella Hales Horne|Horn]] & [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] 
and rode to [[Farmington, Davis County, Utah Territory|Farmington]] took breakfast with [[Ezra Thompson Clark|Ezra Clark]]
Attended Meeting in the [[Farmington Meeting House, Farmington, Davis County, Utah Territory|Meeting House]] at 10 oclok with the [[YMMIA|young
Men]] & [[YLMIA|young Ladies Mutual association]]. [[William Bell Barton|Wm Barton]] Prayed
Minuts read, & verbar [verbal] reports of both societies given J F
Smith then spoke 30 M[inutes] Afternoon [[Thomas J. Steed|Thomas J Steed]] Prayed
Sacrament Administered and the officers of the [[Mutual Improvement Association|society]] presented
and sustained Mrs [[Mary Isabella Hales Horne|Horn]] spoke 12 M[inutes]. Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|P W Woodruff]] spoke 12
W. Woodruff spoke one hour we took cars & returned home 36 M[iles]

24 I had an interview with [[Charles Chrisman|Charles Chrisman]] concerning 
Salt river country I then went to the [[Historian|office]] & read 3 letters
[FIGURES] from [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenney]] [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & [[Joseph H. Watkins|J H Watkins]] I wrote 2 letters

25 [FIGURE] I wrote letter to [[John Wilbert Irons, b. 1823|John W Irons]] of [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]] [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]]
upon Election & Railroads contracts & other subjects I was in
council with President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] & others. It is still vary cold weather
I attended A meeting with [[Leonard Wilford Hardy|L W Hardy]] in the 9th ward on the
[[Utah Eastern Railroad|Utah Eastern Rail Road]] I spent the night grass lot 6 Mils

26 [FIGURES] I consultied with Miner concerning Entering [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St
John]] He says Enter by Quarter Sections I received a letter
from [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|L Hatch]] I wrote 1 Letter to [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]]
[upside down text]

27 women & girls among them as can be found [{shorthand}?] 
Americas I could Hardly be []
to believe I was visiting an Indian
Race This old [[Juan Reylocero|Patriarch]] gave us a
Room by ourselves brought us [wint]
fruist & Mutton & made us []
He said the Americans had called
Him Wild Man but if they were wild
they were virtuous for Generations in
any Man seduced are of their Wives
or Daughters He was put to death
for that was their Law but s soon
as Christians brought Civilization
& there they brought [Conception]
and would seduce them were
if they could and if they were the [rest]
men to death now for seduction
the Law of Civilization must
kill us for it He was [] a []
Man. There Annual feast come all
tomorrow Here people of all the []
[] Country for 50 Miles was croudg
with town as [[a few words]]
in [] waggon with Horses oxen

May 27, 1880 [FIGURES] I finished my last will & testiment & got it signed today
I wrote 7 Letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]], [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]], [[William Harrison Folsom|Wm
H Fulsome]] asked for the Plan of the Tower to [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George Temple]] wrote
to [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]] to [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] and sent the orders to those who
had Paid Tithing wrote to [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]]

28 In company with Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|P. W. Woodruff]] & [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] I took cars
rode to [[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] & met with the [[Relief Society|releaf society]] at 2 oclok [[Margaret Thompson McMeans Adkins Smoot|Margarett T. 
Smoot]] Priesiding Prayer By G Teasdale W Woodruff spok one hour
G Teasdale 15 M[inutes]. There was a silk Meeting in the Evening I did
not attend we spent the night at Br [[Abraham Owen Smoot|Smoots]] 50 Miles

29 I met in the [[Provo Meeting House, Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Meeting House]] for a 2 days meeting [[Elijah Funk Sheets|E F Sheets]] Prayed
stake statiscics were then read officers & Members of the stake
10431 children under 8, 4542 Total souls 14973. [[George Teasdale|J Teasdale]]
spoke one hour E F Sheets 15 M[inutes]. Afternoon Prayer By [blank]
[[Leonard John Nuttall|L J Nuttall]] spoke one hour & 15 M[inutes] W Woodruff 10 M[inutes]. I met
in the Evening with the [[YMMIA|young Memn]] & [[YLMIA|women mutual]] at the [[Brigham Young Academy, Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Academy]]
[FIGURE] I ordained [[Milton Henry Hardy|Milton Hardy]] to the office of A [[High Priest|High Priest]] as 
He was the superintendent of the young Mens Association of
the [[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] Stake of Zion I spoke to the Assembly one hour and talked 
vary plain to the young people

30 Sunday we Met at 10 oclok [[Leonard Ellsworth Harrington|L E Harrington]] Prayed
W Woodruff spoke one hour & 30 M[inutes], gave a history of his Mission
with the Saints and Lamanites in [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] & [[New Mexico Territory|New Mexico]]

27 Mules Asses for foot when we got
our things into our Room we dedicated
it to God & ourselves I felt thankful that 
the old Gentleman received us so kindly 
He said He had a right to Enjoy his own 
religion & receive his friends and No 
men should take that [] from 
him the priest of the village had
not spoken to him for 3 years []
He had entertaned Brother Tenney & Smith
3 years before but said He did not
come for that None had Ever been 
baptized in this Nation but More
who Br Tenney had [learned] an [
] with were vary friendly []
visited us to [] them []
Mrs [[Paseval Aviela|Paseval Aviela]] A large fine inte
ligent woman with a fine House fine 
carpets I was introduced to her she received 
me kindly set before us Mellons Peaches
Pears & grapes I kissed her youngest Boy 
7 years old a fine lad she seemed much pleased 
called us to [conversation] we then visited 
another Man & wife with a fine house 
and carpets side seats covered with

May 30 1880 Afternoon [Prayer] By [[Benjamin Coombs|B Coombs]] [[Leonard John Nuttall|L J Nuttall]] spoke, 1 H[our] & 20 M[inutes] L E 
Harrington 10 M[inutes] W Woodruff 10. We took cars rode to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]] 50 M[iles]

31. I spent a part of the day in reading letter & in council with 
Br [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] I received 4 Letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]
[FIGURES] [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] & [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] I wrote 2 letters to A M Tenney
& Br Christofferson & went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & spent the night 6 Mils

June 1, 1880. [FIGURES] I received a fLetter from [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|M F Farnsworth]]
[FIGURE] I wrote Letter to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J. McAllister]] and spent the day with the
Auditing Committee in looking over Dr [[John Milton Bernhisel|Bernhisels]] Account

2 [FIGURES] I received a card from [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]]. I wrote 2 letter to
O Jacobson & [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|L H. Hatch]] Met in Council & [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]]

3. [FIGURE] I wrote 4 Letters to [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] [[Brother Pilkins|Pilkins]] [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & [[Joseph F. Richards|J Richards]]

4 I went to the field and spent the day cold Rain & hail

5 [FIGURE] I received 4 Letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelley]],
and Williams on Land at [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfiel]] I received the Temple work for
May in 19880. I wrote one letter to McAllister and received
[FIGURE] one letter from [[Leslie Woodruff Snow|Leslie W Snow]].

6 Sunday I spent the forenoon in the [[Historian|office]] with [[Leonard John Nuttall|L John Nuttall]]. I attended
Meeting in the Afternoon in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] [[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] Prayed W Woodruff
spoke 46 M[inutes]. [[William Taylor|He]] read the last paragrafph of the 12 chapter of [[Ezekiel (OT)|Ezekiel]] 
and refered to 9, 14, & 33 ch of Ezekiel of the fulfillment of 
Prophesy the wicked Destroyed [[Noah (OT)|Noah]], [[Daniel (OT)|Daniel]], & [[Job (OT)|Job]] ownly
saved by their righteousness. The Apostles & Elders [are] watchmen
on the walls of Zion as Ezekiel was.

John R Howard
go on the 20 G Can
Joseph Thonup {shorthand}
{shorthand} wearl
Marshall Philips at City Hall
Louis P Borg 8 need spel
to slets G Q Cann &
A M Canny

[and been close] there of white men

to throw the dust they sweep out of

or street and [] a [] And

& dust of the room being [] then
in [] they are [[3 words]]
Mounds is town to one Nearest
[] our Room were abt 150 yards

June 6, 1880
I met with the 14 ward in the Evening and spoke to the people about an hour

7 [FIGURES] I received 2 letters from Brs [[William Harrison Folsom|Folsome]] & [[Joseph F. Richards|Joseph F Richards]]
I wrote 3 Letters to [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelley]], [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], Wilkonson & [[Oder Jacobson|Jacobson]]

8 [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[Ezra Carter, b. 1804|Ezra Carter]] I spent the day watering tot

9 I returned from the field & Met in council & [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] 6 Mil

10 [FIGURES] I went to the Farmers Ward & Preached the
funal sermon of sister [[Mary Smithies Kimball|Mary Kimball]] daughter of Br [[James Smithies|Smithies]]
and wife of [[Heber Chase Kimball|Heber. C. Kimball]] I received 3 letters to day [[Reddin Alexander Allred|Alread]]
[[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M. Tenney]] & [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]]

11th I went up [[City Creek Canyon, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City Creek]] with my children fishing but the water 
was so high I ownly caught 2 trout I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] at night 15 M[iles].

12 I came from the field, and [[priesthood blessing|administered]] to a sick child

13 [FIGURE] Sunday I wrote 3 Letters, to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]]
& [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A M Tenney]] I advised them all to be united in their Election
I Attended Meeting in the Afternoon [[Alonzo Hazeltine Raleigh|A H Raleigh]] Prayed [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C Rich]] 
spoke 32 M[inutes], [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]] 40 M[inutes] and spoke in the [[power of God|Power of God]]
upon the [[celestial kingdom|Celestial Kingdom]] of God we met in the [[prayer circle|prayer circle]]
I attended Meeting in the 15 ward in the Evening Br Morris prayed
Br Morgan spoke 35 M[inutes]. concerning his southern Mission 
the Monopoly of the Rich & distress of the poor. W Woodruff spoke
one hour & 10 M[inutes] upon his first Mission and [[Fox Islands, Waldo County, Maine|Fox Islands]] and 
the state of the world and the jugdgments of God that await the wicked
[words bleeding through from the other side of the page]

[erect in the City of the new age it hid her
accusinated ten score of years]

Thursday


Aug 28 1879 [FIGURES] A great Day in [[Isleta Pueblo, Bernalillo County, New Mexico Territory|Islatas]] 
the streets were crouded on [early hour]
with Islatas Mexicans & Americans Our Room 
was in the midst of it The feast or wake contin
ued through the day gambling Drinking feasting &c 
we saw the performance of Jimastics the people 
Began to dispers Before sundown but it 
was 10 oclok before they Broake up [were convened]

Friday


^29^ with [[Juan Reylocero|John Raylocero (John King)]] we learned
from him that there were 21 yineyards adjacent
to the village containing 1000 vines to a vineyard 
grapes were ripe & 4 cts lb many of the vineyards
are 60 years old 16 [FIGURE] vines spend are strong
from 2 to 4 feet high and Every vine is [cound]
up with a Mound of Earth in the fall and
uncovered in the fall ^spring^. This people have great
focus of the Rail Road to Bring Bad men to
make them trouble The Rail Road is a tied
to cross at Islatas as that is the ownly rocky
[bollon] & [share] for 400 miles up & Down on
the Reo Dell Nort I had an interesting
conversation with [[Vinein Aviela|Vineen Aveila]] He could
speak good English I gave him an Accnt

June 14, 1880 
^[FIGURE]^ what strange things one will dream when asleep I dreamed
thi morning that Queen [[Victoria of the United Kingdom, b. 1819|Victoria]] had received the gospel
and Been Baptized she appeared vary humble, none of which
is likely to happen in this world. I also thought of Prince [[Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, b. 1819|Albert]]
is Richard or Robert connected with his Name? ({I dreamed that Queen Victoria was sealed to me and she bid me an [holy] thanks. This is not likely to happen.})
[FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[John Willard Young|J W Young]] & [[Reddin Alexander Allred|R A Alread]]

15 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 Letters to A L Woodruff, [[Chicago, Cook County, Illinois|Chicago]] and [[William Draper|Wm
Draper]] I spent the After[noon water]ing Garden

16. [FIGURE] I received 1 Letter and spent the forenoon on Dr [[John Milton Bernhisel|Bernhisel]]
Account. I went to the field in the Evening [[Sarah Delight Stocking Woodruff|Delight]] was sick

17 [FIGURES] I returned from the field wrote 2 letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] and 
[[David Patten Woodruff|David]] I received 3 letters and wrote 1 Letter

18 [FIGURES] I receivd one Letter from Br [[Edward Wallace East|East]] and card from
Graham I commenced writing my English Mission
commencing at [[Far West, Caldwell County, Missouri|Far West]] I spent the Afternoon with Dr [[John Milton Bernhisel|Bernhisel]]

19 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] I wrote a letter
to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] [[Alice Ann Richards Smith|Allice]] & [[Mary Garn Smith|Mary Smith]]. I received a letter from
[[Abraham Owen Smoot|A. O. Smoot]] at [[Honolulu, Kingdom of Hawaii|Honolulu]] I went to the field at night 6 M[iles]

20. Sunday I attended Meeting at the farmers ward and
spoke 67 Minuts followed by [[Azmon Woodruff, b. 1802|Azmon Woodruff]] 30 M[inutes]. I also 
Met in the Evening with the young People. They were addressed 
By Br [[Charles Lambert|Lambert]] [[Joseph Henry Felt|Joseph H Felt]] Mrs Felt another Sister & W Woodruff

[John R Mohan work on Gale
& for Cerh 88 crds $16.00
James H Broth N day 250 $10
cash $5 order $5]

Aug 29 1879 Book of Mormon the ordinan
-ces of the Church And the object of priests
had in keeping the people under their 
dominion He said He would Explain my
teachings to his Father Mother & friends
I Believe Thes [[Isleta People|Islatoras]] with the village
associated with them to Both [[Nephites|Nephites]]
including the [[Josephites|Josephites]], [[Jacobites|Jacobites]] & [[Zoramites|Zoramites]]
they Number 32000 Have 16 distinct
Languages & occupy near 40 villiages
They comprize the Islatus [[Laguna People|Lagoonies]]
& [[Zuni People|Zunies]] mostly in [[New Mexico Territory|New Mexico]] one
small town in [[Texas|Texas]] that speaks the [[Pueblo of Isleta, New Mexico Territory|Islata]] 
Language The 3 sec of the [[Doctrine and Covenants|D.C.]] ##Doctrine and Covenants 3:16-17|16 & 17## verses
says that the Book of Mormon shall Come to
the Nephites Jacobites Josephites & Zoramites
If there is any Nephites in America they
are this people They are far more intelligent
Cleanly & Industrious then the [[Lamanites|Lamanites]]
thay Build good houses Many of thare floor
Carpated their fields of Corn vineyards &
orchards are kept Clean thay parform m[o]r
Labor than Americas at Mormons They
are virtuous and keep their Blood

Jan 21, 1880 [FIGURE]
The longest day in the year I received a card from [[Leslie Woodruff Snow|L W Snow]]
I wrote Letter to [[Margaret Thompson McMeans Adkins Smoot|M. T. Smoot]] [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] card to [[Phoebe Amelia Woodruff Snow|Phebe A Snow]]

22 [FIGURE] I received 1 Letter from [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]], ^&^ [[James Godson Bleak|J G Bleak]] I spent the forenoon 
^[FIGURES]^ in pruning my orchard I have cut down my favorite trees
to day they died last summer for the want of water wrote to [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]]

23 [FIGURES] I received a letter from Br Pilkin of [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] I wrote
2 letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]], ^&^ [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] I went to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] with a company 
of friends to Meet [[George Quayle Cannon|QG Q Cannon]]. He arived at Ogden at the 
same time that we did we spent a few Moments in Ogden 
and then returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] we found Br Cannon well 
and harty 80 Miles

24 [FIGURES] I received a letter from Sister [[Margaret Thompson McMeans Adkins Smoot|Smoot]] and wrote 2 letters 
to Br [[Edward Wallace East|East]] & [[William Carter Staines|Wm C Stains]] I spent the day in writing my
Early History

25, I spent the day in writing my History for the [[Juvenile Instructor|Juvinile 
Instructor]] to publish for a reader for children.

26 [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[William Harrison Folsom|Wm H Folsome]] concerning the Temple

29 distinct from all other Nation & Man
their [minch] are fully Capable of Receig
any principle of the Gospel that the Anglo
Saxion race Can receive, And are vary
peaceable & oposed to war They are far above
any other American Indians I had
Ever visited. I Class the Mosque Navijos
& Apaches with the Lamanite Lemuel-
-ites & Ishmaelites There are many very hard
some women & girls among the Islatas
The last family we parted with at Islata
was Mrs [[Paseval Aviela|Pascal Aveita]] a Noble Mattron 
of about 50 she put us up a nice Box of 
peaches & grapes to take with us we left &
Drove to the forks at the Road & Camp 20 M
I Could not [reachis] compare hand or feet
that I was visiting American Indians
while visiting the Leagoonies on Islatas

Saturday


30. Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] rode his horses this Morning 
6 Miles to water then we drove to the [[Mesa Negra, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Mesa 
Nogra]] village of the Laagoonies and spent the 
Night with a good Nephite family 
By the Name of [[Jose Curaco|Jose]] Joseph They got us a good 
Dinner & treated us vary well 23 Miles

June 27 1880
[FIGURE] This is the anversary of the Death & martidon of the 
Prophet [[Joseph Smith Jr.|Joseph]] & [[Hyrum Smith|Hyram Smith]] who were murdered in 
[[Carthage Jail, Carthage, Hancock County, Illinois|Carthage Jail]] on the 27 day of June 1844, 36 years ago
Sunday I attended Meeting in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] [[Benjamin Franklin Cummings|B F Cummings]] Prayed
and spoke to the People concerning his Mission in Congress
obtaining the Geneology of the Saints and his labors in
[[Washington, D.C., United States|Washington]] He was followed By [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 40 m[inutes]
concerning his Mission in Congress and the [[signs of the times|signs of the 
times]] I attended Meeting in the Evening at the 16 ward
and spoke to the people one hour Followed By [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 15 m[inutes]

28. [FIGURES] I received 2 letters from Mr Woodruff of [[Chicago, Cook County, Illinois|Chicago]]
and [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan C Scholes]] I wrote one letter to Susan and sent 
her $10 to Pay her fare from [[Onawa, Monona County, Iowa|Onawa]] to [[Omaha, Douglas County, Nebraska|Omaha]]

29 I spent the forenoon In President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylors]] [President's Office, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|office]] and the
Afternoon writing

30. [FIGURE] I received 6 letters I met in council in the Afternoon

July 1 [FIGURE] I spent the morning in looking up the Pioneer flags & 
other matters connected with the [[July 24th Celebration|celebration]] of the 24 of July 
I wrote one letter to [[Thomas Bullock|Thomas Bullock]], & 1 to [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|sylvia]] went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]]

2 [FIGURE] Returned from the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] received 1 Letter from [[David Patten Woodruff|David]] 
[FIGURE] I wrote one letter to [[Thomas J. Lutz|T. J. Lutz]] & 1 to David

3, I met in a quarterly Conference at 10 oclok in the Assembly room 
[[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] Prayed Minuts & Statiscties read, 9 Men
were recommended to be ordaind Elders. The Authorities
of the Church were then Presented and sustained, Home 
Missionaries called Joseph E Taylor spoke 16 M[inutes]. [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 
15 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 30, [[Elias Smith|Elias Smith]] 15 M[inutes]. I met in the Evening 
with the compbined companies of [[Mutual Improvement Association|mutual Improvement]], [[Relief Society|Relief
society]] & Primary in the Assembly room and the reports 
of those societies Herdard and speeches made

4 Sunday I met at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|big Tabernacle]] at 10 oclok [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H S Eldridge]] 
spoke 10 M[inutes] Presidet [[Joseph Young|Joseph Young]] 35 M[inutes]. spoke loud & clear 
and plain in the [[spirit of the Lord|spirit of the Lord]] He was born in 1797 
being 83 years of age. [[Millen Atwood|Mellin Atwood]] spoke 35 M[inutes] 
[[George Romney|George Romney]] 10 M[inutes]. Afternoon Prayer By Bishop 
[[James Crane|Crane]]. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] spoke 67 M[inutes]. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 30 Min

Sunday


31. Sunday My Nephite Brothers wer
at my waggon Befor I was out of Bed 
to bid my wanus Deas good Morning 
Our Amegos (Friends) Jose & Maria
Ceraco treated us as kind as they could
have done if They had Been L D Saints
They are such in principle we held a 
Meeting with what people ther was left in 
the Village Neither the Governors nor spiritual
Advisor had returned from the Islata [tent]
If they had Been at home I think we
should have Baptized some of the people
there The Catholic power is very
great over all of there [tules] after
Meeting and getting our Dinner we 
left & passed the Villages of Lagoonia 
Cuvere 
Cuvera Santana & several other Small 
villages and camped at Night at Mr 
MCCarty's He treated us kind 25 M[iles]

Monday


Sept 1. 1879 We started at Day Light 
travelled a few miles took Breakfast we then
Drove to [[Aque Frio, Santa Fe County, New Mexico Territory|Aqua Freo]] (cold spring) the coldest 
water I Ever drank that wer not Ice water
we filled the keg drove to [] & Noon

[[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] Prayed Minuts & Statiscties read, 9 Men
were recommended to be ordaind Elders. The Authorities
of the Church were then Presented and sustained, Home

of those societies Herdard and speeches made

July 4 Sunday I met at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|big Tabernacle]] at 10 oclok [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H S Eldridge]] 
spoke 10 M[inutes] Presidet [[Joseph Young|Joseph Young]] 35 M[inutes]. spoke loud & clear 
and plain in the [[spirit of the Lord|spirit of the Lord]] He was born in 1797

5 July 1880 This day was celebrated in [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] for the [[Independence Day|4th]] 
as that came on Sunday Their was a company formed 
of the U.S. troops from [[Camp Douglas, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Camp Duglass]] with other Displays 
among them a representation of the [[Valley House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Valley House]]. The [[Eli Houston Murray|Govornor]]
Made a speech at the square & fire works on Arsonal Hill 
in the Night but was 10 oclok before they got to work

July 6. [FIGURE] I received 3 letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] ^&^ [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] I wrote
[FIGURE] 2 letters to J McAllister & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] sent her $10, went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]]

7 [FIGURES] I received 1 Letter & wrote 4 letters to [[William Draper|Wm Draper]], [[William D. Johnson|Wm 
Johnson]], [[Oder Jacobson|O. Jacobson]]. I met in council and presented a letter
from [[James Godson Bleak|J G. Bleak]] about the petition of [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George Temple]] the council
left it for me to direct I wrote to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & Bleak to make
the petition of studing & lath & plaster from floor to celing we
met in the big [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] to make arangement for the [[Pioneer Day|24 of July]]

Sept 1 we then drove to Masons & beated 
Horses & talked with him his little son
could talk English I [tathed] with him gave
him good council & told him to call upon
Me at [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] if He Ever come that
we then Drove to Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenneys]] House & spint 
the nights Distance of the day 50

Tuesday


2d I washed & changed clothes & wrote in 
my Journal Had an interview with Br 
Wilson of [[Arkansas|Arkansaw]] on the [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatch]] case 
He said He was satisfied with Br Hatch I wrote
[FIGURE] a letter to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] & council about my Journey 
to the Islatas and sent a list of Names for 
Missionaries to the Lamanites I spent the Evening 
with Br [[Luther Clinton Burnham|Burnham]] [[Ernst Albert Tietjen|Titcham]] & others

Wednesday


3 We left Savoy with Br [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] & wife & child &
Br [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] & Drove through [[Zuni Pueblo, Valencia County, New Mexico Territory|Zuny village]] & 
Nooned & while taking dinner [[Palopeno|Palopeno]] an 
^[FIGURES]^ Aged Indian who had Been Baptized & ordained 
an Elder a Zuny who through the lies of priests 
and others had turned against us & become a persecutor
He came to our camp with several Indian & did 
not know us untill He saw Broth Tenney then it 
seemed as though He would faint But Br Tenney 
shook hands with him invited him & his company

July 8. [FIGURES] some 600 old People from [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] 
most of which were from 70 to 97 years of age all of whom 
took cars on the [[Utah Western Railroad|Utah western R R]] and rode to [[Black Rock, Tooele County, Utah Territory|Black rock]]
on the [[Great Salt Lake, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] for an Excursion Bishop [[Edward Hunter|Edward Hunter]] 87
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 72 & W Woodruff 73, were among the number 
many went in bathing, we had songs & speeches and feasting 
all seemed to Enjoy themselves vary well most of us returned 
on the 2 oclok train I received a letter from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] Distance 34 m[iles]

9 [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[Thomas Bullock|Thomas Bullock]] about the pioneer
flag I also wrote to [[Daniel Tyler|Daniel Tyler]] I spent the day writing History

Saturday


10 I spent the day writing my History of my Mission to [[England|England]]

11 Sunday I returned from my [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & Attended Meeting in 
the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] [[Abram Kimball|Abram Kimball]] Prayed [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] spoke upon 
the first Principles of the Gospel one hour followed By W Woodruff 
30 Minuts. I attended Meeting in the Evening in the 17 ward 
Br Davis spoke 30 M[inutes] W Woodruff 40 Minuts

12 [FIGURES] I received 5 letters & wrote 3 to [[Thomas Stephen Kimball|T. S. Kimball]] [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] 
sent her an order to pay her fare to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] wrote 
to [[John Merrill|John Merrill]] going to [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]]

To take dinner that got off from their Dinkiy
and Came & eat with us & Br Tenney told him who
I was But the Devil was at work with him &
He would not look at me and He got onto
his Donkey & left apparently mad whom He had
got 30 yards the spirit of the Lord Broke him down
He came back to me and took me by the []
& we had a good talk He said the Devil had
Tempted him, but the Lord had sent him there &
He did not know what for But now He knew He
was glad to see me He called me his Father and was
glad I had come He always wanted to be my Friend 
and the friend of our people He was a Changed
man and I was satisfied the Lord sent him to 
me we all parted as good friends and we all 
went our way rejoicing we drove till dark & 
camped distance of the Day 40 M[iles]

Thursday


4. We drove 7 Miles & took Breakfast we then 
Drove over a vary Sandy Road to Br [[Thomas Lacy Greer|Thomas 
Greers]] & spent the night we drove 40 M. 
over a vary Sandy & Hilly Road & our team nearly 
gave out Br Greer was not at home

Friday


5. We blessed Br [[Thomas Lacy Greer|Greers]] [[Margaret Ellen Greer Pulsipher|child]] 10 days old 
then drove to [[Concho Lake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Lake Clancho]] & dined with 
Sister Williams Drove till Dark & camped 30 M[iles]

July 13 1880
[FIGURES] I received 2 letters from [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] and [[Thomas Bullock|Bullock]]
I spent 4 hours at the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Council House]] with President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J. F. Smith]] 
& [[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] in hearing a case of seduction & Adultery
^[FIGURE]^ A man committed Adultery with two married women 
And the Husband of one of the women shot himself ^him^ dead and 
was tryed by a Jury and cleared And a Brother of the two 
Husbands of the two women also committed Adultery with 
the towo women and both of the men who were innocent got 
a Bill of Divorce from their wives it was a vary grieveious
Affair. They all confessed their sins and forgave Each other 
and were to be Baptized for the remission of their sins I
[FIGURE] wrote 1 Letter to Williams on 7 acres of land

14 I spent the forenoon in writing & Afternoon in council I 
[FIGURE] received 2 letters from [[Oder Jacobson|Jacobson]] & [[Thomas Bullock|Bullock]] I spent the Evening in committee

15 [FIGURES] I spent the forenoon in Council I received
1 letter & wrote 1. I attended [[Salt Lake Theater, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Theater]] in the Evening

16 I spent the day in the [[Historian|office]] writing History

17 [FIGURE] I received 4 Letters

18 Sunday I attended Meeting in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] in the Afternoon
I spoke in the Evening to the 4th ward [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] arived from the south

Saturday


6 Sept 1879 Drove 7 Miles to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] & stopd 
with [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] & Spent the day On my
[FIGURES] ^arivial^ I received 32 Letters from [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 1 
[[John Jaques|J Jaques]] 3, [[John Oaky|John Oakly]] 1, [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry Woodruff]] 2,
[[Azmon Woodruff, b. 1802|Azmon Woodruff]] 4, [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 1, [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] 2,
[[James Godson Bleak|James G Bleak]] 6 [[Lucy Bigelow Young|LBY]] 2, Suse Young 2, 
[[Zina Presendia Young Williams Card|Zina William]] 2, [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J D T McAllister]] 2, [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]] 1, 
[[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah W.]] 2, [[Edward Stephenson|Edwd Stephenson]] 1,
[[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|M F Farnsworth]] 1, And He says in his 
Letter that the following is the work in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]]
from 9, Jan 1877 to 27 June 1879 is as follows 
70352 Baptisms, 34903 Endowments, 13159 
Ordinations, 11888 Sealings, Children sealed
to Parents 2072, Adoptions 393 2d Anointing
-875 The Labor for June 1879 Baptisms 3915
Endowments 1315, Ordinations 444, Sealings
651, sealing Children to parents 138, Adoptions 78, 
second Anointings 21. I had conversation with 
Brother [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Smith]] [[John Hunt, b. 1833|Hunt]] & [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] about Br [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Hatch]]
I received a great Deal of News in my Letters
The Devil is terribly stired up against the Church
at the Present time Plains ^[[William Maxwell Evarts|Everets]]^ the secrety of State
is isuing to stop the Emigration By calling on 
other Nations for Help the [Couts Apostles ^are imping the^] 7 M

July 19, 1880
I spent the day in writing the names that are living of
[[Zion|Zions Camp]] and of the Pioneers. Zions Camp first published
in the 14 vol of [[Deseret News|Deseret News]], & Pioneers in [[Salt Lake Daily Herald|salt Lake Daily
Heradld]] of July 4, 1880. I had an interview with [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] 
I attended the Committee Meeting in the Evening

20. [FIGURE] I received two Letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & [[John Brown, b. 1820|John Brown]]
I spent the day in writing & preparing for the [[Pioneer Day|24 of July]]

21 I attended the council in the Afternoon

22 I spent the day in writing & preparing for the [[Pioneer Day|24]]. Attended council

23 I was vary busy in preparing for the [[Pioneer Day|24]] I have attended a Meeting 
of the Committee for the 24 Evry night for a week

[[Pioneer Day|July 24]], 1880 [FIGURES] 
We had the greatest [[July 24th Celebration|celebration]] to day of the Enterance of the
Pioneers into this [[Salt Lake Valley, Utah Territory|valley]] that was Ever held in [[Utah Territory|Utah]] A procession 
of two miles long was prepared at great Expens it passed through 
the streets of the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]], But I cannot give an Account of it in this 
Journal But for the history of the same see [[Deseret News|Deseret News]] July 26 & the
[[Salt Lake Daily Herald|Herrald]] of July 27 it was a vary importand day, an interesting Meeting

25 Sunday I attended Meeting at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] spoke
one hour & 10 M[inutes]. on the history of the Pioneers we had a [[prayer circle|prayer circle]]
and I attended Meeting in the Evening at the 14 ward [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 
preached an hour on the Practical Duties of life the good and
the Evil in our midst

Sunday


Sept 7, 1879 Sunday I spent the forenoon in 
writing & readg I attended Meetg in the Afternoon 
and spoke to a large Assembly including Judge 
[[James Andrew Stinson|Stinson]] spoke one hour the spirit of God was upon
me [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] followed me 25 M. In the
[FIGURE] Eveg I met with J. N. Smith [[Lorenzo Hill Hatch|Lorenzo H
Hatch]] Bishop [[John Hunt, b. 1833|Hunt]] Brother [[Jesse N. Perkins|Jesse N Perkins]] & Tenney 
Br Hunt brought Brought up a long list 
of Accusations against Br Hatch we investigated
them all, and found them all small trifles 
at the close all were forgiven & shook hands 
as good friends

Monday


8 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 Letters to [[John Willard Young|John W Yog]] gave an
Account of my visit to the Islatas I wrote to
[[James Godson Bleak|James G Bleak]] of St George but did
not finds it I helped Br [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Smith]] 
Build his grainery

Tuesday


9 I helped Br [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Smith]] finish his
Grainy He threshed his grains to day
He had 220 Bushels of wheat & no oats 
I went home with Br [[Jesse N. Perkins|Perkins]] 3 M[iles]

Wednesday


10 I Returned to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] 8 M
Spent the day talking & []

Thursday


11 with [[Jesse N. Perkins|Jesse N Perkins]] Rode to [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] 25 M[iles]

July 26 1880
[FIGURES] I saw a painful scene to day Sheriff [[John Wesley Turner|Turner]] of 
[[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] brought in the [[Frederick Hopt|Murderer]] of his [[John Franklin Turner|son]] had Been [to] Cheyenne 
for the Murderer and had to guard both him & his son for days 
without sleep. The Prisioner was delivered over to the [[Sugar House Prison, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Jail]] in
[[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]]. Brother Turner wished me to go down & Preach the 
funeral sermon of his Son at Provo

27 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] with $5 to [[Phoebe Arabell Woodruff Moses|Bell]] 
I sent Papers to [[Ezra Carter, b. 1804|Ezra]] & [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|Ilus Carter]] to [[John Willard Young|J. W. Young]], [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|A. M. Tenney]] 
I wrote a letter to Bell Moses, card to [[Leslie Woodruff Snow|L W Snow]]

28 I took cars to [[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] & Preached the funeral sermon of 
[[John Franklin Turner|John Turner]] the son of [[John Wesley Turner|John Turner]] aged 21 was murdered 
by two men who took his money and team he had with him 
it was a painful scene I returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] 100 Miles

29 [FIGURES] I received 1 letter & 2 cards I wrote 2 cards to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] & [[William Draper|Wm Draper]]

30 [FIGURE] I received 2 letters, and took cars to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] 105 M[iles]

31 I spent the day at [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] was quite weary

Aug 1, Sunday I rode to [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] & Attended Meeting at 10 oclok [[Arthur Stayner|A Stainer]] Prayed [[John Morgan|John Morgan]] spoke 30 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 15 
[[Lorenzo Snow|L Snow]] 15 M[inutes]. At Noon I went to the [[Logan Temple, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Temple]] went to the top of it 
I did not

Friday


Sept 12 1879 We drove to [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] & spent the 
night we held Meeting I spoke one hour I gave 
an acct of my visit to the Nephites Br Perkins
spoke & Br Allen 25 Miles

Saturday


13 We drove to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] & met with Many friends 
I conversed with my friends in the Evg I rec[eived]
[FIGURE] 5 letters 1 from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] 2 from [[John Jaques|Jaques]] & 1 
from [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]. I travelled 42 days 25 Miles

Sunday


14. Sunday I met with the Saints in 
[[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] at 11c & I spoke one hour on
My Journey amg the Lamanites & Nephites 
followed by Brother [[Jesse N. Perkins|Perkins]] & [[Edward Wallace East|East]] Br 
[[George Lake|Lake]] was vary sick He was brought to us
In a carriage we administered to 
him by the Laying on of Hands also upon
3 others I spent the Leasure time talking 
with the Brethren & the Navajoes & wrtg

Monday


15 [FIGURE] I wrote Letters to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] &
Council of 11 pages of Letter paper gave 
him a particular acct of all my travels 
for 42 days amg the Nephites [or]
Islatas I also wrot to [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]] [M]
a letter of 16 pages of Note papers 
givg her an outline of my visit & 
Misen I wrote to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]] & sent all to Sun[set]

Aug. 1, Sunday 1880
I did not like the Internal arangment of it And alterations 
were recommended. Afternoon Sacrament was Administered
[[William Harrison Folsom|Wm H Folsome]] Prayed [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] spoke 70 Minuts [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] 4,
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 20 I returned to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] 16 Miles

2 I rode to [[Richmond, Cache County, Utah Territory|Richmond]] administered to & [[priesthood blessing|Blessed]] Mother [[Drusilla Dorris Hendricks|Hendrick]]
and administered to another sister I then rode to [[Lewiston, Cache County, Utah Territory|Lewiston]] and
examined the country and found a fine country the valley is
15 miles long 6 wide with good sandy loom, quick soil, many
acres of wheat would yield 25 bushels ofto the acre without water
Br [[William Dorris Hendricks|Hendricks]] introduced me to his family He had 3 daughter born 
at one birth 12 years of age fine healthy girls I returned to 
Richmond then to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]], then down to the farm found 10 acres 
of volenteer wheat without water will have to be cut with a 
Mower I returned weary distance of the day 35 Miles

3rd I took cars in company with [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] when I arived home 
I found my Daughter [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan Scholes]] had arived from [[Onawa, Monona County, Iowa|Onawa]] 
with two of her children and in the Evening I had all four 
of [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebes]] children together the first we had all been together for 
twenty years I held a meeting with them in the Evening and 
most all of us spoke and I Prayed with them. I received 
[FIGURES] 3 letters from [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] & [[David Patten Woodruff|David]] 105 Miles

4 [FIGURE] I spent the fore part of the day writing I wrote 3 letters

5 [FIGURE] My Daughter [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah Agusta Woodruff]] Left my house
this morning for a visit East and to attend school, it was quite a
trial to her [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Mother]] she took cars at 7 oclok

Monday


Sept 15 [FIGURE] I finished my letters to
Bleak & McAllister of 10 pages
an Acct of all my travels for 42 days
I [meeded] my letter to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] & 
[[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]] & to Bleak & McAllister

Tuesday


16 [FIGURE] I wrote Letters to [[Emma Manella Woodruff|Emma W]] & 
[[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry Woodruff]] and gave an Accot of 
my mission to the Nephites of 42 days
I ordained [[Charles Edmund Richardson|Charles Edmund Richardson]] 
a seventy and gave him a lisense
I killed 6 ducks in the morg

Wednesday


17. [FIGURE] I wrote 1 Letter of 12 pages 
to [[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] gave an acct 
of my Missions of 42 days amg the Nephites

Thursday


18 I killed 6 ducks got 4. I wrote 
[FIGURE] 3 Letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J D T McAllister]] 4 p[ages] 
[[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] 6 pages Y 4 p.

Friday


19 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to Bishop [[Samuel Roskelley|Samuel Roskelly]] 
6 p & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah W.]] 4 pages I gave an acct of my
Journey & askd them to write to me I visited By
[[George Lake|Lake]] who lies vary low we administered to him

Saturday


20th we went to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] and administered 
to Br [[George Lake|Lake]] who is still vary low

Aug 5, 1880
[FIGURE] I wrote 9 letters to my corresponding friends

6, I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] this morning helped [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] to fix up the 
mower & I went into 3 1/2 acres of heavy wheat tangled 
down & I hoed wheat all day and was vary weary at night 6 m[iles]

7. we finished our peace of wheat in the forenoon & shocked it up
in the Afternoon & returned home weary

8. Sunday I spent the whole day resting Br [[Charles William Penrose|Penrose]] Preached

9. [FIGURES] I received 5 Letters from [[William D. Johnson|W D. Johnson]] and others

10 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters I watered Garden in the afternoon and
went to a circus in the Evening called a grand affair

11. [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[Samuel Roskelley|Roskelley]] & [[Eliza D. Gibbs|Eliza D Gibbs]]

12 I took cars rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] held a Meeting with the [[Relief Society|Relief
society]] & spoke to them 40 M[inutes]. and in the Evening I spoke one hour

13 We drove to [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]] and held a Meeting in the Evening [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 
spoke 25 Minuts W Woodruff 40, the [[spirit of God|spirit of God]] was with us 22 miles

14. We rode to [[Mount Pleasant, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Mount Plesant]] met in conference at 10 oclok 
[[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] Prayed, W. Woodruff spoke 435 M[inutes] statistics wRead
[[Francis Marion Lyman|F M Lyman]] spoke 30 M[inutes].

Sunday


21 Sunday we administered to Br [[George Lake|Lake]] he seemed 
Bettr

Monday


22. I spent the day readg & studyig spanish
I shot 3 ducks

Tuesday


23 [FIGURE] I wrote 1 Letter of 12 pages to 
[[Elias Smith|Elias Smith]] gave a short acct of my visit
amg the Lamanites & Nephites

Thursday


25 We Rode to [[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] spent the night 25 M[iles]

Friday


26. We drove to [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] spent the night with
[[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] I shot 6 Ducks got 4. we had 
a hard rain through the night 25 M[iles]

Saturday


27. It is raing this Mornig Many Brethers 
Came to Conference we met at 10 oclok prayer 
By Bishop [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Man]] [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] spoke 9 M[inutes]. 
The Bishops & Elders then made Their reports of 
Their wards [[James Cowan|James Cowens]] represented 
[[Rush Valley, Tooele County, Utah Territory|Bush Valley]], [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Oscar Mann]] [[Forest Dale, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Forest Dale]], 
[[Peter J. Christofferson|Peter Christoferson]] [[Round Valley, Rich County, Utah Territory|Round Valley]], [[John Hunt, b. 1833|John 
Hunt]] [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]], WW spoke 15 Minuts 
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 35 M[inutes]. Afternoon prayer 
By [[Jesse N. Perkins|Jesse N Perkins]] Lorenzo H Hatch spoke
42 Minuts Jesse N Smith 30 Ms

Aug 14, 1880 There were 10721 souls Reported 
Afternoon M Lyman Prayed Temple statisctics read and 
reported $195,104.85 received. G Teasdale then spok 10 M[inutes] 
[[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 40 M[inutes] and closed in a hard wind & dust storm 
we held a Priesthood Meeting in the Evening [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 
spoke 35 M[inutes] W Woodruff 30 {in the [[power of God|power of God]]}

15 Sunday Met at 10 oclok. [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] spoke one hour & 25 m[inutes]
