The Authorities of the Church was then presented & sustained
Afternoon Sacrament Administered W. W. Prayed [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]]
spoke 50 [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 55 M[inutes] & W Woodruff 10 M[inutes] Exhorts the people
to get up a Record of all their Dead friends so as to be ready 
to work when the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|temple]] was done Adjourned till 13, 14 of Nov

16th Aug 1880 
Rode to [[Ephraim, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Ephraim]] & dined then rode to [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] visited the
[[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] found the Arches over the first story windows turned
looked well we was satisfied with it They ground all the sand
from sand rock we held a meeting at 3 oclok [[Francis Marion Lyman|F M Lyman]]
Prayed [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] spoke 50 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 25, [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 
55 M[inutes]. the [[power of God|Power of God]] was with us in our Testimony 20 M[iles]

17 Rode to [[Fort Ephraim, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Fort Ephraim]] held a Meeting at 10:30 [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 
Prayed W Woodruff spoke 20 M[inutes] [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 45 M[inutes]. [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] 50 m[inutes] 
we dined and went to [[Fountain Green, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Fountain Green]] and took supper 
with [[Noah Thomas Guymon|N T Guyman]] and Preached in the school house to
a crouded House in the [[spirit of the Lord|spirit of the Lord]] 60 M[inutes] G Teasdale 30 M[inutes]

18 We crossed the Mountain to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] & [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 
came from [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]] Left [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]] there we all 
took cars and arived at [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] at 6 oclok 120 Mi 
On my return I received 18 Letters [[Sarah Ingersoll Harvey Floyd Holmes|Sarah I Homes]] said
her Husband [[Jonathan Harriman Holmes|Johnathan H. Holmes]] died Aug 18, 1880 And
[FIGURE] Johnathan Holmes Died Aug 1880 wished me to come and Preach the funeral lsermon

19 I took cars with Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Woodruff]] & rode to [[Centerville, Davis County, Utah Territory|Centerville]] then
took waggon to [[Jonathan Harriman Holmes|Johnathan Holmes]] residence I found his [ [[Sarah Ingersoll Harvey Floyd Holmes|wife]] ] 
in deep Mourning for his death

27 Sept WW spoke 10 Minuts vary plains 
I met in the Eveg with the priesthood & we 
reguated the price of the tithing of this Country

Sunday


28. Sunday I administered to Br [[Thomas Lacy Greer|Greer]] & [Blr
lins] we met at 10 oclok. [[John Bush|John Bush]] prayed 
Reports of the several Branches of this Stake was 
then read By the Clerk [[John R. Hewlett|John R Hewlet]] The General 
Authorities of the Church were then presented 
By Jesse N. Smith. And Local Authorities &
Home Missionaries & Indian [Missionaries ??] 
protected & sustained. WW spoke 50 M.
Br [[Andrew S. Gibbons|Gibbons]] 42 M[inutes], [[John Burnham|John Burnham]] 15 M[inutes].
Afternoon Br [[Oscar Lesley Mann|Mann]] spoke 25 M, [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 
spoke 21, Jesse N Smith 10 M. WW spoke
55 Minuts in the power of God
[[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] chose Br Oscar Mann for 
his second Councillor I ordained him and
set him apart for this office

Monday


29. we parted with our friends & drove to 
[[Woodruff, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Woodruff]] & spent the night 25 M[iles].

Tuesday


30 A plesant Mornig we drove to [[St. Joseph, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St Joseph]] 
we held a Meetig & spoke to the people ^25 Miles^

Wednesday


Oct 1. I cast up the Number of American 
Indians as Reported in the Agencies and [had]

19 I preached the funeral sermon of 
Brother Holmes to a large assembly of the Neighbors went to the 
grave comforted the family what I could & returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] 35 [miles] 
The [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory| Manti Temple]] is 172 1/2 feet by 95 outside 79 feet high to the
square. The west Tower 169 feet & the East Tower 179 feet. The foundation 
of the Temple is 63 feet Elavation from the road 126 stepts from the road
to the foundation, 14 inch step & 16 feet wide or length of step

20, [FIGURES] I received 6 Letters & wrote 3 letters to [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|I F Carter]] &
[[Thomas Walter Brookbank|Brookbank]] I went to the field 6 Mile

21 [FIGURE]. I wrote Letter to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] & [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]]
I met in council upon the subject of forming a company to purchase
the Printing office

22 Sunday I took [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W W]] & rode to [[Big Cottonwood Canyon, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|big Cottonwood]] went to see
my Daughter [[Phoebe Arabell Woodruff Moses|Arabel Moses]] who was sick & spent 2 Hours with
her and returned after [[priesthood blessing|adminstering]] to her and Attended [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] 16 miles

23 [FIGURE] My son [[David Patten Woodruff|David]] has been with me for several days on a
visit, he leaves this morning for Ashleys fork I wrote one letter
to [[Sextus E. Johnson|S. E. Johnson]] & received one letter from [[Peter J. Christofferson|Christofferson]] we
[[set apart|set apart]] 15 Missionaries I was mouth in setting apart 6 persons
[[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] 5 [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 4. I wrote 2 letters to Christofferson

24 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]] & [[Ezra Carter, b. 1804|Ezra Carter]]

25 I met in Council with the Saints. Afternoon in writing\

26. [FIGURES] I received letter from [[Phoebe Amelia Woodruff Snow|Phebe Snow]] & [[Job Welling|Job Welling]]
I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & spent the night {Heard the lecture} 6 M[iles]

27 [FIGURES] My daughter [[Phoebe Arabell Woodruff Moses|Arabell Moses]] had a [[Sylva Arabell Moses Handley|Daughter]] this Morning
at 3:30 A.M. Mother & child doing well I received a letter from 
[[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]. Rote a letter to [[Milton Holmes|Milton Holmes]] of 4 Pages concerning the 
Death of [[Jonathan Harriman Holmes|Johnathan Holmes]] and our Temples

Wednesday


Oct 1 1879 They numbered 235,400 and 
there was probably as many more not Numbered 
we drove to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] 25 Miles
[FIGURE] I re[ceive]d 2 letters from [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] & [[John Willard Young|John W Yog]]

Thursday


Oct 2d [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[John Willard Young|John W Yog]] 
and Attended fast Meeting Br [[Andrew S. Gibbons|Gibbons]] spok 
followed By [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & others WW Read 
many passages in the D & C, & spoke 30 M[inutes]

Friday


3d Br [[Andrew S. Gibbons|Gibbons]] left this morning for 
[[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moencoppy]] Br [[Thales Haskell|Hascal]] and on Oct 1 & 
his family the people are gathg Corn & makg 
Molasses I think they will be 4000 bushels 
of wheat & 4000 bushels of corn I wrote 
[FIGURES] a letter to WIlford I ordained Br
Charles Edmund RIchardson to the seventy
on the 16 Sept 1879 He had been ardd while
young as they thought He was about to die
[FIGURE] I wrote 10 Letters to [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]], [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] 
[[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]], [[Phebe Eleanor Beatie Bynon|Ella]], [[Wilford Woodruff Beatie|Willy Beatie]], [[Sarah Delight Stocking Woodruff|Delight]], [[Marion Woodruff|Marion]], 
[[Emeline Woodruff Burrows|Emeline]], & [[Ensign Woodruff|Ensigns]]

Saturday


Oct 4 I killed 6 ducks got home weary

Sunday


5 Sunday I Attended Meetig at [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] 
in the forenoon Br [[Hiram Judd|Judd]] prayed WW spoke 
30 Mints Br [[George Lake|Lake]] 15. [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 10 M

28 I took cars rode to [[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] & Attended the Quarterly Conference
Met at 10 oclok [[John Brown, b. 1820|John Brown]] Prayed W Woodruff made a few remarks 
followed by [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] One hour. Afternoon [[David John|David John]] Prayed
the Authorities of the Church were presented & sustained. [[John Smith, b. 1832|John
Smith]] spoke 7, W Woodruff 65 M[inutes]. Total souls of the Stake
were 15008. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] spoke 20. I attended a council with the Bishops ^50 Miles^
Apostles G Q Cannon & Joseph F Smith & [[Abraham Owen Smoot|A O Smoot]]
^[FIGURE]^ in hearing a family Difficulty of [[Benjamin Franklin Johnson|B F Johnson]] we sat from 4 oclok
in the Afternoon untill 9 oclok at 9night I got vary chilly went to bed at
10 oclok and had a hard shake of the Ague for half an hour I was
then affected with the Diarhea went out of Doors several times in
the night took cold & was quite sick all night did not sleep

Aug 29 Sunday I arose quite poorly in the mornin took but little break
fast went to Meeting at 10 oclok [[Leonard Ellsworth Harrington|L E Harrington]] Prayed Sacrament 
Administered [[George Quayle Cannon|QG CQ Cannon]] spoke one hour & 40 M[inutes]. concerning his
Mission at [[Washington, D.C., United States|Washington]] Afternoon [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J. F. Smith]] spoke one hour 
& 22 M[inutes] [[Abraham Owen Smoot|A. O. Smoot]] spoke 3 M[inutes]. at the close of the Meeting we took
cars & returned home to [[Great Salt Lake City, Great Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]]. I went to bed & was 100 Miles
[FIGURES] so[o]n taken with a severe attack of the Billious Colic, which
lasted me 24 hours befor I got any passage during this time I was
in great Misery I took 6 table spoonfulls of Castor Oil, 3 tea-
spoonfulls of spirits turpentine before I got a passage, my 
suffering was so great that it took away all my strength
it was like my attack at the [[Moenkopi, Yavapai County, Arizona Territory|Moan Copy]] ownly I did not 
cramp

Sunday


Oct 5 1879
WW spoke 10 M {shorthand}
Afternoon we attended Meetig at [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham 
City]] Br [[Charles Ambrose Foster|Foster]] Prayed Br [[Thomas Walter Brookbank|Brookbank]] spok 
25 Minuts unto Edification Lot Smith 40 M[inutes] 
WW 20 M[inutes] then returned home to [[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]]
we see by the Deserett News that the US Coun
ty pack their Juries and throw out all
man who believe in poligomy and are deter
mined to prosecute all person who keep that
Law. [[Polaker|Polaker]] called upon me at Sunset

Monday


6. I read this mornig in the new translation 
Paul Epistle to 1 & 2 Timothy, Titus, Philemon
Hebrews, James, 1 & 2 Peter 1 2 & 3 John & Jude 
all these Epistles are vary Edifying & instructive
I laid hands upon 2 sick persons to day [A find]
Ready the New Translations of the [Booke] to day

Tuesday


7 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[Erastus Snow|E Snow]] 6 pages 
sent him a list of tithing prices of Produce 
stock &c of this Country for Brother [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Tyler]] &
[[Edward Hunter|Hunter]] wrote to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]] 2 pages [quite]
windy to day

Wednesday


8 A vary hard frost the first of the season 
killed Evy thig green vary cold day I took 
a walk through the fields

Aug 30, 1880
I suffered much through the day but got relief 
about sundown but left me in a vary weak state

31, I was vary weak all day but little strength in my system

Sept 1. I was vary weak today The Twelve came & [[laying on of hands|laid 
hands]] upon me & anointed me with oil and [[priesthood blessing|Blessed]] me I felt better

2 I remaind through the day weak & quite feverish

3 was still very weak & high fever

4 I remain the same not able to sit up at all

5 Sunday the 8 day of my sickness I am not able to stand upon my feet

6 I am still vary weak gain but little

7 I am still vary weak Br [[John Jaques|Jaques]] calles daily ang [and] brings the News

8 [FIGURE] I received a letter from Br [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] & card from [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]]

9 I put on my clothes for the first time since I was taken sick still weak

10, I dressed and walked out in the orchard the first time I have been out of 
doors since my sickness President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] called upon to day spent an
an hour conversing about his visit with President [[Charles Hayes|Haye]] & [[Rosetta Lacey Wardle Hayes|wife]]

11, [FIGURE] I spent the day in the House reading I received one letter from [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]

12 I spent the day in the House gain some strength

13, [FIGURE] I went to the Office for the first time was vary feeble I
wrote 2 letters to [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] & [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] & [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]] sent Phebe $5 for [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]]
I [FIGURE] received 12 letter came while I was sick

Thursday


Oct 9. 1879 I wrote [BLANK] Letters to 
[FIGURE] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J. D. T. McAllister]] & 2 pages to 
the workers in the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]], one Letter to 
[[James Godson Bleak|J. G. Bleak]], to L.B.Y. one to [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John 
Taylor]] & council about sendg a cons
to Settle [Mendy vally], one to Wm M 
Johnson at Lees Ferry we held a
council in the Evening & Appointed 
Br [[John Reidhead Jr.|Readhead]] to preside over [[Forest Dale, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Forest 
Dale]]. [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] spent the Evg
& Night with me wrote to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]]

Friday


10 Another Hard Frost last night 
I spent the day writing & readg

Saturday


11 I killed 6 ducks to day I spent most 
of the day readg

Sunday


12. Sunday I met at 11c Br Nelson
Prayed WW spoke 30 M[inutes]. [[Moses Curtis|Moses Curtis]] 
10. Br [[John Bloomfield|Bloomfield]] 17 [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 10
In the Afternoon I attended a priesthood 
Meeting the word of wisdom was spoken 
off Tobaco Liquer Coffee tea &c was 
spoken al lsince I was sick at Moen
-Coppy I had been using Coffee in the
Mornig I made up my mind to use no ^more^

Sept 14, 1880
I came to the office this morning and wrote up my Journal to
date felt some better but weak I went to [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] Resid[enc]e on 
[[Jordan River, Utah Territory|Joordon]] with the Twelve partook of a feast with him & returned 5 M[iles]

15, [FIGURE] I wrote 5 Letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]], [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] 
[[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & [[Peter Nielsen|Peter Neilson]] In the Afternoon I went to 
the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] A machine was set for threshing threshed out what
wheat we had 135 Bushels & 44 Bushels of Barley it rained all nigh[t]

16, I spent the time at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] mostly

17 [FIGURE] It rained to day I took up a load of Barley & returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]]
[FIGURE] I received 4 letters & wrote 4 letters

18, I spent the day at home & Evening at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 mils

19, Sunday [FIGURES] I went to the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] at 2 oclok I met with
[[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]] it was his birth day he was 69 years of age
and was his year of Jubilee in the Church was Baptised 650 years
ago this day He spoke to the People one hour & 18 Minuts & bore a
storong testimony of the Gospel of Jesus Christ W Woodruff spoke 5 M[inutes]

Monday


Oct 13 1879 I read Judge [[John A. Hunter|Hunters]] charge 
to the Grand Jury which was a venemous 
spout against the Mormons I rode to 
[[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] and Administered to 
Br [[Orville Ephraim Bates|Bates]] who was vy sick Br [[George Lake|Lake]] 
who had Been vy sick also Administered 
with me we had a hard Rain all 
night

Tuesday


14. It has rained this Mornig I spent 
the day readg the Book of Mormon

Wednesday


15 we arose this morng & fo[un]d that the 
[[Little Colorado River, Arizona Territory|Little Colorado]] had [] and overflowed 
the country it came near the fort 
it was within 6 inches as high as last 
year but the crops were mostly Gathered
so it done No damage I shot 2 rabbits
[FIGURES] we received a Deserett News of
Oct containing the Decision of the 
3d District Court Their was a compromise 
with the Trustees & Execetors & the heirs in the
suit of Law settle as compromise in
Paymt of $75,000. The Court Confirmed 
all the Acts of the Execetors in the settlemt 
of the Esstate This [caused us rian]

Sept 20 [FIGURE] I received 1 Letter I spent the day at home I heard that
[[Jonathan Pugmire Jr.|Jonathan Pugmyre]] died vary sudden on Saturday the 18. Eat
his dinner well was dead in 5 minutes

21, [FIGURE] I wrote 3 letters I was informed that [[John Orson Angus|John O Angus]] died to day at 3:25

22rd ^[FIGURE]^ I wrote a letter to [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] & kept a copy

23 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Oder Jacobson|O Jacobson]] and wrote one to
[FIGURE] him I delivered at the [[Tithing Office, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|tithing Office]] 1385 lb. of Barley at 2 cts pr lb
$27.70 cts I spent the night at the field 6 Mils

24 [FIGURE] I visited the Church farm on [[Jordan River, Utah Territory|Jordon]] with the 
Twelve. I spent the time in the Afternoon with [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]]
& [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] in committee on the Delinquent Tithing of
the [[Utah Territory|Terretory]] I received one letter from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]]

25 I spent the day in committee on tithing Affairs

26, [FIGURE] Sunday Presidents [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] [[George Quayle Cannon|Cannon]] & [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Smith]] & others
go to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] to Dedicate a school house I wrote 3 Letters

27, I spent the day in committee on the Back tithing and 
Donations of the various stakes of Zion. [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q]] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F]]
& [[Leonard John Nuttall|L. J. Nuttall]] Dined with me. We held a Meeting in the
Evening with the committee on the [[Utah Eastern Railroad|Eastern Rail Road]]

28. [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] spent the day in committee

Thursday


Oct 16, 1879 [FIGURE] I received 2 Letters from 
[[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] & [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry Woodruff]] I wrote
[FIGURE] 4 Letters to [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]] [[Asahel Hart Woodruff, b. 1863|Asahel]]
[[Emma Manella Woodruff|Nellie]] & [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry Woodruff]]

Friday


17 [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[George Teasdale|Geeg 
Teasdale]] I wrote ^4 letters^ to [[John Jaques|J Jaques]], [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]], 
[FIGURE] ^4 P^ [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] & [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] & Council abt
selling tithing flour or wheat I received a letter 
[FIGURES] from J. Jaques speaking of the
settlemt of the Esstate Suit & said 
that [[Ernest Irving Young|Earnest Young]] the ownly Male Heir
who was on the side of the [presicut]
was found drunk in the street carred
into the House & land Dead in the
Morning He did not live to enjoy
the money paid him in the suit
so the Lord [averys] his saints [[John Jaques|He]]
spoke of the rains & cold weather

Saturday


[FIGURE] 18 I wrote a Letter to [[George Teasdale|George Teasdale]] 
of 26 pages I gave acct of my Mission 
& visit with [[Chief Petone|Petone]] & my visit with
the Nephites for 42 days I killed 3 ducks
But spent most of the day writg

Sept 29, 1880 I spent the forenoon in committee. I met with 7 of 
the NavaJjoes and had confversation with them

30. [FIGURE] I spent the day in council I received one letter

Oct 1. I spent the forenoon in council

2 I Built a corn horse to day that cost me $32.70
I spent the forenoon in council in a committee

3 Sunday I spent the whole day in council upon the Priesthood

4, I sat in the Morning for my likeness the rest of the day in council

5, [FIGURES] I spent the day in [[Council of Fifty|council {of Fifty}]]

6 Oct we met in general Conference at 10 oclok in the
[[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Big Tabernacle]] Prayer By [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D. H. Wells]] [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] spoke 12,
[[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo Snow]] 27, [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 10 M[inutes]. was taken faint
President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] while speaking was taken faint &
was khelped to his seat President [[George Quayle Cannon|Cannon]] took his place 
and spoke 37 M[inutes]. I met with the [[Young Men|young Mens Mutual society]]
in the Evening Meeting called to order by W Woodruff G Q C
Cannon spoke to the people followed By [[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] W
Woodruff, then the Instruction of the superintendeny was 
read to the Meeting

7. [FIGURE] Conference Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]]
[[Albert Carrington|A Carrington]] spoke 50 W Woodruff 30 M[inutes]. Afternoon
[[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] Prayed. The statistics of the Church was then read
Members 65826, Apostles 12, Patriarchs 52, Seventies 
4319, [[High Priests|High Priests]] 3277 Elders 11509, Priests 1710
Teachess 1893 Deacons 3507, Officers & Members 92,104
Children under 8 years of age 35346, Total of souls 127,451.
[[Sunset, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Sunset]] Stakee of [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] 517 souls [[Snowflake, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Snow Flake]] Stake 1424.
Elder [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|J. D. T. McAllister]] spoke 50 M[inutes]. and gave an account 
of the Labor in the Temple had Baptized 99523. Had ordained
159889 gave Endowments to 41791

Sunday


Oct 19 1879 In company with [[Lot Smith|Lot
Smith]] & others I Rode to [[Brigham City, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Brigham City]] 
& crossed the bottom to look out a 
City Location we then held a Meetng 
with the people WW Read the 19 Chapter
of Alma on apart of [] & spoke 30 M
on the Resurrection & Restoration folld 
By Lot Smith & [[George Lake|Lake]] we administered 
to Br [[Orville Ephraim Bates|Bates]] I received a Letter from 
[FIGURE] [[John Willard Young|John W Yog]] I wrote one Letter to John
[FIGURE] W Yog

Monday


Ot 20. In company with [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & son 
[[Willard Richards Smith|Willard]] & [[Ira Hatch|Ira Hatch]] & Br [[Thomas Walter Brookbank|Brookbank]] 
we left soon at the [] M Moque 
villages we drove on the North west 
side of the River some 10 Miles then 
crossed to [[Chief Comiazi|Comiazi]] camp A Navajoe 
Chief stoped a short time with him 
then drove down the River on the East 
side over quite Rough ground for 10 Miles 
& camped for the night 20 M[iles].

Tuesday


21 We [drove Hainded] our horses &
started without Breakfast & drove 10 Miles
mostly up hill over a vy broaken

Oct 7, 1880
Had sealed 14255 couple

Oct 8. Met at 10 oclok Prayer By [[Milo Andrus|Milo Andrews]] [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] 
45 M[inutes]. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] then read the report of the [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] Temple 
District to Oct 1, 1880. Expenditures on the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] were
$207,977.35 And for the [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] Cash valley [[Logan Temple, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Temple]]
$252,147.78 Afternoon Prayer By [[Joseph Young|Joseph Young]] [[Orson Pratt|Orson
Pratt]] spoke one hour & 20 M[inutes]. theAt the close of the Meeting, we 
the Apostles met in council, and debated upon the propriety of
organizing the [[First Presidency|first Presidency]] we had held several councils
upon this subject and we finally left the subject untill another
Meeting I met with the Priesthood meeting An Article on the
[[Aaronic Priesthood|Aaronic Priesthood]] was read dictated By President
[[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]]. And remarks made By John Taylor W Woodruff
and [[Orson Pratt|O Pratt]] the [[spirit of God|spirit of God]] was with us

Oct 9. Conference Met at 10 oclok. [[David Orson Calder|D O Calder]] Prayed 
[[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] spoke 61 M[inutes]. [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] 27. Afternoon [[John Van Cott|John 
Vancott]] Prayed President [[Joseph Young|Joseph Young]] spoke 65 M[inutes]. was 
83 years of age & 6 months A List of 29 Missionaries was 
Called to [[United Kingdom|Great Britain]], one to [[Canada, British North America|Canida]], 9 to [[Scandinavia|Scandinavia]], 
4 to the United States & 5 to the Southern States. The foregoing are 
now in the field of labor, 30 for Great Britain, 10 to
Scandinavia, 1 to the [[Sandwich Islands|Sand wich Islands]], 9 to the United
States, 31 to the Southern States. [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] then 
spoke 22 M[inutes]. Conference adjourned untill sunday 10 oclok
The Apostle then Met in council at 6 oclok and 
Decided to organize the first Presidency of the Church 
[FIGURES] Wilford Woodruff Nominated [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John 
Taylor]] to be the President of the Church
of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints 
and it was carried unanimously President John 
Taylor then chose [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]] as his first
councillor and [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] as his second
councillor.

Tuesday


Ot 21 sandy country the sand Deep & 
the hardest kind of waggoning and it 
neerly tiered our Horses out we drove 10 Miles
& camped for Breakfast in the woods
took breakfast Had no water for our
Animals fed grains then drove on up
the [mark] 10 Miles & found water &
camped for the night 20 Miles
I shot a Rabbit for supper our Road
was vy hard all day we had No
waggon Road.

Wednesday


22 We drove some 12 Miles & found water 
on the East side of the valley in a Hollow 
in the side of a Hill it was cold & good a 
living spring we watered our animals then drove 
over a Rough sand Ridge and camped 
in about a Mile of the [[Oraibi, Apache County, Arizona Territory|Oribe village]] 
and took our team to Oribe well to 
water the well stands under the Mountains 
south west of the village Distance of the day 25 ^M^

Thursday


23 we drove our waggon and camped at 
the well of the Oribes [Oraibes] we wer soon surrounded 
By about 20 Oribe children from 3 to 18 
years of age The village is built on the
top of the Mountain about 500 feet above

Oct 9, 1880 It was then Moved seconeded & 
carried Unanimously that Wilford Woodruff should 
be the President of the Twelve Apostles. We then Met in
the [[Assembly Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Assembly Hall]] with the Priesthood Meeting and at 
that Meeting after documents were read upon the priest-
hood President John Taylor was then Presented before 
the Priesthood Meeting as the President of the Church and his
two councillors And Wilford Woodruff as the President
of the Twelve Apostles and Receivd the unanimous vote of all
the Priesthood Assembled upon the occasion

[FIGURES] Oct 10, 1880 Sunday This is a great day to Israel 
The conference Met at 10 oclok conference 
called to order By [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]]. The Quire sang "the 
Morning Breaks the shawows flee" Prayer By Elder
[[Edward Partridge, b. 1833|Edward Partridge]] Elder [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]] spoke to the people 
one hour & 15 M[inutes]. upon the Priesthood in its various 
offices & dispensation which was vary interesting 
[[Leonard John Nuttall|L J Nuttall]] Presented 3 Names of Missionaries W Woodruff 
Dismissed untill 2 oclok. Afternoon Met at 2 oclok 
[FIGURES] The various Quorums of the Priesthood were seated
in the following Order. The [[first presidency|first Presidency]] in the upper 
seat The Twelve Apostles in the 2nd seat on the south of the 
stand the Patriarchs & Presidents of the Stakes & their Councillors
and the [[High Councils|High Councils]]. On the North of the stand the Bishops
and their Councillors. Presiding Bishop [[Edward Hunter|Hunter]] and his
councellors in front of them. The [[High Priest|High Priest]] on the
North Benches of the house. The Quorum Presidents in the
front. The Elders immediately behingd the High Priest
The seventies on the Benches of the south side of the House 
And the Quorum Presidents in the front. The [[Aaronic Priesthood|Lesser Prie-
sthood]] in the North side of the House. IConference called to order 
By President John Taylor

Thursday


Oct 23 [FIGURE] The well & surroundg Country they
very all their water from thes & other wells
in large Judges [jugs] to the top of the Roads to their
[one] This well is about 170 feet deep and
100 feet [across] the top which is terraced with
4 stone walls one [chae] another and a trail
or foot path leading Down to the water the 
well at the Bottom is abot 10 feet square
and the first 10 feet laid up with [Code]
timber the water 8 or 10 feet Deep the
last Descent to the water was over 35
stone steps when I went down to the water
I found a [Deenlg] half way down the well [by
gue] Down on the Trail & stand lookg
down to the water waitig for someone
to bring him up water to drink the
Oribas have to water all their Animals
at there wells in a day time There
Oribas have large corn fields, Mellen
bean & squash [Rates] and peach orchards
all planted & [faired] in the sand watter
water the country surrounding this village
one deep ganger & Ridges and the [Reedheads]
one both on the [nolger] side [Half & the bottom] 
and No one could supposed that [River]

Oct 10, 1880 Sunday P M
prayer By [[Albert Carrington|Albert Carrington]] 
This is the third time the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day 
Saints have been called upon to organize a first Presidency of
the Church, first the Prophet [[Joseph Smith Jr.|Joseph Smith]] & Councillors
^[FIGURES]^ Seconed when President [[Brigham Young|Brigham Young]] & councillors
were Appointed. Third when President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] &
concillors are now Presented to the Assembly. Elder [[Orson Pratt|Orson 
Pratt]] then Presented the following Authorities of the 
Church to the Conference all of which were unanimously 
sustained without a dissenting vote By Each Quorum 
of the Priesthood rising in their order with uplifted hands
to heaven First to the Twelve Apostles and their councillors 
second the Patriarchs Presidents of Stakes and their councillors 
and the High Councils. Third the High Priests. Fourth 
the seventies, fifth the Elders, sixth the Bishops & their coun-
cellors & seventh the [[Aaronic Priesthood|Lesser Priesthood]], Priests, Teachers 
& Deacons. Eighth the Presidents of the various of the 
various quorums, last the whole congregation, Male & 
female in the galleries, on the stand & the body of the
House. John Taylor as Prophet Seer and Revelator 
and President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter day
Saints In all the world. [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]] as his 
first councillor in the [[first presidency|first Presidency]] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 
as seconed councillor, Wilford Woodruff as President 
of the Twelve Apostles. As Members of the Council of 
the Twelve Apostles Wilford Woodruff [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]], 
[[Charles Coulson Rich|Charles C Rich]], [[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo Snow]] [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]],
[[Franklin Dewey Richards|Franklin D. Richards]] [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brigham Young]] [[Albert Carrington|Albert 
Carrington]] and [[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]]. As councillors to the
Twelve Apostles [[John Willard Young|John W Young]] & [[Daniel Hanmer Wells|Daniel H Wells]]. 
[[Francis Marion Lyman|Francis Marian Lyman]] as an Apostle in the Council of 
the Twelve [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] as an Apostle in the Council of the Twelve

23 Oct Then could grow in such places {shorthand}?
[bean] & Mellen grow in such sand
without water but we find that sand
holds moisture in a dry weather much better
than clay their Mellen peaches [cered verd]
Acre all [sumonchd] with states walls
Rugs to keep all the [crows & wahes] We
asscended on [stone stapets] & a foot path
some 500 feet into the Oribe village [centing]
a population of about 1000 people I was
asstonished to see so many children lass & gents
among them all the Marriageable girls for
10 years up had their hairs done up in
the shape of a pair of Horns or Huge
Ears on teh side of the Head which would
arise 4 inches above the Head this was a sign 
that they were Ready for Marriage / a Marriage
but it gave them a very wild appearance
any one not knowing their customs had
seen there raise their head any the 
Rocks would have [laten] there for a
[gingerly] bean This village was completely
built Herein laid up with stone in [Maden]
& some of them 4 stories high all stanging
on the bean bare [Rades] all there

Oct 10, 1880 Sunday The foregoing were all that were voted upon
by Quorums separately. All the rest of the Authorities of the
Church were voted for in the usual Manner by the whole con-
gregation, After which [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]] said I hold in 
my hand the [[Doctrine and Covenants|Doctrins & Covenants]] and I present them to the
Conference to see if the people will vote for them. He had also the [[Pearl of Great Price|Pear[l] of 
Great Price]] in connexion with the Covenants, and all the Conference 
voted to sustain the Revelations contained therein. President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] 
then spoke some 20 M[inutes]. followed By W. Woodruff spoke 15 M[inutes]

Monday 11, we met at 9 oclok at the [[President|Presidents office]]. We voted to
[FIGURE] take the Engine out of the [[St. George Temple, St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|Temple]] at [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]]. We met the 
Missionaries at the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Council House]] and we set apart 55 for
their Missions. W Woodruff set apart 9 President [[Joseph Young|Joseph Young]] 
Ordained [[Matthias Cowley|Matthias Cowley]] to the office of a seventy and
set him apart to his Mission. I spent the night at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 m[iles]

12, I returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] and attended a [[Council of Fifty|Council {of Fifty}]] in the 
[[City Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City Hall]]. In the Afternoon I met with the Presidents of Stakes
and councillors in the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Council House]]. [[John Van Cott|John Vancott]] and
[[Lorin Farr|Loren Farr]] jouned our Council {of Fifty}

13. I met in council at the [[Endowment House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Endowment]] for council & Prayer

14. I spent the day in writing up my Journal & in council.

15 [FIGURE] I received 3 letters & spent the forenoon in council and
President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] made some arangments with [[Henry Lunt|Henry Lunt]] to
secure a Coal Mine & Iron Mines near [[Cedar City, Iron County, Utah Territory|Cedar]]. Appropriated 
$5000 to help secure it to the Church to own 2/3 & Br Lunt 1/3 I wrote
up my Journal I wrote one letter to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] and sent [[David Patten Woodruff|Davids]] to her

16, {FIGURE] 16 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] & went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 m[iles]

[FIGURE] 17, Sunday I wrote 3 letters to [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia]] [[Phebe Carter Scholes Saville|Phebe]] & [[Robert Scholes|Robert]] & [[George Woodruff Scholes|George Scholes]] Sunday I attended Meeting in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]] [[John Thomas Caine|John T Caine]]
& [[Milo Andrus|Milo Andrews]] spoke some 50 M[inutes]. [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] 30 M[inutes] 
we attended the [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] in the Evening

23 Oct villages are built on the lap of the
[Hegert Rock for Depoe is time of worn]
the village was abot a qurter of a mile and
it The day before our Arival they had their
great Dane which had [kept up ondill
late and the people were rather Stupid]
we went on to the lap of a 4 Story [Heirs]
where we could l[ake a every] of the Sunday
beauty I found the Men [due] the spring &
a quad [Deal of the Nitty] There was about to 
be a Marriage in the village and all the
Men had gathered with the weak slops to
[speis calters werp] for a pair of [Black
for the canapple its spun on spindle that]
they [told us steep land] they [paired the
cotter thenches and when the black it is
were the pairs steeps undue it at night]
after Marriage it is [there put any & kept
sacred untill they diethat each is burned
in their Blanket the Men were undugd
was slops] & I could not get them to
come out to [beer pr?? so I went down
unto 2 of their wash slops & spoke to them
where they were at work I found two]

Oct 18 1880
I bought a No 7 Moniter Stove for [[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]] to day 
Paid $40 Paid $20 for some articles for [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] and family

19. Tuesday in company with [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] I visited
[[George Reynolds|George Reynolds]] at the [[Sugar House Prison, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Penetentiary]]. He had a room by
himself and was comfortable I received a letter from [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]]

Oct 20 [FIGURE] I returned from the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & wrote a letter from
[[Ilus Fabyan Carter|Ilus F. Carter]] and sent a draft of $125 to [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah 
A. Woodruff]] I also wrote her a letter at Rochester. It is
a plesant day. Crops good Potatoe crop vary cgood.

21. [FIGURES] I received 4 letters I wrote 1 to [[Oder Jacobson|Jacobson]] Br
[[Henry Charles Fowler|Henry Charles Fowler]] Baptized my Daughter [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan 
C Scholes]] in the font for the Renewal of her covenants
and her health

22nd I met with the quorum of the Twelve in council at
the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Council House]] we had ownly 6 of the Quorum Present

23 I took cars & rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] with [[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] to
[[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] I met in the conference in the Afternoon [[Jacob G. Bigler|J G 
Bigler]] Prayed. The stake statistics were then read 2117 souls
reported in the stake. [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] spoke 35 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 30 m[inutes]
On the subject of tithing. In the Evening I met with the [[YMMIA|young 
Men]] & [[YLMIA|young Ladies Mutual]]. G. Teasdale Prayed, Br Jinkins 
spoke 8 M[inutes] [[Niels Jensen Aagard|Bishop]] of [[Levan, Juab County, Utah Territory|Levan]] 5 M[inutes]. Sister Grover 7, W Woodruff 
one hour, we had a good meeting

24. Sunday we Met at 10 oclok W Woodruff spoke one hour
& 15 M[inutes]. Afternoon Prayer By [[Reddick Newton Allred|R. N. Alread]] [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] spoke 25 Minuts. Then the Authorities of the Church were
Presented & sustained [[Leonard Ellsworth Harrington|L E Harrington]] spoke 40 M[inutes. W. 
Woodruff 15 M[inutes]. Four were cut off for Apostacy, 3 for 
Adultery & 1 for stealing total 9. W Woodruff ordained one
[[High Priest|High Priest]] and set him apart for a Bishops councillor
and another Man was set apart for a Bishops councillor 
I met in the Evening & spoke one hour to the people The [[spirit of God|Spirit of God]] was with us 90 Miles

23 more interested in their work than to
heer preachg But I spoke to one company
of 20 anoth 30, & Brother [[Ira Hatch|Hatch]] 
interpeted it I saw one white Indian 
an Albino Man vary white there are some
in Nearly all of there villages they appear 
to be the Blood of the Ancient Nephites or 
a freak of Nature After going through the 
village & again on the tops of the Houses 
most of which are flat & covered with
corn to dry from pure white to jet Black
more corn black then white but []
white Black Red yellow & blue we then
left the village we then travelled 12M
over vy Rough gro[un]d & camped for the night 
5 M
see Blank Book Journal No 2

Oct 25 1880 [FIGURES] Monday we received a Telegram that the 
Apostle [[Charles Coulson Rich|Charles C Rich]] had a shock of Paralisis on Sunday
and was vary low. I visited Sister Goldsborough who had 
a fall and was badly hurt. We [[priesthood blessing|administered]] to her I took cars 
and returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] [[Moses Thatcher|Moses Thatcher]] joined me
at [[Provo, Utah County, Utah Territory|Provo]] I spent the night at home 90 M[iles].

26. [FIGURE] I received 5 letters from [[Milton Henry Hardy|M H Hardy]], [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|Mcallister]]
[[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]], [[Jesse Nathaniel Smith|Jesse N Smith]] & [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] we had 3 telegrams this
Morning from Br [[Charles Coulson Rich|Rich]] saying that He had a Bad night 
was sinking fast [[Francis Denton Benedict|Benedic]] had arived there might be some hope

27. [FIGURE] Telegram say their is more hope of Br [[Charles Coulson Rich|Rich]] to day 
[[Brigham T. Young|Brigham T Young]] son of [[Joseph Angell Young|Joseph A Young]] died at 2 oclok 
this Morning with drunkenness & Morphene I attended council 
[FIGURES] In our council today we ordained [[Francis Marion Lyman|Francis 
M Lyman]] (son of [[Amasa Mason Lyman|A mason Lyman]]) to the 
Apostleship as one of the Twelve Apostles. [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] was
Mouth in ordaining. We also ordained [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] 
(son of [[George Albert Smith Jr.|George A Smith]]) To the Apostleship A member of 
the Twelve Apostles. W Woodruff ordained him it was the
first Apostle I Ever ordained The following is the blessing sealed upon the Head of John Henry Smith
Ordination of [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] to the Apostleship to be one of
the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles ordained under the hands of 
President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]], [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q. Cannon]], & [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 
of the Presidency, and Wilford Woodruff who was Mouth in 
ordaining, also [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]], [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]], [[Franklin Dewey Richards|Franklin D
Richards]], & [[Brigham Young Jr.|Brigham Young]] of the Quorum of the Twelve and
[[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D H Wells]] councillor to the Twelve
Brother John Henry Smith in the name of the Lord Juesus Christ 
and by the Authority of the [[Holy Priesthood|Holy Priesthood]] And Apostleship confered 
upon us we

Oct 27, 1880
[[laying on of hands|lay our hands]] upon your head, and we ordain you
an Apostle in the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints
and as A member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles, And 
we seal upon you all the power And Authority to Administer 
in all the Ordinances of the [[house of God|House of God]] agreeable to this office
Even the Apostleship which is the Highest Authority Ever confered 
and sealed upon the sons of men in the flesh. And we pray God 
to cloth you with the power of this Apostleship, with the power
of God, That your mind may be open to comprehend &
understand your relationship to God, your relationship
to your Brethren, your relationship to the Church and Kingdom 
of God, in relation to this world, and in relation to the responsibility
which now rest upon you. And we say unto you The Eyes of 
God & his Son Jesus Christ isand of the Heavenly Hosts, and of 
[[Joseph Smith Jr.|Joseph Smith]] and the Apostles, And the Eyes of your [[George Albert Smith|Father]] who
are behingd the veil are upon you, and there is rejoicing in 
Heaven becaus you are one of the Sons of the Prophets & Apostles and
have come forth to take upon yourself the Holy Apostleship and 
we say unto you be humble before God and seek for the [[Holy Spirit|Holy spirit]]
For [[John Henry Smith|you]] need this power to guide and direct you in this Apostleship
and inasmuch as you walk in faithfulness and humility before 
God and seek and obyey the council of your Brethren you will 
become a Mighty man in the Earth, and you shall stand in the
flesh to behold the great work fullfilled, and the promises of God
concerning the great [[last dispensation|last dispensation]] of the [[fulness of times|fullness of times]].
We pray God to cloth you with his [[power of God|power]], with the spirit and
power of the [[Holy Ghost|Holy Ghost]] and the Revelation of Jesus Christ 
which Belongs to the Apostleship which is your right to claim 
which is your right to claim exercise, & which is your right to
Enjoy.

Oct 27, 1880
lift up your voice as with the sound of a trumpet
long & loud as far as you have an opportunity in you day
and declare the work of life & salvation unto the inhabitants
of the Earth. you are unordained unto this power you hold the
Isuessues of of life & death as far as the salvation or condemnation 
of the world is concerned, you are called to stand in the defence 
of the truth and to bear your record of the [[kingdom of God|Kingdom of God]] 
on the Earth and your Testimony will rise in judgment
against the wicked in the day of [[final judgment|Judgments]] in the day when all 
men will give an account of the deeds done in the body
your words shall be a savior of life unto life to those who 
believe and obey, or of Death unto Death to those who 
reject your testimony. Therefore we say unto you go
forth in peace & the [[power of God|power of God]] to b[e]ar a record of the words
of Ch [[eternal life|veerlasting life]], And take upon you and feel in your
spirit this Apostleship, and the blessings of God will attend your
labors we seal again your Evry Blessing, and evry Key and
Endowment of the [[new and everlasting covenant|New and Everlasting Covenant]]
Even the Blessing of [[Abraham (OT)|Abraham]] [[Isaac (OT)|Isaac]] & [[Jacob (OT)|Jacob]] in 
the name of Jesus Christ our Redeemer Amen
The spirit of God rested upon us while we was ordaining
thes two Brethren to the Apostleship. The Blessing of Br
[[Francis Marion Lyman|Lyman]] I have not God [got] therefore I cannot record it

Oct. 28, 1880 Dr [[Francis Denton Benedict|Benedict]] arived from [[Paris, Bear Lake County, Idaho Territory|Paris]] and gave 
us an Account of Br [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]]. He was reviving some 
but No prospect of final Recovery I wrote 3 letters to
[FIGURE] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] [[George Teasdale|Teasdale]] and [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]

Oct 29, 1880
[FIGURE] I received a quantity of trees, currant & gooseburys &
vines today which I set out in the orchard at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 Mil

30 [FIGURES] I received 3 letters from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], [[David Patten Woodruff|David]], & [[Oder Jacobson|Jacobson]]
I went on top of the [[Salt Lake City Temple, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Temple]] with [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]]. I wrote 10 Letters to
Jacobson, McKinnon Sarah. One for Susan to open at
home with a Note to each of the children, [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia]] 
[[Phoebe Amelia Woodruff Snow|Phebe]], [[Robert J. Scholes|Robert]] [[Wilford Woodruff Scholes|Wilfgord]] [[George Woodruff Scholes|George]] & [[Florence Augusta Scholes Sears|Flossy]] with Each a
present. I wrote to [[David Patten Woodruff|David]] sent him his $6 Note I
wrote to [[Phebe Augusta Florence Snow Critchlow|Phebe A Snow]]

31. Sunday I attended Sabbath School Jubilee in the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Taber-
nacle]] some 8000 children with many grown people were
present, met at 10 oclok and passed through the Exercises untill
near 12 oclok Then W Woodruff addressed the Assembly 10 M[inutes], spoke
upon the [[ministration of angels|administration of Angels]] ({to him in [[London, Middlesex, England|London]]}) I attended the meeting in the Afternoon W Woodruff spoke 
one hour followed By [[Orson Pratt|O. Pratt]] 30 M[inutes]. I attended meeting
in the 17 ward in the Evening and assisted in the organization 
of the Bishop & his council. [[Edward Hunter|Edward Hunter]] spoke 15 M[inutes]. 
W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes] & [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] a few moments

Nov 1. [FIGURES] I received 2 letters & wrote one to [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|I F Carter]]

2nd This is the Great Election for the Nation I took cars in the
Morning Rode to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] with my Daughter [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]] & 2 children
got her a ticket and saw her on Board of the [[Union Pacific Railroad|U. P.]] for
[[Council Bluffs, Pottawattamie County, Iowa|Council Bluffs]].

Nov 2nd 1880
[FIGURE] I then took cars & returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] to
cast my vote for [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] as our delegate to Congress
In the Afternoon I returned again to Ogden making 80 M
Miles travel to cast my vote. I took [[Utah Northern Railroad|Utah Northern]] in the
Evening rode to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] arived at Midnight Distance of the day 170 miles

3rd I went with [[Newton Woodruff, b. 1863|Newton]] to [[Bear River, United States|bear River]] we shot 4 ducks and
returned [[Mary Woodruff, b. 1867|Mary]] had burned her knee caught cold in it and was
in great Pain in the night I got up held her limb over the 
smoke of burnt wool, and Put on a peace of salt Bacon
& she went to sleep & rested

4. I attended fast Meeting to day

5 I spent the day with my family in [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]]

6. In company with [[Thomas J. Lutz|Thomas D Lutz]] & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] I rode to [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] 
to attend the quarterly conference Met at 10 oclok ^Br^ Merrill
Prayed Statiscital report read Total souls 14550. Total of
Temple funds $257,271.41. [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] spoke 25 M[inutes], W Wood
ruff 25 M[inutes] Afternoon [[William Bowker Preston|Wm B Preston]] spoke 12 M[inutes]. [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F. D. Richards]]
one hour & 10 M[inutes] on the Law of Tithing At the close of the Meeting we visited
the [[Logan Temple, Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Temple]], two banks of the Roof was on we could see that it will [crowd] 
hard to get the roof on this fall. I rode to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] & spent the night 16 Miles

Nov 7, 1880
I rode to [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] attended Conference at 10 oclok [[Charles Ora Card|C O Card]]
prayed [[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo Snow]] spoke one hour & 10 M[inutes]. W Woodruff 38 M[inutes]
At the close of the Meeting the Twelve Met at Br Cards House
[FIGURES] We here met with Br [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] who had been
Brought from [[Bear Lake Valley, Idaho and Utah Territories|Bear Lake]] on a Bed having received a paraletic
stroke, the left side entirely useless, he could speak a little so as 
to be understood. Br [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]] Anointed him and six
of the Apostles [[laying on of hands|laid hands]] upon him & W Woodruff was mouth 
and [[priesthood blessing|blessed]] him. He seemed overjoyed at seeing us. We met at
2 oclok Sacrament Administered. The Authorities of the Church
were presented and sustained, 4 Missionaries called to spend
all their time as home missionaries [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] spoke one
hour & 10 M[inutes]. [[Moses Thatcher|M Thatcher]] 14, [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] 15 M[inutes] W W 3 M[inutes]. 
We adjourned & rode to [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] & held a Meeting Bishop
[[George Lionel Farrell|Ferrell]] spoke 15 M[inutes] & W Woodruff one hour 16 Miles

Nov 8. I took cars at 3:40 rode to [[Logan, Cache County, Utah Territory|Logan]] & [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake]] and
^[FIGURE]^ arived in a snow storm I went to the Office & received 8 letters 98 Mile

9. [FIGURES] I wrote a letter to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] sent her $10 to pay for
an Ox. In company with [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] ^&^ [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] we 
[[priesthood blessing|Administered]] to [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]], we also was informed of the death
of [[Jonathan C. Wright|Johnathan C Wright]]. I went to the field 6 Miles

10 I went to the field took down a coal house for [[Sarah Delight Stocking Woodruff|Sarah D]]
I went & visited my Daughter [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Clara]] who had been vary
sick with the Diphtheria she was better to day I met in 
[FIGURE] council with the Presidency & Twelve President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylors]]
claim upon the [[Sugar House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Sugar House]] Machinery of $10000 weras
allowed him

Nov 11, 1880
we had 3 inches of snow on the ground this morning
[FIGURES] I received one letter & wrote 3 letters one to [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] sent her $10

12. [FIGURE] I wrote onetwo letter to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]

13. [FIGURE] I wrote 1 Letter to [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]] spent the rest of the day on [[John Milton Bernhisel|Bernhisel]] Acc[oun]t

14. Sunday I visited [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] today and Attended Meeting
at 2 oclok Br [[Charles J. Brain|Brain]] spoke 5 M[inutes]. [[John Nebeker|John Nebeker]] 30 M[inutes] [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Caon
Cannon]] One hour. we attended the [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]] W. W. Prayed
I attended the Meeting in the 14 ward. [[John Whittaker Taylor|John ^W^ Taylor]] spoke 15 M[inutes].
and [[Thomas Taylor|Thomas Taylor]] 30 & W Woodruff 60 M[inutes].

15 [FIGURES] I received 4 Letters from [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]], [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]], [[Phebe Carter Scholes Saville|Phebe]]
& [[Robert J. Scholes|Robert Scholes Jr.]] I wrote 5 Letters.

16 [FIGURES] I wrote 1 letter to [[A. M. McDonald|A M McDonald]] I spent the forenoon 
with the Auditing Committee on the Accounts of Dr [[John Milton Bernhisel|J M
Bernhisel]] with the Trustee in trust during the Administration
of President [[Brigham Young|Brigham Young]] but we could find Nothing 
due him but a small amount

17. [FIGURES] This is the coldest night I Ever saw in Nov
Thermomitor at daylight stood 3 degrees below Zero, 2 above
at 8 oclok I wrote a letter to [[William Thompson Woodruff|William Woodruff]] on the Woodruff 
Genellogy my Daughter [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Clara]] was vary sick with the
Diphtheria has now got the plurisy inand great pain in the 
side and has suffered vary much

18. I returned from the field this morning. [[Clara Martisha Woodruff Beebe|Clara]] was vary
sick through the night. I was afraid she would die I received
[FIGURE] I letter from [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] I salted down a Barrel of Beef today

19. I left [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S. L. City]] this morning & took cars with Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|W]].
I rode to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] took dinner with Br. [[George Teasdale|Teasdale]] then in
company rode to [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]] and held a Meeting in the Evening
G Teasdale spoke 30 M[inutes] W Woodruff 30 M[inutes]. Distance 118 M[iles]

Nov 20, 1880
We drove to [[Fort Ephraim, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Fort Ephraim]] to Attend the Quarterly
Conference. We Met in the Afternoon at 2 oclok [[Junius Free Wells|Junius F Wells]] 
Prayed, The Statiscical report was then read
Total Number of souls 10305. President [[Canute Peterson|Peterson]] reported 
the general condition of the stake. The General report of 
the recepts of the [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] Temple District was given up to
date as $221,264.94 cts W Woodruff then spoke one hour
[[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 15 M[inutes]. we held a Meeting in the Evening with the 
young People [[Junius Free Wells|Junius F Wells]] spoke 30 M[inutes], W Woodruff 50 M[inutes].

201 Sunday we met at 10 oclok W Woodruff spoke 45 M[inutes], 
Br Wareham 15 M[inutes], Br [[John B. Maiben|Mabyan]] 12 M[inutes]. Afternoon Sacrament &
the General Authorities of the Church Presented and sustained 
[[William Harrison Folsom|Wm H Folsome]] spoke 35 M[inutes] At the close of the Meeting we rode
to [[Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Manti]] and held a Meeting in the Evening with the young People 
[[Junius Free Wells|Junius F Wells]] spoke 40 M[inutes]. and gave Excellent council 
W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes], [[George Teasdale|G. Teasdale]] 20. Stoped with Br Mabyan 8 Mile

22 In the Morning we drove onto the [[Manti Temple, Manti, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Temple]] ground, 
and we were much pleased with the Appearance of the Temple
it was the first time Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Woodruff]] had Ever seen it, she
was much pleased with it. They had got on the string cours
of the first story After taken a sto view of the Temple and its 
surroundings. we then drove to [[Ephraim, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Ephraim]] and attended the
[[Relief Society|Relief society]] Mrs Phebe W Woodruff addressed the Meeting
followed By W. Woodruff a short time we then dined with
Br Peterson and drove to [[Moroni, Sanpete County, Utah Territory|Moroni]] we spent the ^20 Miles^
night with Brother [[John Wilbert Irons, b. 1823|Irons]] He and [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] attended the 
[[Young Men|young Mens Mutual]] I spent the Evening in the House

23. I took a walk out with Br [[John Wilbert Irons, b. 1823|Irons]] to view the country
we shot 1 duck & 2 Rabbits we took dinner & Drove to [[Nephi, Juab County, Utah Territory|Nephi]] 
and attended the Meeting with the young people. [[George Teasdale|G Teasdale]] 
spoke 30 M[inutes], W Woodruff 35 23 Miles

Nov 24, 1880
we attended a Meeting with a [[Relief Society|relief society]] Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Woodruff]] 
spoke 35 M[inutes] and gave vary good instruction to the people 
we took cars & rode to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Salt Lake City]] and I had a severe 
cold on my lungs & had a sick night. Distance 95 Miles

Nov 25 [FIGURES] Thanksgiving day I received 5 letters. I wrote
one letter to Br [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] we had quite a snow storm Endow-
ments were given to day there was quite a Number of 
young folks Married today My son [[James Jackson Woodruff|James]] Buried his
[FIGURE] syoungest [[Emma Lloyd Woodruff|Son]] [daughter] to day. My Daughter [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] returned 
home from the East this Evening I heard a letter Read 
from [[James Blackburn|James Blackburn]] a Missionary at [[Michigan|Michigan]] 
giving an account of the Persecution He was recei-
ving from the people, they were driven from place to place 
He also related a most horrible circumstance He had rec[ieve]d 
[FIGURE] a letter from B Palmer of [[Cleveland, Cuyahoga County, Ohio|Cleveland]] Ohio saying
that the water Reservoy of that city had become so foul 
they could not drink it they drained the water off 
and they found in the bottom of it 700 dead infants 
all probably begotten out of wedlock how they can as 
a Nation stand with such corruption in one Christian
city Not ownly Evidenc of 700 cases of whoredom in
one city but of 700 Murders in one city and the 
inhabitants Drinking the water from their bodies 6 M[iles]

26 [FIGURE] I returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] & wrote a letter to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]]

27. [FIGURES] I wrote one letter to [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|I F Carter]] and a Draft for
$62 for [[Beulah Augusta Woodruff Beatie|Bulah]] I wrote to Br [[Thomas J. Lutz|Lutz]] I sent a descrption
to him of [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]], [[Erastus Snow|Erastus Snow]], [[Francis Marion Lyman|Francis M Lyman]] 
& [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] I visited [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] He seemed some better [FIGURE] I wrote to ^4^ [[Susan Cornelia Woodruff Scholes|Susan]], [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe]], & [[Robert Scholes|Robert Scholes]]

Nov 28 1880
Sunday I did not feel well & kept the House. [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] 
spoke in the [[Assembly Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Assembly Hall]]

29. [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from Br [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]

30. I spent a part of the day at the office. I was in the [[President|Presidents 
office]] untill late last night the (29) with the Presidency and the 
Twelve to look over the Minuts of the conference in view of 
the organizeing of the [[first presidency|first Presidency]] we then parted with 
Br [[George Quayle Cannon|Geo[r]ge Q Cannon]] who starts in the Morning for [[Washington, D.C., United States|wash-
ington]] [[Abraham Owen Smoot|A. O Smoot]] goes with him to [[Kentucky|Kentucky]] I went to the field

Dec 1, 1880 A cold morning I received a letter from [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] 
I met in council and in a prayer circle

2nd [FIGURES] I received A Letter from [[William Thompson Woodruff|William Woodruff]] 
who gave me the Geneology of my Progenetor 
As follows ^1.^ Wilford Woodruff Born March 1, 1807
2nd [[Aphek Woodruff, b. 1778|Aphek Woodruff]] Born Nov 11, 1778, died March 28 1861 Aged 83
3. [[Eldad Woodruff, b. 1747|Eldad Woodruff]] born 1751. Died 1806. Aged 54 years
4. [[Josiah Woodruff, b. 1706|Josiah Woodruff]] born Aug 16, 1706 [[Farmington, Hartford County, Connecticut|Farmington]] Ct Aged 100 years
5 Gen. [[Joseph Woodruff, b. 1679|Joseph Woodruff]] born in Farmington Ct. 1679.
6. Gen. [[John Woodruff, b. 1643|John Woodruff]] Born in Farmington Ct. 1649.
7. Gen. [[Matthew Woodruff|Mathew Woodruff]] The original setler and 
proprietor and one of the 84 original owners of the Town 
of Farmington came from [[Hartford, Hartford County, Connecticut|Hartford]] in 1640. And 
was among the first setlers of Hartford Connecticut
Some called my Great Grand Father (4 G) Medad, others Elijah 
and others [[Josiah Woodruff, b. 1706|Josiah]], I put it down as Josiah

3rd I spent the day writing up my Mission to [[Fox Islands, Waldo County, Maine|Fox Islands]]

4. I spent the day writing my Mission

5 Sunday I attended meeting in the Afternoon [[William Carter Staines|Wm C Stains]] 
spoke 30 M[inutes] [[Angus Munn Cannon|A. M Cannon]] 30, & [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 30 M[inutes].

Dec 5, 1880
I held a Meeting in the Evening in the 14 ward school House 
[[William Whitaker Taylor|W. W. Taylor]] spoke 20 M[inutes], Br [[Charles Lambert|Lambert]] 20, W Woodruff 30 m[inutes].

6. [FIGURE] I received one letter and spent the day writing my mission

7. [FIGURES] My wife [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W W.]] took Ether this morning
and had 24 teeth extracted all she had she being 73 years 
old it made her quite sick but she got along with it as 
well as could be Expected I wrote 4 letters to [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]
[FIGURE] [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|Mc'Allister]] A. E. Wells & [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]]

8 I spent the forenoon in council with the Presidency &
Br [[David King Udall|David Udal]] concerning the Purchase of [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]]
and the paying for the same I met in the Prayer Circle

9 [FIGURE] I wrote 4 letters to [[Ammon Meshach Tenney|Tenney]], [[Erastus Snow|E. Snow]], [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]]
[[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] & [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]]. I receivd 1 letter from [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|I F Carter]]

10. [FIGURE] I spent the day in writing I sent an 
Autobiographical sketch of the Life of Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebe W.
Woodruff]] to Mr [[Hubert Howe Bancroft|Bancroft]] & co of [[San Francisco, San Francisco County, California|Sanfrancisco]]
I spent the day and Evening in writing

11 Dec [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah Woodruff]] & sent 
her an order of $100 on the [[Smithfield, Cache County, Utah Territory|Smithfield]] Tithing
Office to apply on her Account

Dec 12, 1880
Sunday I attended meeting in the Assembly Hall 
Br [[James C. Watson|Watson]] spoke 15 M[inutes], W Woodruff 32, [[Francis Cope|Frances Cope]] 
15 M[inutes], [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 45 M[inutes]. I attended the Prayer Circle 
I attended Meeting in the 14 ward J F Smith spok 60 M[inutes] 
W Woodruff 30 M[inutes]

13. In company with [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]]
I visited Br [[Henry Dinwoody|Dinwoody]] store we bought 10 chairs 
2 sophias A centre table to fit up the council Room 
of the Twelve Apostles in the N. E. corner of the [[Council House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Council House]]

14 [FIGURE] I wrote 2 letters to [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]] & [[John P. Sorrenson|John P Sorrenson]]

15 [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] & [[Sarah M. Coombs|Sarah M Coomb]]
I attended council & Prayer Circle in the Afternoon 
[[Daniel Hanmer Wells|D. H. Wells]] circumstances was presented to the council at 
length. All his property was liable to be soled under Mortgage 
The Church and Z.C.M.I. had already advanced $3000 
to Pay interest and $1500 dollars more was wanted to
Pay the interest or the Property would have to be sold 
The council voted to raise $750 & Z.C.M.I would raise the rest

16. [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] 6 M[iles]

17 [FIGURES] I returned from the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & received a letter from 
Br [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]] I wrote a4 Letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], & [[Sarah M. Coombs|Coombs]] Bleak 
and [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]]

Dec 18, 1880
I took cars & rode to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] with [[John Taylor, b. 1808|J Taylor]] [[Joseph Fielding Smith|J F Smith]] 
[[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] [[John Van Cott|Vancott]] & [[William Taylor|Wm Taylor]] & several others 
we Met with the Presidency of the Stake & High Council and
of the Priesthood. Their has Exhisted a difficulty between 
the Authorities of the Church in that Place for a good while
and the forenoon was taken up in teaching them and some 
sharp chastisements were given and I think the harts of 
some were made to quake before the two Edged sword of
truth by the Power of God. The spirit of God was with us
we Met in the Afternoon and organized 7 Prayer Circles
but many of the company had to settle their difficulties
before they could Enter the Prayer Circle it was a profitable time
Meeting opened by Prayer by W Woodruff [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] spoke 
15 M[inutes] [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 50, [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 50 M[inutes] W Woodruff 20 m[inutes] 
The first Presidency & High Council formed one Circle 
The High Priest one. The 4 Bishops of the ^4^ wards of [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]]
Each furnish a Circle And the Presidency of the Stake with the 
Bishop furnish another Circle and Br F D Richards organized
the 7 Prayer Circles we had an interesting time it took untill 
6 oclok I spoke a short time at the close

19. [FIGURE] Sunday I for the first time in my life talked with 
Elder [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] through a telephone one Mile surly men
have sought out many inventions

December 19, 1880
I attended meeting at 
10 oclok [[John Van Cott|J Vancott]] spoke 12 M[inutes], [[Seymour Bicknell Young|Seymour Young]] 10 M[inutes] 
[[William Whitaker Taylor|Wm W Taylor]] 12 M[inutes], [[Charles William Penrose|C W Penrose]] 11, [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]]
17 M[inutes]. Afternoon W Woodruff spoke 30 M[inutes], [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 37, 
John Taylor 35 M[inutes]. W Woodruff in his remarks bore 
testimony to the work of God councilled Union among the
people spoke of the great Responsibility we are under to 
God, and the work we are called upon to perform. Joseph
Smith bore testimony to the work. Exhorted the people to
settle all their difficulties and not permit themselves 
to be cut off from the Church for they would cut 
themselves off from Eternal Life & salvation which 
was more than Death at any time. President Taylor 
spoke in the power of God warned the saints to keep the
faith and live their Religion spoke of Congress the Government 
& the Constitution which was Esstablished by inspiration 
that we could afford to be generous to our government if they
would not give us our rights but seek to oppress us we must leave in
the hands of God and He will deal with them and He 
will sustain his Kingdom. Much good was done 
by our visit there. We took cars & & returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]] 40 M[iles]
I read a Book of translation from the Jewish Talmud

20. [FIGURES] I received a letter from the [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia]] I wrote 
one Letter to [[Ilus Fabyan Carter|I. F. Carter]] spoke of [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Phebes]] family & of his lamps

Dec 21, 1880
[FIGURES] I received a letter from [[David Patten Woodruff|David]]. I wrote 1 to David 
I met with [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]] & [[David James Ross|David J Ross]] in relation 
to his Being Restored to the Church. Br Pratt is in vary
Poor health with sumthing like Brights Kidney disease 
He is hardly able to do any Kind of Labor and does not 
appear as though He Ever wood do much more business

22. I spent the day in writing and attending council
and Prayer Circle Herd a letter read from [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] 
[FIGURE] The Devil is stired up in [[Washington, D.C., United States|Washington]] against 
Mormonism I drew out a list of our persecutors

23 [FIGURE] I wrote 4 letters to [[David John|David John]] Br Perry, West & Preston

24. I spent most of the day in setling the Accounts of 
[[Alexander Findlay MacDonald|A F McDonald]] I went to the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] at at night and 
took supper with [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]] & family & [[Azmon Woodruff, b. 1802|Azmon]] & [[Elizabeth Barber Pierce DeGarmo Woodruff|Elizabeth]] 6 M[iles]

25 I returned from the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]] & spent Christmass day in the
City I visted Br [[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] with [[Leonard John Nuttall|L John Nuttall]] and Administered to him

26 Sunday I attended the Meeting in the [[Assembly Hall, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Assembly Hall]] [[Horace Sunderlin Eldredge|H S Eldridge]] 
Prayerd [[Joseph Alva West|J West]] spoke 15 M[inutes], [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] 65 M[inutes]. we Met 
in the Prayer Circle. Joseph F Smith and myself met in 
the 15 ward New Meeting House. J F Smith spoke 58 M[inutes], W 
Woodruff 50 M[inutes]

27. [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from [[David John|David John]] & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]
[FIGURES] I wrote A Prayer to be presented upon the 
Alter By the request of President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] to be presented to him
for his Aproval.

Dec 29, 1880
[FIGURE] I wrote one letter to [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q. Cannon]] it is snowing hard today

30. [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] & wrote her one & sent
her $5. I wrote to [[James Godson Bleak|James G Bleak]]

Dec 31, 1880 This is the last day of the year 1880 I once little 
Thought I would live to see this date But I have lived to see it 
as well as some of my Brethren. Great changes have taken
Place in the Church in some respects and in the world, the Church 
has been organized with A first Presidency for the third
time & the Quorum of the Twelve filled up & in these changes through 
The provide[nce] of God I have been Appointed the President of the 
Twelve Apostles. I Pray that I may have Grace and wisdom 
to assist me to magnify my calling in this capacity
In looking over my Journal I have recorded a synopsis of 
my labors in the Church & Kingdom of God during the year 
1880 on the following Page

Jan 1, 1880 This is New years day for 1881. What the year will bring forth 
I know not. What the year will bring forth God knows and will direct 
it, and time will show it to us. I pray Godd to preserve me and 
My family in Purity And I P[r]ay the Lord to Peserve the first 
Presidency, Twelve and all the faithful Saints in Zion and Bless
And Protect Br [[George Quayle Cannon|George Q Cannon]] in [[Washington, D.C., United States|Washington]] and hedge up the 
way of our Enemies that they shall not have power over the Saints of 
God. In company with Mrs [[Phebe Whittemore Carter Woodruff|Woodruff]] I visited [[Leonard Wilford Hardy|Leonard W 
Hardy]] at a surprise party at his house on his birth day. We had an 
Excellent time. His sons and family Presented him with a $30 
arm chair, speech was made by one of his sons, in the presenta-
tion of the chair. Addresses were made by Br Hardy followed By 
[[Robert Taylor Burton|R T Burton]] & W Woodruff I spent the Evening with my son 
[[Wilford Woodruff Jr.|Wilford]], & Br [[James William Nixon|Nixion]] & wife of [[St. George, Washington County, Utah Territory|St George]]

Jan 2nd 1880
Sunday I met at the [[Tabernacle, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Tabernacle]], [[Elias Morris|Elias Morris]] Prayd John ^L^ Henry 
[[John Lyman Smith|John L Smith]] spoke 10 M, [[Charles William Penrose|C W Penrose]] 31, [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 70 m 
I attended the Prayer Circle in the [[Historian|H. Office]] at 1 oclok and atten-
ded a Meeting in the 17 ward in the Evening [[John Thomas Caine|John T Cain]] spoke 
30 M, Br [[Charles Lambert|Lambert]] 15 M, & W Woodruff 45 M I wrote one 
[FIGURE] letter to [[William Read Smith|Wm R Smith]] of [[Centerville, Davis County, Utah Territory|Centreville]]

Jan 3 [FIGURES] In company with [[Angus Munn Cannon|Angus M Cannon]] I visited 
Father [[John Vance|Vance]] who had Been afflicted for 4 years with 
Evil spirits, and was suffering much we talked with him 
and his wife for several hours. A man by the name of 
E R Walker called himself a Doctor and said He was 
an Elder in the Church He was associated with other Men 
He said they had cast out 1500 devils out of Br Vance 
and had all their names written down in a Book
He said he had 1500 more Devils in him He had a new
way of casting them out we appointed the next day to
have a Meeting to investigate thse subject I received a
card from [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] I dined with President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]]
I spent the night at [[Sarah Delight Stocking Woodruff|Sarah D]]. with the children. 6 M[iles]

Jan 4. I returned to the [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|City]] and met with the High Council
On the family Difficulty of Br [[John Vance|Vance]] & family we sat
7 Hours from 10 till 5 in the Evening we heard all the
difficulties brought up pro & con and Wakers operation
in calling out the 1500 devels, and there was 1000 
still manifest in him yet, and after Hearing all they
had to say we decided that they all had need to repent
and that Dr Walker operations were all fals and a 
Delusion and he had deceivd some of the good well meaning
Brethren & drawn them away

5 [FIGURE] I received a letter from [[Phoebe Arabell Woodruff Moses|Bell]] & [[Jesse Tilton Moses|Jesse Moses]] I attended
the Council & Prayer Circle And the Prayer was 
read which I was requested to wright & it was accepted

Jan 6, 1881
[FIGURES] I received 4 Letters from [[David John|David John]], [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]],
Johnson, and the Temple work for Dec. I wrote I wrote
2 Letters to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & Bleak [in] answer to a private letter

7. I took cars to [[Woods Cross, Davis County, Utah Territory|Woods Cross]] with [[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] 
and attended a Meeting held at the Meeting House before
a High Council. The acccusation was against [[Charles E. Pearson|Charles
E Parson]]. We sat from 10 oclok untill 5 oclok
charge was brought By Bishop [[Anson Call|Call]], But the decision
was that the charge was not sustained we returned home 16 m[iles]

8 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Joseph Alva West|Joseph A West]]. I wrote one to him
I met in the Assembly room to attend the Quarterly Conference 
the forenoon was mostly spent in reading the Statistics & Report 
in the Afternoon all the General Authorities of the Church 
were sustained President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] spoke 35 M[inutes] 
upon the subject of Tithing and other subjects

9th Sunday Conference Met at 10 oclok [[Lorin Farr|Loren Farr]] 
Prayed & [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] spoke One hour & 22 Minuts
[[Angus Munn Cannon|A M Cannon]] 10 M[inutes]. Presidet Taylor said that those 
who did not Pay their tithing and Keep the Law of
God should mot [not] have a Recommend to go to the Temple 
or [[Endowment House, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|Endowment House]] to get Endowments And if the
[FIGURE] Bishops gave such Recommends, they must bear the 
Blame of it for I will not. Afternoon Prayer 
By Bishop [[Edward Hunter|Hunter]] W Woodruff spok 37 M[inutes], [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph
F Smith]] spoke 15 M[inutes], [[Edwin Dilworth Woolley|E D Woolley]] 12 M[inutes]

Jan 9, 1881 Sunday 
[[David Orson Calder|D O Calder]] 
spoke 13, A M Cannon 27, [[Joseph Edward Taylor|Joseph E Taylor]] 15 M[inutes],
[[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] 20 m[inutes] wW Woodruff 15 in the power of God

10. [FIGURE] I received a letter from Br [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]]. [[Henry Azmon Woodruff|Henry 
Woodruff]] caught a Links [FIGURE] in his trap that had 
Been Killing chickins and shot him in the head 
I spent the day in the Office

11. [FIGURE] I wrote a letter to [[Moses Franklin Farnsworth|Farnsworth]] I took dinner 
with Br [[Aurelius Miner|Miner]] and went to the field for the night 6 m[iles]

12. [FIGURES] I met in council & Prayer Circle I received 
one letter from [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]]

13. [FIGURES] I received one letter from [[George Swan|George Swan]] with
free Pass on the Rail Roads I visited Elder [[Orson Pratt|Pratt]] &
[[Charles Coulson Rich|Rich]]. Both vary feeble I attended a Party in the 14 ward

14 [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[David John|David John]] and wrote
a letter to [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] David John & [[Canute Peterson|C Peterson]] & [[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo
Snow]]. I met in council with President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]]. He
did not wish men called to go to [[St. Johns, Apache County, Arizona Territory|St John]] ownly
as volenteers did not wish to force any man to go

15 [FIGURES] I received 2 letters to day from [[James Godson Bleak|J G Bleak]] & [[Eugenia Amelia Scholes Cody|Eugenia]] 
I wrote 1 Letter to Eugenia I had a talk with [[Claudius Victor Spencer|Claudius Spencer]]
