16. Sunday I took cars rode to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] to attend the 
[[YMMIA|Y.M.M.I.A.]] we Met at 10 oclok Prayer By Br 
[[Richard Alando Ballantyne|Balantyne]]. 18 Branches represeted showing 12869 
chapters read in the various sacred Books Brother 
[[Joseph Alva West|West]] & [[James Willard Cummings|Commings]] spoke

Jan 16, 1881 Sunday
Authorities [[sustain|sustained]]. W Woodruff spoke one hour showed By 
[[revelation|Revelation]] that [[Joseph Smith Jr.|Joseph Smith]] had received all the [[priesthood keys|Keys]]
of the [[Aaronic priesthood|Aaronic]] & [[Melchizedek Priesthood|Melchezedec Priesthood]] for the [[last dispensation|last 
dispensation]] from [[John the Baptist (NT)|John the Baptist]] & [[Peter (NT)|Peter]] [[James (NT)|James]]
and [[John (NT)|John]] [[Moses (OT)|Moses]], [[Elias (OT)|Elias]], & [[Elijah (OT)|Elijah]], And had [[sealed|sealed]] all 
these Keys upon the Heads of the [[Quorum of the Twelve Apostles|Twelve Apostles]] And that 
the Prophet had laid all these Responsibilities upon the 
shoolders of the Twelve Apostles to bear off this Kingdom
in all the world. He then Exhorted the young Men to qualify 
themselves and step forth and magnify their calling. In 
Reading History I would Recommend the young Men to Read
Rollins Ancient History and [[Josephus|Josephus]]. I exhorted 
the Elders to attend the [[prayer circle|Prayer Circle]]s as far as they had 
an opportunity. [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] followed me Conference adjourned
untill the 15 April At the close of the Meeting I returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S.L.SC.]] 80 mils

17. [FIGURES] I received a letter from [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] I spent the day in the office

18. [FIGURES] I recteeived [wrote] a letter to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]] and visited [[Orson Pratt|O Pratt]] &
[[Charles Coulson Rich|C. C. Rich]] I found Br Pratt vary feeble Br Rich seemed 
to be gaining slowly I brought up Br. [[James William Nixon|Nickson]] to Dr [[Heber John Richards|Richards]]

19 This is one of the most importand days of 
[FIGURES] my life I met with the President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] 
and 2d Councillor [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] and 7 of the
Twelve viz Wilford Woodruff [[Orson Pratt|Orson Pratt]], [[Charles Coulson Rich|Charles C Rich]], 
[[Lorenzo Snow|Lorenzo Snow]], [[Franklin Dewey Richards|Franklin D Richards]] [[Francis Marion Lyman|Francis M. Lyman]],
[[John Henry Smith|John Henry Smith]] And [[John Smith, b. 1832|John Smith]] the first Patriarch 
and the Presiding Bishop [[Edward Hunter|Edward Hunter]] and [[Leonard John Nuttall|L John Nuttall]] 
C. C. Rich was carried in a chair O Pratt was vary feeble 
yet we all performed the ordinance of washing our feet against 
Our Enemies

Jan 19 1881
And the Enemies of the Kingdom of God 
according to the commandment of God unto us W. Woodruff 
opened By Prayer And [FIGURE] [[John Taylor, b. 1808|John Taylor]] was Mouth in the 
washing of feet. At the Prayer Circle Lorenzo Snow
was Mouth at the opening And President JOHN TAYLOR 
was mouth at the Alter, and Presented the Prayer written 
By W. Woodruff (By request of President Taylor) And the
names were presented before the Lord according to the
commandment. It was truly a solomn scene and 
I presume to say it was the first thing of the Kind since the
creation of the world. The Names & Prayer Presented 
will be recorded By Br L John Nuttall Presidents 
Taylors secretary we were 3 Hours in the Meeting & ordina-
nces. This is the last time that the Apostle Orson Pratt will 
Ever in this life Officiate in an important cerimony in the 
Church & Probably the same with Charles C Rich

20 [FIGURES] I wrote 1 Letter I met at 10 oclok at Br Burtons and
Administered to Br [[James William Nixon|Nickson]] after which He took Ether 
and Dr [[Heber John Richards|Heber John]] & [[Joseph Smith Richards|Joseph Richards]] cut out two 
tumors out of his body. One under his right arm Pit 
as much as 3 inches through and one on his left side 
the size of a hens Egg. it was skilfully done but Br Nixon
was vary weak. I then called upon Bishop [[Thomas Taylor|Thomas 
Taylor]] and setled my tithing which amounted to $420.27 
I there called upon President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]] a while in council

21. [FIGURE] I received 2 letters from [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] & [[David John|David John]] 
I took cars at 3:40 with several Brethren and [[Emma Smith Woodruff|Emma]] 
and rode to [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]] and attended a party at 6 oclok got
up by the relief society and Improvement Association we 
Met in a large Hall there were over 200 present all the Bishops 
and there wives of the Stake were present Peace quietude 
and good order Prevailed. we took supper at 10 oclok 
some 200 sat down to the Table well furnished the party
The party was got up in honor of Sister [[Eliza Roxcy Snow|Eliza
R Snow]]. Birth Day. Dancing was kept up untill 11 ock
Then speeches from [[Franklin Dewey Richards|F. D. Richards]] & W Woodruff 
and reading from prose & Poetry on E R Snow untill
12 oclok then dismissed I spent the night with F. D. Richards

Jan 22, 1881
[FIGURE] I wrote one letter to [[George Quayle Cannon|G Q Cannon]] we met
this Morning for a quarterly conference [[Joseph Stanford|Joseph Standford]]
Prayed. President [[David Harold Peery|Parry]] spoke a short time concerning the 
Emigration to [[Arizona Territory|Arizona]] The Bishops then made a report
of their wards I spent the day listning to the reports of the 
Bishops of the various wards & Reports I spent the night with B[r] [[Franklin Dewey Richards|Richards]]

23 [FIGURES] Sunday ^ Note the prophesy.^ I met at 10 oclok Statistics of the Stake read 
Then [[Joseph Fielding Smith|Joseph F Smith]] spoke in much power for one hour
and 35 M. Afternoon Prayer By [[Charles William Penrose|C W Penrose]] sacrament
administered. W. Woodruff then spoke one hour spoke
of the settlement in Southern [[Utah Territory|Utah]] & [[Arizona Territory|Arizonia]] bore 
testimomy to the work of God and what Joseph F Smith 
had said and in his remarks said Joseph F Smith was 
One of the first Presidency and would be President of the 
Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints in his DAY 
[[Franklin Dewey Richards|F D Richards]] spoke 20 M[inutes], Joseph F Smith 15 M[inutes]
on the government of the Church. Twelve ^The Twelve^ Presided in all the 
world whare the first Presidency ar[e] not, and that the first 
Presidency of the Stake and all the Elders & officers of
that Stake should follow the council of F D Richards 
who Presides in [[Ogden, Weber County, Utah Territory|Ogden]]. At the close of the meeting I took
supper with Br Richards took cars at 6:20 with Joseph 
F Smith & returned to [[Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|S L City]] 40 M[iles].

24 A snowy day I set apart one Missionary to go to the Southern 
States. I he^a^rd an interesting Letter Read from [[George Quayle Cannon|G. Q. Cannon]] 
to President [[John Taylor, b. 1808|Taylor]]. I had an interesting conversaction
[FIGURE] with [[Laron Pratt|Laron Pratt]] who had be[c]ome Def & dumb 
through sickness He felt as though he would like to go 
and teach the Gospel to the Deaf & Dumb mutes. He is vary
intelligent and can talk so I can understand him I

^25^ [FIGURES] Received 3 letter today from [[John Daniel Thompson McAllister|McAllister]] & Robinson 
I wrote 2 letters to McAllister & [[James Godson Bleak|Bleak]]

Jan 26, 1881
[FIGURE] I recieved one letter from David John

27. [FIGURE] I recieved 2 letter from [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] & [[Daniel Sinclair MacFarlane|McFarland]]
[FIGURE] I wrote 23 letters to [[Sarah Brown Woodruff|Sarah]], [[Sylvia Malvina Woodruff Thompson|Sylvia]] and [[Lot Smith|Lot Smith]]

28. I spent the day writing I visited [[Leonard Wilford Hardy|L W Hardy]] in
the Evening who had Been sick for a week I stoped at the [[Woodruff Farm, Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, Utah Territory|farm]]

29 [FIGURE] [[Emma Manella Woodruff|Nelly]] was taken in labor at midnight and had a [[Wilford Azmon Woodruff|son]]
born at 2 oclok P.M. Mother & child doing well I returned 
to the city & spent the day in the [[Historian|Office]] & returned to the farm 6 m

30. Sunday I returned from the field in the afternoon I attended 
the Prayer Circle

Jan 31. I spent the day copying in my Journal 
I having written my Journals in pass Books for near 
two years I have had to copy them in this Journal & 
the one previous I finished this copying on the 3d day 
of Feb 1882.

[FIGURES]

Friday


1 Jan 1st 1836 Friday spent at Brother [[Levi Taylor|Taylors]]

Saturday


2 Wrote a Letter to Elder [[Warren Farr Parrish|W Parrish]]
containing 200 lines in answer to one from
him that was Dated Nov 29th 1835 and
I received it on the 1st of Jan 1836

Sunday


3 Sunday Preached at Mr [[Joseph Chumbley|Chumleys]] [Chumbley] returned to
Brother [[Levi Taylor|Taylors]] to study Grammer
spent the week in studying, at Br Taylors

Sunday


10 Sunday visited the Saints at Mr [[Joseph Chumbley|Chumleys]]
& returned to Br [[Levi Taylor|Taylors]].
Spent the week studying at Br Taylors

Saturday


16 Saturday Rode to Col [[Solomon Copeland|Copeland]] 10 miles

Sunday


17 Preached at the [[Sulphur Wells Academy, Henry County, Tennessee|Academy]] after [[Parson Pott|Parson Potts]]
on Sunday returned to Col [[Solomon Copeland|Copeland]] 4 miles

Monday


18th Rode to Mr [[William Ross|Rues]] [Ross] Preached at his house
at 12 o'clock then rode to [[George Washington Brandon|George W Brandon]]
Preached at his house at night procured
1 subscrber for M[essenger &] Ad[vocate] distance 16 miles

Tuesday


19 Rode to & crossed the Mouth of [[Big Sandy River, Henry County, Tennessee|Sandy]] at
Authurs ferry from thence to Br [[Levi Taylor|Taylors]] 24/mile

Wednesday


20 Rode to Mr [[Joseph Chumbley|Chumblys]] 1 mile

Thursday


21 Rode to [[James Hendricks|James Hendricks]] from thence to Br
[[Benjamin Lynn Clapp|Clapps]] [[Terrapin, Calloway County, Kentucky|Taropen]] distance 30 miles

Friday


22 Rode to Father [[Joseph Greenwood|Greenwoods]] Prea^c^hed at
his house the[n] rode to Br [[John Camp|Camps]] 7 miles

Saturday


23 Preached at Br [[Benjamin Lynn Clapp|Clapps]] & blessed 10
children in the name of Jessus Christ
then rode to [[Clarks River, Calloway County, Kentucky|Clarks River]] distance 12 m
& collected $7.00 for the [[Kirtland Temple, Kirtland, Geauga County, Ohio|house]] of God at [[Kirtland, Geauga County, Ohio|Kirtland]]


24

Sunday


Jan 24 [sideways text in margin] preached at night [end of sideways text]
Preached at Br [[Daniel Stillwell Thomas|Thomase's]] Sunday & blessed
6 Children after i closed meeting
a Baptist Prist [[William Willson|William Willson]] arose &
and invited us to attend a meeting of theirs
& cleer ourselfs of things they had
accused us of. I answered him before
the people & remarked that I was
surprised that they should take the
liberties of the Country into their own
own hands to try American
citisons by [blank]

Monday


25 Rode to [[James Martin|James Martins]] preach
at his house allso at night 12 miles

Tuesday


26 Returned to Brother [[Daniel Stillwell Thomas|Thomases]]
preached at his his house. 12 mil

Wednesday


27 Rode to [[Stephen Brady|Stephen Braidy's]] [Brady] 24 m

Thursday


28 Preached at [[Stephen Brady|Stephen Braidy's]] then
Rode to Mr [[John Freeman|Freeman's]] distance 14

Friday


29 Preached at [[John Rowlett|John Rowlett's]] blessed
